18.18: ninb Bua kxvq, “taaib maa'b! Bua taaq za'eij hxig ye-le-mi weig zu'g sai myenb maaib Eei leib latg maiq haib zu'g myetg. Zovb mevb myenb Zaavb laavb Eei waag fai trug waag myenb trug Eei waag yaag maiq haib Revg. taaib maa'b! Bua lovg Rwib koj ninb.” Bua yaag maiq mwavj ninb kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag.
18.8: mq paag sij kxvq yia kxvq Tauj uaq kua'q myenb, kwavg Gxi ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig, yia zyrug kxiq za'eij, maiq pun ninb Bua zu'g tovb yia tivg pun ninb Bua zu'g Eei ze'g naang.
18.3: yia zyrug Fiag mivb Tauj nanq nia zavg Eei pyauq, zyrug pwatg zavg myenb yem kwinb Jyenq uaq nxm ka'naaiq zruj kov.
18.21: weig naaiq Toq zx'q ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud Jiu pun zu'g vxg Naavj, yaag Jiu pun ninb Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq Eei Qa'q. Toq pun ninb Bua Eei auq maiq maaib fu'Jweiq yaag penj aub kwaaq. Toq pun ninb Bua Eei mJavg txn zu'g tomb wrnb pcvg taig, pun ninb Bua Eei myenb lunj myenb yem Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
18.14: le-Baa-nxn Bov Eei sxv yem la'pyeib zxv tavj Eei fai? Bov Eei uam haib Gaai Eei fai? se lyrug Fiag Do'q Eei uamb laavb.
18.23: mq paag zyruq aag, ninb Bua taaq Eei yetg zuvq za'eij, se xij taij yia, meib hiuq Eei. Toq maiq tuvq kwavg ninb Bua x'q haig Eei zwib nipg, fai yem meib Eei Ra'Myen sxtq kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid. Toq pun ninb Bua yem meib Eei Ra'Myen zu'g Byenq Fiag. meib Qiaj Jiad Eei zyavb hog, Toq zruj pun ninb Bua.
18.6: zyruq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! yia zruj pun meib Bua Navq nanq niab mx zavg zruj maiq tu'q fai? i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! mavg maa'b! nia yem zavg myenb Eei puad Navq haiq nx, meib Bua yaag yem yia Eei puad Navq uaq nx.
18.2: “Jiad taaib Fiag mivb Tauj nanq nia zavg Eei pyauq uaq. yem naaig yia xij pun meib mwavj haid yia Eei waag.”
18.20: zruj Kuq sig xij zu'g winb x'q sig fai? ninb Bua Zxg xij wetq Kwrtq hxig yia Eei mcvg. Toq Javj Jyenq yia Navq haiq nx sruq Jyenq meib Eei Ra'Myen Tevj ninb Bua Toq lovj Eei Jauq, weig pun meib Win kanb puv, maiq Qiaj Jiad ninb Bua.
18.7: sij kxvq yia haiq zang kxvq Tauj yetg fivj fai yetg kua'q, xij pcv Zwrtq, paaig waaig, myetg Revg,
18.19: zyruq aag, Toq mwavj yia, Toq mwavj Zauj yia txib tekg uaq teij myenb.
18.17: yia zyrug pun ninb Bua yem winb wavq Eei Ra'Myen Raanj Navq tov puv Eei Ryaauj nx. Tauj ninb Bua zu'g ze'g naang Eei Nxi, yia xij Win ti'g taand pun ninb Bua, maiq Win Myen.”
18.11: “weig naaiq meib ib zang xij zu'g kxvq Buaj yu-Daa myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia zeij Zwrtq Zyruq Eei ze'g naang hxig meib Bua, yaag taaq za'eij zruj pun meib Bua. meib Bua kx'g myenb xij zu'g kwavg Gxi meib Bua zruj x'q Eei Jauq, zxg meib Bua Eei Jauq Zauj meib Bua zruj Eei sig.’
18.5: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag.
18.9: sij kxvq yia haiq zang kxvq Tauj yetg fivj fai yetg kua'q xij Zeij Jiad lyepg wrnq,
18.16: zyrug pun ninb Bua Eei teib puv penj kamb Riaj haig Eei txvj, penj zu'g myenb yetg liud Wrtq Eei ka'naaiq. ta'faanb Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb kamb Riaj haig, Wavj mGxvq.
18.4: zavg myenb zruj uaq nxm niab mx yem ninb Eei puad waaig mivb. ninb zyrug lovg uaq teij nia cvj kanb nanq nxm, ziuj zavg myenb haid hxpg zu'g zruj Eei.
18.10: sij kxvq uaq kua'q myenb ziuj yia Eei mziv mavg zruj x'q sig, maiq mwavj yia kxvq Eei waag, yia zyrug kxiq za'eij, maiq pun ninb Bua tu'q lovj Eei Jauq ziuj yia tivg pun ninb Bua tu'q Eei.
18.22: meib txb luq myenb Eei myenb lyemb zeib taaib lxd ninb Bua. Toq pun heug Kruq Eei Qiaj yem ninb Bua Eei pyauq Zwrtq, weig zu'g ninb Bua wetq Kwrtq pun yia Dxtq Fiag, ninb Bua zcv Laav Lopq yia Eei zauj.
18.12: “mq paag ninb Bua tau, ‘yia Bua maiq kunq. yia Bua xij ziuj kanb Eei za'eij zruj. kx'g myenb xij ziuj kx'g myenb x'q Eei Hruq vcvg Jyenq zruj.’+”
18.15: mq paag yia Eei pc'g fivj la'Ku'q yia, ninb Bua puaq huv kevj Jaaq zyenb. ninb Bua yem ninb Bua Eei Jauq Di'q zu'g Dxpg, se yem ninb Bua lob Nxi Eei Jauq. ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb yavb Jaub wivg, maiq yavb tomb Jauq,
18.13: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “xij zu'g yem maang kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj naaig, maaib haiq taub haid Jiaj Navq naaiq Euvg sig? i-saa-laa-en myenb zruj kamb Riaj! haig Eei sig.
18.1: ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,

45.3: ‘meib kxvq, “yia zu'g Kruq a'q. zyruq zx'q yrub Raub Jaa Jyenq yia mun Eei txvj. laaij Funb yia haid Kruq haig yaag maiq tu'q hitq Kwrnj.”+’
45.5: meib weig kanb lxd Lo Eei Jauq fai? maiq tuvq lxd, weig zu'g yia xij pun zwavj paamb myenb zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang. mq paag maiq kunq meib mivb Tauj haaij, yia xij pun meib tu'q mcvg zyavb weig penj Bx'q Jaaj tu'q taaib Eei zivb Eeig.”+’+” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
45.4: “meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia Zeij Jiad Eei, yia xij Zc'q Fiag. yia zwavj Eei, yia xij pcv Zwrtq, se zyavb nxm teib puv.
45.1: yo-si-yaa Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb ta'feij Havj uaq Havj, ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq, ziuj trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq naaiq teij waag fiaq Jyenq sru. ye-le-mi kxvq,
45.2: “Baa-lukq aa'b! zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj meib,

3.18: Tauj uaq teij Nxib Eia'g yu-Daa Eei zeib fun Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun xij kapq Jyenq, zyrug yem pa'q puv mcvj Eei teib puv taaib Tauj yia Zeij pun penj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Ripg Eei pwrng teib puv.
3.8: ninb pwatg laaij vcvg tod Eei i-saa-laa-en zruj yetg zuvq Yenj Eei sig, yia pun leib Zai sru ninb yaag zung ninb mivb. mq paag ninb maiq zyepg zua'q Eei Riad, yu-Daa, maiq kamb Riaj. ninb yaag mivb zruj Navq maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn.
3.3: weig naaiq Byuvg zu'g tivb mig a'q, Zunb ken Byuvg yaag maiq twib, mq paag meib maaib Myen Navq maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn yaag vcvg Jyenq maiq lcvd Eaiq.
3.21: yem Lav, Fav Eei txvj haid myenb Eei Qiaj, penj i-saa-laa-en Eei naamb Erud Eyemq cvj heug Jyenq Toq Eei Qiaj, weig zu'g ninb Bua yavb Pyen leib zyen Jauq, la'Ku'q zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
3.14: zyruq kxvq, “vcvg tod Eei naamb Erud aa'b! Rwrnj taaib maa'b! weig zu'g yia zruj meib Bua Eei zyruq. yia xij yem yetg nxm zivb kinq yetg laanb, cvj yem yetg fivj kinq i laanb, yaag txb meib Bua Tauj si-on.
3.23: zyen Eei, yem fiub Bov tomb Bov saanj Eei Jauq Kuvj Duaq myenb Navq. zyen Eei, zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Fruj en.
3.6: yem yo-si-yaa huvb kunq Eei zyavb hog zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “meib pwatg ninb zruj Eei fai? vcvg tod Eei i-saa-laa-en faauj nxmb nxm Bovb Lav yaag yem tiub tiub Dyavb Eyemd ka'Diaq Yenj.
3.2: “Zau Myen mavg Lav, Fav Eei txvj maa'b! maaib haiq nxm txvj maiq maaib myenb Zauj meib pweij Jiaj? meib zweid Jyenq Jaub Len zuaq myenb taaib Namq meib, Navq aa-lapg myenb yem teib puvb Waav. meib zruj x'q haig, maaig sin Eei sig pun teib puv maaib wij pwavq Revg.
3.20: i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! zyen sig, maiq zyepg zua'q Eei auq Navq haiq nx kwavg ninb Eei Goj, meib Bua yaag Navq uaq nx maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun yia.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
3.24: mq paag yem yia Bua lunj Eei zyavb hog Tauj ib zang naaiq teij Eaiq haig Eei ka'naaiq na'q Revg yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij laaub lwig tu'q taaib Eei, se ninb Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb, yuvb kwanb, ninb Bua Eei vovb kwanb, Zauj ninb Bua Eei txn sia'q.
3.7: yia yaag Namq taaib, ‘ninb zruj liud naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig ninb zyrug Rwrnj taaib lxd yia.’ mq paag ninb maiq Rwrnj. ninb maiq zyepg zua'q Eei Riad, yu-Daa, pwatg Eei.
3.19: “yia Namq taaib, “+‘yia xij lyepg meib yem yia Eei naamb Erud Bu'Dovj, yaag pun nxm Kub yem Eei teib puv meib. se yem zwavj kua'q Bu'Dovj pun meib Ripg kaub Rweig Jiaj Eei pwrng.’ yia yaag Namq taaib meib xij heug yia, ‘aa tia,’+” yaag maiq leib Gxi, kwavg yia.
3.17: uaq teij zyavb hog myenb xij heug ye-lu-saa-lem penj zyruq Eei weig. maang kua'q myenb xij kapq zunq taaib yem ye-lu-saa-lem, zyruq Eei Ra'Myen. ninb Bua zyrug maiq cvj vcvg Jyenq ei ninb Bua kanb x'q Eei Hruq zruj.
3.11: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “vcvg tod Eei i-saa-laa-en piuj mevb ninb maiq Dovg maiq zyepg zua'q Eei yu-Daa txvg zwid.
3.5: ninb xij yetg liud Qiaj Jiad yia fai? xij nrud yia Tauj setq mweid?’ mavg maa'b! meib kxvq liud a'q, mq paag meib haib zruj tu'q haiq Euvg x'q sig, meib yaag zruj mig a'q.”
3.9: weig i-saa-laa-en naaiq teij maaig pwrnb sin Eei Jauq se hev Eei sig, ninb zyrug pun teib puv maaib wij, cvj paaij la'pyeiq Zauj Dyavj.
3.16: zyruq kxvq, “meib Bua yem teib puv Yaavj Zamq Jyenq faauj uaq teij Nxib Eia'g, myenb maiq cvj kxvq, ‘zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav.’ naaiq Euvg Jauq maiq yem Hruq, maiq Javj, maiq Namq Tauj yaag maiq cvj syavb zruj nxm a'q.
3.4: a'Jav meib heug yia maiq zeid? meib kxvq, ‘yia Eei tia aa'b! yem yia lunj Eei zyavb hog meib Zauj yia zruj txig.
3.10: maiq kunq naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig, ninb maiq zyepg zua'q Eei Riad, yu-Daa, maiq lovg Revg Hruq Rwrnj taaib lxd yia. Kuvj zruj Jaaq Eei eij leid Navq.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
3.22: “meib Bua vcvg tod Eei naamb Erud aa'b! Rwrnj taaib maa'b! yia xij zxg meib Bua vcvg tod Eei Jauq lovj taaib.” “mavg maa'b! yia Bua taaib lxd meib weig zu'g meib se zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
3.12: mivb maa'b! huvj Jyenq pa'q puv mcvj zunb naaiq teij waag. xij zu'g kxvq, “zyruq kxvq, ‘vcvg tod Eei i-saa-laa-en aa'b! Rwrnj taaib maa'b! yia maiq nrud Jyenq mavg meib, weig zu'g yia Kxb lyenb myenb.’ zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq. “+‘yia maiq yetg liud Qiaj Jiad.
3.15: yia yaag xij pun hxpg yia Eei Hruq Eei kruj yuvb myenb, tovb haib lovg wrnb zaav Zauj pia'g Hruq Eei Jauq kruj meib Bua.”
3.13: Kuvj xij zu'g Eyemg meib zruj txvg Eei zwid, se meib vcvg zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb. meib yem tiub tiub Dyavb Eyemd sweib eij zx'q kanb pun kanb fivj Eei zyenb. meib yaag maiq mwavj yia Eei Qiaj.’+”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
3.1: “sij kxvq maaib laanb myenb leib kwavg ninb Eei auq, ninb Eei auq leib Gxi cvj mivb zruj kanb laanb myenb Eei auq, lob Goj cvj Rwrnj mivb lxd ninb fai? uaq nxm teib puv maiq zeid laib Lopq Zamq Eei fai? mq paag meib zruj Navq maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn, Yenj Namq meib uaq teij myenb Zamq, meib Zxg Rwrnj taaib lxd yia fai?” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
3.25: yia Bua xij zu'g lovg zu'g Eaiq Eei Jauq txvj Zruj pweij, yaag lovg yia Bua paaig Myen Eei Jauq homg. weig zu'g yem yia Bua lunj Eei zyavb hog Tauj ib zang yia Bua Zauj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij paamd zwid txvg zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. yia Bua yaag maiq mwavj zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei waag.”

43.3: se ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq, Zo'q meib hxig yia Bua, weig zx'q yia Bua Jiu pun yem Ken-Dia myenb Eei puab Diaq, weig pun ninb Bua taij yia Bua fai kwaatq yia Bua mivb Baa-Bi-lon teib puv.
43.8: yem Taa-paan-hetg, ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
43.9: “meib xij zu'g lovg puad zx'q ziaj nxm la'pyeiq Lo Eei txv Jyenq yu-Daa myenb txb mivb yem Taa-paan-hetg, faa-lo Eei huvb ting Eei kcvb Daavg, zyrug pivj Jyenq pa'naib nia ka'Euad.
43.7: ninb Bua zyrug taaib pia'g i-yipq teib puv, weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq mwavj zyruq Eei waag. ninb Bua mivb Tauj Taa-paan-hetg zivb.
43.5: taauj Rwrnj, Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, Zauj Junb pcv Eei yetg zuvq pcvb pyeiq, txb yu-Daa zevg Fiag Eei zwavj myenb, se zu'g zung mivb nxmb nxm kua'q Rwrnj taaib yem Jyenq yu-Daa teib puv Eei myenb,
43.4: Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, Zauj Junb pcv yetg zuvq pcvb pyeiq Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj, maiq mwavj zyruq hatg Eei waag, se xij zu'g yem Jyenq yu-Daa teib puv.
43.2: ho-saa-yaa Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa, Zauj Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, Zauj yetg zuvq Zevb Lo Eei myenb kxvq Buaj ye-le-mi, “meib kxvb pc'g Navq. zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, maiq Paaiq meib taaib kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq mivb i-yipq teib puv weig yem uaq.’
43.6: mJavg msia'q, fu'Jweiq, huvb sia'q, tovb kruj huvb Eei pcvb pyeiq, ne-Bu-saa-laa-Daan, lyrub Fiag pun saa-faan Eei fun, aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, Eei yetg zuvq myenb. ninb Bua yaag txb trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, Zauj ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq mivb.
43.13: ninb xij Bx'q nauq yem i-yipq teib puv, he-li-o-Bu-li, Eei miub favj tovg, cvj lovg trud puaq Qwi i-yipq teib puv Eei miub pyauq.’+”
43.12: ninb xij yem i-yipq Eei zyenb Eei miub pyauq tyemq zia'g trud taaib puaq miub pyauq Qwi, cvj kwaatq ninb Bua Eei zyenb mivb. ninb yaag xij fyruj Revg i-yipq teib puv Navq kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb fyruj ninb Eei tomb lwi lxd Revg tamq. ninb zyrug pcvb xn Eei leib uaq nxm txvj.
43.11: ninb xij taaib Bx'q i-yipq teib puv, pun mcvg taaij zu'g ze'g naang, zyrug zu'g ze'g naang, pun mcvg taaij zu'g kwaatq mivb, zyrug zu'g kwaatq mivb, pun mcvg taaij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
43.1: ye-le-mi txv Jyenq pc'g fivj kxvq liud zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag, tovb zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Paaiq ninb mivb kxvq Buaj ninb Bua Eei waag.
43.10: xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia xij zx'q yia Eei pru, Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, lyepg ninb Eei weig yem yia pivj naaiq teij la'pyeiq kub vwaaig. ninb yaag xij Zxv ninb Eei Dopg liub yem naaiq teij la'pyeiq kub vwaaig.

50.18: weig naaiq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia zuvq xij tivg Baa-Bi-lon huvb Zauj ninb Eei teib puv Eei zwid, Navq yia tivg atg-si-lia huvb Eei zwid nx.
50.45: Navq naaig meib Bua xij zu'g mwavj   zyruq taaq Eei za'eij weig Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon, Zauj ninb Bx'q Ken-Dia myenb tivg Eei za'eij. ninb Bua faij Jiaj Eei pa'ki yuvb txn Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g Tx mivb. ninb Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb laanb Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g myetg.
50.3: weig zu'g maaib nxm kua'q yem pa'q puv taaib Bx'q ninb, xij pun ninb Eei teib puv zu'g paaig Waav Revg, maiq maaib haiq taub yem naaig, lyemb myenb lyemb scvb Kuq xij pyauj Revg.
50.43: Baa-Bi-lon huvb mwavj haid ninb Bua Eei fyenj, ninb Eei puad zyrug mau mig a'q. ninb Hruq za'kevb! mun haig, Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad nx.
50.14: “meib Bua yetg zuvq pcv Jwavb zinj Eei myenb aa'b! Baib Jyenq weib kxmj pwrnq Baa-Bi-lon maa'b! kunq pwrnq yaag maiq tuvq Kxb fi'q fxv, weig zu'g ninb paamd zwid txvg zyruq.
50.34: zua'g ninb Bua uaq taub se henq Eei, ninb Eei Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq. ninb Dovg haaij zuvq xij Tevj ninb Bua Zcvj sig, weig pun luvb Diaq maaib pcvb xn, mq paag pun yem Baa-Bi-lon uaq teij pc'g fivj maiq pcvb xn.”
50.2: “xij zu'g yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj zunb kxvq, lyepg Jiad keb cvj zunb Buaj, maiq tuvq pivj, xij zu'g kxvq, ‘Baa-Bi-lon zu'g Zaavq mig a'q. Ben zyenb zu'g Eaiq, me-lo-Dakg zyenb zu'g kamb Riaj. Baa-Bi-lon Eei miub favj zu'g Eaiq, ninb Eei miub favj zu'g kamb Riaj.’
50.36: pun Bruq kwaaj myenb zu'g Ru'g Daauq weig pun ninb Bua penj ka'naaib Vovj. pun ninb henq Eei pcv zu'g Ru'g Daauq a'q, weig pun ninb Bua zu'g myetg.
50.35: zyruq kxvq, “Ken-Dia myenb xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq a'q. yem Baa-Bi-lon Eei pc'g fivj, lyemb ninb Eei Jyen Zauj Zovb mevb myenb yaag xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq.
50.24: Baa-Bi-lon aa'b! yia weig meib zcv Laav, meib zyrug zu'g Lopq Jyenq yaag maiq hiuq haiq Euvg. meib zu'g ninb Bua lxd pwatg yaag zu'g zx'q mig a'q, weig zu'g meib Zauj zyruq txib tekg Rcv.
50.7: ta'faanb lxd pwatg ninb Bua uaq teij zx'q ninb Bua na'q Revg mivb. ninb Bua Eei winb wavq kxvq, ‘yia Bua maiq zruj txvg weig zu'g ninb Bua paamd zwid txvg zyruq, se ninb Bua zyen yem Eei txvj, tovb ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij maaib lamb Namq Eei zyruq. ’
50.17: “i-saa-laa-en myenb se Navq zu'g syenb zung Raanj Eei pa'ki yuvb. taaub tavb atg-si-lia huvb Eang ninb. setq mweid Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Laij ninb Eei Buvq.”
50.11: “luq yia Ripg Eei pc'g fivj Eei myenb aa'b! maiq kunq meib Bua Fyenb yrub, maiq kunq meib Bua xnb lx'g, maiq kunq meib Bua a'Neiq Navq taub vovb zeig yem miab Zyavq, yaag Navq maab kruq hcq hcq Eei,
50.33: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g zeij, yu-Daa myenb fib Navq Eei. Zaavq ninb Bua uaq teij Eau Jyenq ninb Bua, maiq Kavq puvj.
50.16: meib Bua xij zu'g zx'q yem Baa-Bi-lon zwavj ka'naaiq Eei myenb Zauj nanq Ru'g limb syru Zunb kcv Eei myenb Pai kwavg. weig zeij myenb uaq teij Eei Ru'g Daauq, mrud taub myenb zyrug Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei pc'g fivj, taub taub yaag pyauj Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei teib puv.
50.40: zyruq kxvq, “Navq Tinb huvb Byenq soj-Dom Zauj ko-mo-laa Zauj weib kxmj Eei zivb, Baa-Bi-lon fib Navq Eei maiq maaib myenb yem naaig, yaag maiq maaib paamb myenb tivb zepq yem ninb ka'Euad.
50.37: pun ninb Eei maad Zauj Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj yem ninb Bu'Dovj yetg zuvq kanb fivj Eei pcv zu'g Ru'g Daauq weig pun ninb Bua Navq msia'q txn nx mau. pun Baa-Bi-lon yetg zuvq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq zu'g Ru'g Daauq a'q, zyrug pun ninb zu'g luq.
50.4: zyruq kxvq, “uaq teij Nxi, uaq teij zyavb hog, i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yu-Daa myenb xij kapq zunq taaib, yetg ping mivb yetg ping Eyemq, lxd zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
50.12: meib Bua Eei maa xij zu'g Eaiq Tauj Do'q, yuvd meib Bua taaib uaq taub zu'g paaig Myen. ninb xij zu'g penj yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj Ga'haaq laai uaq kua'q, penj Gaai Eei teib puvb haand, teib puvb Waav.
50.46: weig Baa-Bi-lon zu'g zx'q Eei Qiaj Bwi Dang Dau tovd, ninb heug Eei Qiaj Bwi yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj mwavj tu'q haid.”
50.13: weig zu'g zyruq Qiaj Jiad, Baa-Bi-lon zyrug maiq maaib myenb yem. ta'faanb Jiaj Baa-Bi-lon Eei myenb kamb Riaj haig, yaag weig ninb yetg zuvq zu'g mun Eei txvj Wrtq ninb.
50.26: yem pyei puv taaib Bx'q ninb cvj Kxi ninb Eei lamd, zx'q ninb Dwi Jyenq Navq Byaub Dwi nx. myetg Revg ninb, maiq tuvq lyrub yetg teij.
50.28: mwavj maa'b! myenb yem Baa-Bi-lon teib puv pyauj Zwrtq taaib yem si-on kxvq, ‘zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Jaauq win, se weig zavg ninb uaq nxm pyauq Jaauq win.
50.8: “i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! xij zu'g yem Baa-Bi-lon ka'Euad pyauj Zwrtq. Zwrtq Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv maa'b! zruj Navq yem pa'ki yuvb kwanb txb Jauq Eei yuvb kruq.
50.9: weig zu'g yia xij Zo'q ziaj nxm yem pa'q puv Eei tomb kua'q penj tomb kwanb taaib Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon. ninb Bua zyrug Baib Jyenq taaib Bx'q ninb. Baa-Bi-lon zyrug yem naaig zu'g zx'q mig a'q. ninb Bua Eei fxvb Zav se Navq maaib puab taub Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv maiq Kuvb puad Eei Rwrnj.
50.32: zruj mauj Eei kua'q xij Di'q zu'g Dxpg, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Ken ninb Jiad sin. yia xij yem ninb Eei zivb tyemq trud, trud zyrug puaq Qwi weib kxmj ninb Eei yetg zuvq.”
50.21: zyruq kxvq, “mivb Bx'q me-laa-Taa-im teib puv, yaag Bx'q pe-Kotg Eei pc'g fivj, xij zu'g taij, zung Jyenq mivb myetg Revg. ziuj yia Paaiq meib Eei yetg zuvq waag xij zu'g zruj zyavj Revg.
50.23: luvb Diaq Eei uaq nxm Lia'g zweib zu'g Va'q Dutq cvj Bx'q huq mig a'q. Baa-Bi-lon yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj penj hc'q myenb kamb Riaj Eei txvj.
50.6: “yia Eei pc'g fivj Navq txvg Jauq Eei pa'ki yuvb, ninb Bua Eei kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb txb ninb Bua txvg Jauq, pun ninb Bua yem Bov kub vwaaig Win kanb puv. ninb Bua zyrug yem tomb Bov mivb fiub Bov, Tauj la'Ku'q ninb Bua kanb Eei laanb.
50.44: Navq syenb yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Len Eei lomg taaib pxvd wrnq haig Eei pa'ki yuvb laanb, yia lyemb zeib pun Baa-Bi-lon myenb Tiuj pyauj, leib Gxi naaiq nxm teib puv. yia kinq haiq taub yia zyrug Paaiq uaq taub kunq naaiq nxm kua'q. maaib haiq taub Navq yia? maaib haiq taub haib heug yia taaib? maaib haiq taub kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb haib tiaq tu'q sruq yia Eei Ra'Myen?”
50.20: zyruq kxvq, “Tauj uaq teij Nxib Eia'g, uaq teij zyavb hog, yem i-saa-laa-en lxd zwib nipg yaag maiq maaib a'q. yem yu-Daa lxd zwid yaag lxd maiq tu'q a'q. weig zu'g yia xij kwavg Revg yia lyrub Fiag Eei myenb Eei zwid.”
50.5: ninb Bua xij naaig Jauq mivb si-on, maaib Myen Win Jyenq uaq puv mivb zyrug kxvq, ‘taaib maa'b! Bua xij zu'g taaib Zauj zyruq kapq Jyenq lyepg yetg liud Eei vcvg waag, tovb maiq haib la'Ku'q Eei waag.’
50.19: yia zyrug txb i-saa-laa-en Rwrnj ninb kanb Eei miab Zyavq, ninb zyrug yem Kaan-men Bov Zauj Baa-saan Eang miaq. ninb yaag yem e-faa-im Bov Zauj ki-le-aatg teig tu'q Eang peuq.”
50.38: pun luvb haand hxig ninb Eei uam Gaai Revg. weig zu'g ninb Eei teib puv penj miub favj Eei txvj, myenb laaij xij miub favj zuvq Navq maiq Rav a'q.
50.31: zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “Baa-Bi-lon aa'b! meib za'kevb mauj haig. yia zyrug Zauj meib txib tekg, weig zu'g meib Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj a'q, se yia tivg meib Eei zwid Eei zyavb hog.
50.27: taij Revg ninb Eei vovb kruq, pun ninb Bua Fiag mivb zu'g taij taig Eei txvj. ninb Bua zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj, Tauj zyavb hog ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid.
50.41: “mavg maa'b! maaib yetg fivj yem pa'q puv taaib, penj yetg tomb kua'q myenb Zauj Zamb taub huvb tiaj yem luvb Diaq ko Jiaj Eei txvj zu'g Zo'q Jiad taaib.
50.1: naaiq se zyruq lovg trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, trug waag kxvq Baa-Bi-lon, se Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv. ninb kxvq,
50.39: “weig naaiq teib puvb Waav Eei Yiab zxib Zauj Yiab Jub pen zyrug yem Baa-Bi-lon, yaag maaib nx'g lxb Txb yem naaig. uaq nxm zivb yetg liud maiq maaib myenb yem, yetg seij yetg txig maiq maaib a'q.”
50.10: Ken-Dia xij zu'g luq. ta'faanb luq ninb Eei myenb pwavq eij Revg.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
50.25: zyruq Kxi Gxi ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jaab sig Eei lamd, zx'q Zwrtq ninb Qiaj Jiad Jyenq lovg Eei ua'g king, weig zu'g zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, maaib kov zruj yem Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv.
50.22: yem teib puv maaib Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj Bwi, yaag maaib myetg Eei sig Lo haig.
50.42: ninb Bua nanq Jwavb zinj Zauj Zav, ninb Bua yrug Zyruq yrug to'g, maiq Kxb lyenb myenb. ninb Bua Eei Qiaj Bwi Navq Kxiq Jiad laavg Bwi zob zod Eei. ninb Bua keb maad, Baib Jyenq taaib Bx'q Jaaj, weig Bx'q meib Baa-Bi-lon.”
50.15: xij zu'g yem ninb Eei pyei puv heug, ninb Eyemg swei mig a'q. ninb Eei laaub Baav Fiag, zivb laatg yaag Baav. weig zu'g naaiq se zyruq Jaauq win pun ninb, meib kunq Jaauq win a'q. ninb Navq haiq nx zruj pun myenb, xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj pun ninb.
50.29: “xij zu'g heug pwrnq Jwavb zinj Eei myenb taaib, se yetg zuvq haib pwrnq Jwavb zinj Eei myenb. xij zu'g lyepg Zyavq weib kxmj zivb, maiq tuvq pun yetg taub myenb pyauj Dutq. ziuj Baa-Bi-lon zruj Eei sig winb pun ninb. ninb Navq haiq nx zruj pun myenb, xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj pun ninb, weig zu'g ninb zruj mauj, vcvg Jyenq zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
50.30: weig naaiq ninb Eei myenb lunj myenb zyrug yem tomb zwavj zaamg zu'g taij taig, tovb uaq Nxi ninb Eei yetg zuvq pcv xij zu'g myetg Revg.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.

14.18: sij kxvq yia Zwrtq mivb lomb Waav yia pwatg zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij Eei myenb. sij kxvq yia pia'g zivb, yia pwatg myenb laaij vxg Naavj zu'g pcvg. weig zu'g trug waag myenb Zauj sai myenb yem kua'q ka'Euad, ziuj zanb zang zruj Eei kov zruj, mq paag ninb Bua maiq hiuq haiq Euvg.’+”
14.8: meib se tovb i-saa-laa-en myenb maaib lamb Namq uaq taub. yia Bua zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog meib zruj ninb Bua Eei Fruj zyruq. meib yem naaiq nxm teib puv meib weig haiq tiug Navq Kc'q myenb yaag Navq Jiaj Jauq hitq mwrnd paaq Eei myenb?
14.3: yem zivb zruj Lo Eei myenb heug ninb Bua Eei pru mivb zaavb uam. ninb Bua mivb Tauj syru uam Eei Kwrtq pwatg maiq maaib uam. ninb Bua txb Jyenq ovb Kuvj Rwrnj, ninb Bua Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen, zyrug pwav Jyenq mGxvq.
14.21: Toq meib weig meib Eei mevb maiq tuvq Gemb yia Bua. Toq maiq tuvq pun myenb maiq Taaib meib Favb laavg Eei weig. Javj Jyenq, maiq tuvq puvj Dxtq meib Zauj yia Bua lcvd Jiaj Eei vcvg waag.
14.14: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “naaiq teij trug waag myenb tevq yia Eei Buaj trug Jaaq Eei waag. yia maiq heug ninb Bua mivb, maiq Paaiq ninb Bua yaag maiq Zauj ninb Bua kxvq waag. ninb Bua lovg Jaaq hing yaavb Eei sig trug waag pun meib Bua. ninb Bua Bruq kwaaj yaag maiq lamb lovg. ninb Bua Kuvj ziuj kanb Eei Hruq Duaq kanb.
14.6: Yiab lxb sruq Jyenq Bov kub vwaaig, Lav Eei txvj Tauq Qiaj hcb hc Eei Navq Yiab Juq nx. Yiab lxb Eei mziv maiq Fav weig zu'g maiq maaib miaq.”
14.2: “yu-Daa Raub Eyemq, ninb Eei zivb Kruq Jyenq Fiag. ninb Eei pc'g fivj zweid Jyenq Dau Raub Eyemq, maaib heug Jyenq Eei Qiaj yem ye-lu-saa-lem faauj.
14.20: zyruq aag, yia Bua Eyemg yia Bua zruj x'q Eei sig, Zauj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei zwib nipg, weig zu'g yia Bua paamd zwid txvg meib.
14.7: zyruq aag, maiq kunq yia Bua Eei zwid zruj zxvb zevj koj yia Bua, Toq meib weig meib Eei mevb zruj yetg Euvg. yia Bua Twij Gaav leib meib Zamb Rung. yia Bua paamd zwid txvg meib.
14.19: meib kwavg Revg yu-Daa fai? meib Eei Hruq yruj haig si-on fai? meib weig haiq tiug Bx'q yia Bua Tauj zxg maiq lovj? yia Bua lxd pcvb xn mq paag maiq tu'q haiq Euvg lovj. yia Bua zuaq Jyenq zyavb hog zxg lovj, taauj Rwrnj zu'g kamb Riaj.
14.17: “meib xij zu'g kxvq naaiq Jruj waag Buaj ninb Bua, ‘Toq pun yia Eei mziv zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd lyrug uamb mweig, maiq tuvq pun tivb. weig zu'g yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g Bx'q tu'q Niaq, zu'g mun tu'q syav.
14.11: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “maiq tuvq weig naaiq teij pc'g fivj tauj kauj Toq pun ninb Bua tu'q Kub yem.
14.5: lyemb yem lomb Waav Eei Faib Eeid kwavg ninb Zo'q ho'g Fiag Eei txn weig zu'g maiq maaib miaq.
14.9: meib weig haiq tiug Navq taub lyemb zeib Hruq lung, yaag Navq taub myenb henq myenb Fruj maiq tu'q haiq taub. mq paag zyruq aag, meib yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj. yia Bua penj kan meib Eei Buaj heug Eei myenb. Toq maiq tuvq kwavg yia Bua.
14.16: mwavj ninb Bua trug waag uaq teij myenb xij zu'g vxg Naavj Zauj Ru'g Daauq, zyrug zu'g zxi kwavg yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub pyopq ninb Bua, lyemb ninb Bua kanb, ninb Bua Eei auq Zauj ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud. weig zu'g yia xij zx'q ninb Bua zruj x'q Eei Jauq toj Fiag winb pun ninb Bua.
14.4: laaij maiq maaib Byuvg Fiag Daub peib, Dau Gaai, Rc'q, zruj Deig Eei myenb Eaiq, pwav Jyenq mGxvq.
14.10: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj naaiq teij pc'g fivj. “ninb Bua a'Neiq Navq naaiq yrub Jyenq mivb, maiq zruj haiq Euvg pun ninb Bua Eei zauj tivb. weig naaiq zyruq maiq a'Neiq ninb Bua, ib zang ninb xij Javj ninb Bua Eei zwib nipg, yaag tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid.”
14.22: yem maang kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj maaib haiq taub Jaaq Eei zyenb haib pun luvb twib Byuvg? luvb kanb haib zruj pun Byuvg Fiag fai?   zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb aa'b! se tovb meib zruj. Navq naaig yia Bua maaib lamb Namq Eei se yem meib, weig zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq se meib zruj Eei.
14.12: maiq kunq ninb Bua zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg, yia maiq mwavj ninb Bua heug Jyenq Toq Eei Qiaj. maiq kunq ninb Bua fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag Eei laavb zi'g, yia maiq zipq ninb Bua. yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, yaag zu'g wrnb pcvg myetg ninb Bua.”
14.15: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq tevq yia Eei Buaj trug waag maiq kunq yia maiq heug ninb Bua uaq teij trug waag myenb. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘Ru'g Daauq Zauj vxg Naavj Eei Jauq zuvq maiq Tauj naaiq nxm teib puv.’ naaiq teij trug waag myenb zuvq xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq Zauj vxg Naavj Eei Jauq myetg Revg.
14.13: yia zyrug kxvq, “aa, zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! uaq teij trug waag myenb Buaj ninb Bua, ‘meib Bua zuvq maiq pwatg Ru'g Daauq yaag maiq pwavb zu'g vxg Naavj. yia Navq haaij xij pun meib Bua yem naaiq nxm txvj tu'q pcvb xn.’+”
14.1: naaiq se ye-le-mi cvj zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq Tauj luvb haand Eei sig. zyruq kxvq,

48.18: “Di-Bon myenb aa'b! yem meib Favb laavg Eei txvj Fiag taaib maa'b! zweid Jyenq Bxvj Gaai Eei Dau. weig zu'g myetg mo-apg uaq taub taaib Bx'q meib a'q. ninb zuvq paaig waaig meib weib wrnq Eei txvj.
48.45: “pyauj Eei myenb mivb sruq Jyenq Navq maiq maaib Qa'q nx, yem hetq-Bon zivb Eei tovb linb ka'Diaq. weig zu'g maaib trud yem hetq-Bon Zwrtq, si-honj Eei ting Zwrtq trub Byetg, puaq waaig mo-apg Eei pyxvb Zauj Zeuj lung myenb Eei mGxvb pcvb.
48.3: mwavj maa'b! maaib heug Eei Qiaj yem ho-lo-naa-im taaib kxvq, ‘zu'g tomb paaig Waav paaig waaig a'q lo'b!’
48.43: zyruq kxvq, “mo-apg myenb aa'b! kamb Riaj Eei sig Zauj Duaq myenb Dxtq Eei Kwrtq Zauj Lopq myenb Eei Laav yem meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen.”
48.14: “meib Bua Navq haiq nx haib kxvq, ‘yia Bua zruj Junb zeiq myenb yaag zruj Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv’?
48.34: “hetq-Bon myenb Zauj e-le-aa-le myenb heug Zwrtq, heug Eei Qiaj zuvq mivb Tauj yaa-haatq, yaag cvq mivb Tauj soj-aa, Tauj ho-lo-naa-im Zauj ekg-latq-se-li-si-yaa, weig zu'g lyemb nim-lim Eei uam Gaai Revg.”
48.2: yem naaiq mivb maiq maaib myenb Zev mo-apg, yem hetq-Bon ninb Bua taaq za'eij hxig ninb, yaag kxvq, ‘taaib maa'b! Bua zx'q ninb Pai kwavg, maiq pun penj kua'q.’ matq-men muvq aa'b! meib yaag xij zu'g sekq Ria'g, Ru'g Daauq zuvq xij zung meib.
48.36: Navq naaig yia Eei Hruq weig mo-apg myenb Funb Eei Qiaj Navq Laub Dovb nuj. yia Eei Hruq yaag weig Kin-haa-le-setq myenb Funb Navq Laub Dovb nuj. ninb Bua tu'q Eei zinb zxib yaag zu'g myetg Revg.
48.35: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij pun mo-apg teib puv, yem Lav Eei txvj fovg hxg ziag yaag puaq huv pun ninb Bua Eei zyenb uaq teij zutg mig a'q.
48.24: Zauj Ke-li-otg Zauj Bo-saa-laa Zauj mo-apg teig Eei nxmb nxm zivb maiq kunq ko fai fatq.
48.7: weig zu'g meib Kauj kanb weib wrnq Eei txvj Zauj kanb Eei zinb zxib, meib kanb yaag xij zu'g zx'q. Ke-motq zyenb xij zu'g kwaatq mivb, Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei sai myenb Zauj Jyen.
48.17: ta'faanb weib kxmj ninb, yaag hiuq tu'q ninb Eei mevb Eei yetg zuvq myenb meib Bua xij zu'g weig ninb Hruq mun. xij zu'q kxvq, ‘maaib Qa'q Eei uaq tiub huvb pyaaq nauq mig a'q, se uaq tiub Favb laavg Eei pyaaq.’
48.11: “yem mo-apg lunj Eei zyavb hog Tauj ib zang Kub yem Eei, Navq tiuq zevg Fiag Eei tiub zaa. ninb maiq zeid zu'g yem naaiq nxm pcvb toj Fiag uaq nxm, ninb yaag maiq zu'g kwaatq mivb. weig naaiq ninb Eei mweij Zxg yem Eei, ninb Daav Eei Qiaj yaag maiq kxiq yeng.”
48.33: yem mo-apg Eei Daub Jung, Fyenb yrub xnb lx'g Eei Qiaj zu'g zx'q mig a'q. yia pun Eweib a'vung tiuq Eei zxvb maiq maaib tiuq lyrug Zwrtq. maiq maaib haiq taub Fyenb yrub Eei Eweib a'vung pyruq. heug Eei Qiaj maiq zeid Fyenb yrub Eei heug.
48.16: mo-apg zu'g ze'g naang Eei zyavb hog Tauj fatq a'q. ninb zu'g Eei Kruq naang xij syepg syepq Eei Tauj.
48.40: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “maaib taub Navq tomb Jaavq nx, Daij taaib syepq Eei, zyrug yav Gxi Daatq Bx'q mo-apg.
48.37: taub taub myenb Eei mGxvq Teij Fav, taub taub Eei syaam yaag Japq Revg, yetg zuvq puad maaib kaatq mun Eei txvj, Jaaiq yaag sai Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru.
48.4: mo-apg zu'g myetg mig a'q! maaib Eyemq Eei Qiaj Tauj soj-aa.
48.12: zyruq kxvq, “weig naaiq Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia zyrug Paaiq toj Eei myenb mivb toj ninb, toj Zwrtq ninb zaavb Eei ka'naaiq, cvj Bx'q ninb Eei pcvb huq mwrng.
48.46: mo-apg aa'b! meib zu'g Kruq a'q. paaij Ke-motq zyenb Eei myenb zu'g myetg mig a'q. weig zu'g meib Eei txn Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb, meib Eei sia'q yaag zu'g kwaatq mivb mig a'q.
48.13: mo-apg myenb zyrug weig Ke-motq zyenb Eaiq Navq zinb Daavg i-saa-laa-en myenb Kauj Betg-en zyenb zyrug zu'g Eaiq mig a'q.
48.26: “xij zu'g pun mo-apg tiuq Gwin, weig zu'g ninb Zevb Lo vcvg zyruq. ninb zyrug Favj Jyenq ninb loq Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq. ninb yaag zu'g myenb Wrtq.
48.28: mo-apg Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! meib Bua xij zu'g pyauj Zwrtq zivb mivb yem la'pyeib Bcvj. xij zu'g Navq pc'g kopq zruj laud yem Bcvb Kwrtq Eei Rwib.
48.8: zruj myetg uaq taub xij Tauj nxmb nxm zivb, maiq maaib yetg nxm zivb pyauj tu'q Dutq. hxvd yaag xij zu'g myetg, Daub pcvb yaag zu'g paaig waaig, Navq zyruq kxvq nx.
48.9: zx'q Daatq pun mo-apg, weig zu'g ninb xij Daij mivb, ninb Eei zivb xij zu'g penj paaig Waav Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb yem.
48.32: sipg-maa Eei a'vung Mei aa'b! yia weig meib Eyemq kaub Zamq weig yaa-se Eyemq. meib Eei Gwaab Zunq Jiaj Kxiq, cvj Daauq mivb Tauj yaa-se Eei Kxiq. zruj myetg uaq taub taaib Bx'q meib Eei Gaai kxv pyruq Zauj syru taaib Eei a'vung pyruq.
48.21: Daub pcvb Eei txvj zu'g tivg zwid. maaib ho-lon Zauj yaa-saa Zauj me-faa-aatg
48.23: Zauj Ki-li-yaa-Taa-im Zauj Betg-kaa-mun Zauj Betg-me-on
48.6: pyauj maa'b! Fruj meib Bua kanb Eei mcvg. xij zu'g zruj Navq Yiab lxb yem teib puvb Waav.
48.44: “haiq taub pyauj kamb Riaj Eei sig zyrug Dxtq Kwrtq, haiq taub Exv Zwrtq Kwrtq zyrug zu'g Laav Lopq, weig zu'g mo-apg zu'g tivg zwid uaq Havj, yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g naaiq teij sig.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
48.20: mo-apg zu'g Eaiq weig zu'g ninb Baaij mig a'q. xij zu'g Eyemq yaag heug Bwi. yem uaq aan-non Daaib Len zunb kxvq, mo-apg zu'g paaig Waav mig a'q.
48.5: myenb faauj lu-hitg Eei zxv, ninb Bua yetg ping mivb, yetg ping Eyemq, weig zu'g yem ho-lo-naa-im Fiag Jiaj Eei txvj haid laaij zu'g paaig waaig Eyemq Kruq Eei Qiaj.
48.19: aa-lo-e myenb aa'b! sruq Jyenq Jaub Len mavg maa'b! naaig pyauj taaib Eei mJavg txn, Zauj pyauj Dutq Eei msia'q txn, ‘maaib haiq Euvg sig Zwrtq?’
48.38: yem mo-apg Eei nxmb nxm pyaub vxb kub vwaaig Zauj yetg zuvq tomb zwavj zaamg Kuvj maaib Raub Eyemq Eei Qiaj, weig zu'g yia Bx'q mo-apg huq, Navq Bx'q huq maiq maaib myenb xij Eei Jaab txvj.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
48.31: weig naaiq yia weig mo-apg Eyemq, weig yetg zuvq mo-apg teib puv yia heug Zwrtq. yia yaag weig Kin-haa-le-setq myenb Raub Eyemq.
48.27: mo-apg aa'b! meib maiq zeid Jyetq i-saa-laa-en fai? meib pwatg ninb yem Janb za'g Bu'Dovj Zivj taaib haiq zang kxvq Tauj ninb meib Wavj mGxvq fai?
48.41: zivb xij zu'g zx'q, weib wrnq Eei txvj yaag zu'g Zaavq. Tauj uaq Nxi mo-apg Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv Eei Hruq, Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad nx.
48.1: naaiq kxvq Tauj mo-apg. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “ne-Bo zu'g Kruq a'q, laaij zu'g paaig Waav mig a'q. Ki-li-yaa-Taa-im yaag zu'g Eaiq, zu'g zx'q mig a'q. weib wrnq Eei txvj zu'g Eaiq yaag paaig waaig mig a'q.
48.39: “mo-apg za'kevb huq a'q! ninb Bua za'kevb Raub Eyemq a'q! mo-apg Eaiq haig zyrug Win Gaav mig a'q. Navq naaig mo-apg zu'g weib kxmj Eei myenb Jyetq yaag kamb Riaj.”
48.47: mq paag Tauj setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g yia cvj xij pun mo-apg tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq. mo-apg zu'g tivg zwid Eei waag txv naaiq a'q.
48.10: lweig maiq zruj zyruq Eei kov uaq taub zu'g zyruj a'q. maiq lovg Ru'g Daauq pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq uaq taub zu'g zyruj a'q.
48.25: mo-apg teig Eei Qa'q paag mig a'q. ninb Eei puad yaag nauq mig a'q.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
48.22: Zauj Di-Bon Zauj ne-Bo Zauj Betg-Dipg-laa-Taa-im
48.42: mo-apg zyrug zu'g paaig mig a'q, maiq tu'q cvj penj kua'q, weig zu'g ninb Zevb Lo vcvg zyruq.”
48.15: zruj waaig mo-apg Zauj mo-apg Eei zivb uaq taub faauj taaib, kinq taaib kaub lovj Jiaj Eei myenb lunj myenb Fiag mivb zu'g taij taig.” naaiq se huvb tiaj, tovb maaib Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, kxvq Eei waag.
48.29: “yia Bua haid kxvq mo-apg myenb mauj, se za'kevb mauj haig. yia Bua haid kxvq ninb puvj waab mauj, Zevb Lo, mauj haig, Hruq yaag Taaib kanb.”
48.30: zyruq kxvq, “yia hiuq tu'q ninb Zevb Lo Eei Jauq, ninb puvj waab mauj mq paag Jaaq Eei, ninb zruj Eei sig yaag maiq zyen.

34.19: yu-Daa Eei Jyen, ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jyen, Zauj im toq Eei myenb, sai myenb, Zauj teib puv Eei zwavj pc'g fivj, tovb yavb Pi'q zruj i mcvj uaq taub vovb txn Bu'Dovj Jiaj Zauj yia lyepg Jiad vcvg waag. mq paag ninb Bua txvg yia Eei vcvg waag, maiq ei uaq teij vcvg waag zruj. yia zyrug xij zruj pun ninb Bua Navq ninb Bua zruj pun uaq taub vovb txn nx.
34.3: meib pyauj maiq Dutq ninb Eei puad, zuvq zu'g zx'q Jiu pun yem ninb Eei puab Diaq. meib tu'q pwatg Baa-Bi-lon huvb mziv txij mziv, yaag tu'q Zauj ninb Myen txij Myen kxvq waag. meib yaag xij zu'g mivb Baa-Bi-lon.”
34.8: sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei zwavj pc'g fivj lyepg vcvg waag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua zunb puvj Gxi Eei leid kxvq,
34.21: “+‘yu-Daa Eei huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, Zauj ninb Eei Jyen yia xij Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Eei puab Diaq Zauj lxd ninb Bua Eei mcvg uaq teij Eei puab Diaq, yaag Jiu pun Twij leib Gxi ninb Bua mivb uaq teij Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Junb pcv Eei puab Diaq.’
34.9: kx'g myenb xij zu'g puvj Gxi kx'g myenb Eei hipq-lu nrub maiq kunq mJavg msia'q, weig pun ninb Bua maiq lovg haiq taub yiu-Tai myenb kxb yrud zruj nrub.
34.22: zyruq kxvq, ‘yia xij hatg ninb Bua, txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib Tauj naaiq nxm zivb. ninb Bua xij Bx'q naaiq nxm zivb yaag Zaavq tu'q zyrug lovg trud puaq Qwi. yia xij pun yu-Daa Eei zivb penj paaig Waav Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb yem.”
34.7: uaq zang Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Junb pcv Bx'q Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem yaag Bx'q yu-Daa zevg Fiag Eei yetg zuvq zivb, se laa-Kitq zivb Zauj aa-se-Kaa zivb, weig zu'g yem yu-Daa Kuvj zevg naaiq teij i nxm weib wrnq Eei zivb Navq.
34.5: meib tu'q pcvb xn Eei kwei seij. myenb Navq haiq nx weig Taaib meib Eei ovb Taaij puaq Daav Eei ka'naaiq, se weig yem Daavg meib uaq teij huvb tiaj, ninb Bua xij Navq uaq nx weig meib puaq Daav Eei ka'naaiq yaag weig meib Raub Eyemq kxvq, ‘zyruq aa'b! Kruq a'q.’ weig zu'g yia kxvq liud naaiq teij waag a'q.”+’+” zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
34.16: mq paag meib Bua cvj Byenq Hruq pun yia Eei Buaj maaib wij weig zu'g meib Bua zx'q meib Bua Eei nrub kauq nrub peid Rwrnj taaib, tovb meib Bua ziuj ninb Bua Eei Hruq xij Eei puvj Gxi uaq teij, cvj zu'g meib Bua aapq zruj nrub.’
34.20: yia xij zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Eei puab Diaq yaag Jiu pun yem lxd ninb Bua Eei mcvg uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq. ninb Bua Eei sei zyrug penj Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Zauj Daub peib Eei Yiab zxib Eei Eang hopq.
34.17: “weig naaiq, zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua maiq mwavj yia weig zu'g meib Bua kx'g myenb maiq zunb puvj Gxi Eei leid pun kanb Eei kxb yrud Zauj Jwavg laavd myenb. mavg maa'b! yia zunb Buaj meib Bua, “meib Bua tu'q puvj Gxi” weig pun meib Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg. yia cvj pun meib Bua weig luvb Diaq maang kua'q penj hc'q myenb kamb Riaj Eei ka'naaiq.
34.14: “Tauj ta'Zyetq Havj kx'g myenb xij zu'g puvj zu'g maaig pun meib lovg zruj nrub Eei Jwavg hipq-lu fivj Eei myenb, tovb fub suj meib Ju'q Havj Eei myenb.” mq paag meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij maiq mwavj yia yaag maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj yia.
34.4: “+‘mq paag yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa aa'b! mwavj zyruq Eei waag. zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj meib, “meib maiq zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
34.2: “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib xij zu'g mivb Zauj yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, kxvq yaag kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, mavg maa'b! yia zx'q naaiq nxm zivb Jiu yem Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei puab Diaq. ninb yaag xij lovg trud puaq.
34.6: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, zyrug yem ye-lu-saa-lem zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag kxvq Buaj yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa.
34.13: “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia txb meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv zu'g zruj nrub Eei txvj uaq zang, yia Zauj ninb Bua lyepg vcvg waag kxvq,
34.12: ye-le-mi cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
34.15: Jiaj taaib maiq laub meib Bua kxiq Hruq zruj ziuj yia Eei mziv mavg pwatg hxpg Eei, weig zu'g meib Bua zunb kxvq puvj Gxi Eei leid, kx'g myenb Buaj kx'g myenb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb. meib Bua yem tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug uaq nxm pyauq, txv Jyenq yia lyepg Jiad vcvg waag.
34.11: mq paag Ga'haaq ninb Bua Namb Rwrnj cvj zx'q tovb ninb Bua puvj Gxi uaq teij nrub kauq nrub peid Rwrnj, pun naaiq teij myenb cvj zu'g ninb Bua aapq zruj nrub.”
34.1: Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv, Zauj yem luvb Diaq ninb kunq Eei nxmb nxm kua'q Zauj fivb fivj myenb Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj weib kxmj Eei nxmb nxm zivb uaq zang, ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
34.10: ninb Bua zyrug mwavj, lyemb yetg zuvq Jyen Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj, ta'faanb Jwavg lyepg vcvg waag lcvd kanb xij puvj kanb Eei nrub, lyemb nrub kauq nrub peid, weig pun ninb Bua maiq zu'g cvj zruj nrub a'q. ninb Bua zyrug ei Jyenq zruj, puvj ninb Bua Eei nrub Zwrtq.

2.18: ib zang meib mivb i-yipq teib puv weig tu'q haiq Euvg? se weig hopq nai-aa Daaib Eei uam? fai meib mivb atg-si-lia teib puv weig tu'q haiq Euvg? weig xij hopq yu-fe-titg Daaib Eei uam fai?
2.8: sai myenb zuvq maiq naaig, ‘zyruq yem haaij?’ Faauj leid uaq teij maiq hiuq tu'q yia. zruj Lo Eei myenb vcvg Jyenq yia, trug waag myenb Kauj Baa-an zyenb trug waag, yaag kan Tevj maiq tu'q haiq Euvg Eei ka'naaiq.”
2.33: meib za'kevb haib taaq za'eij lxd myenb Namq, zuvq Faauj waaig Eei msia'q txn hiuq tu'q meib Eei za'eij.
2.3: i-saa-laa-en penj zyruq Eei Zivb Revg Eei pwrng, penj ninb syru taaib Eei taaub Txvj pyruq. haiq taub Eang zyrug txvg zwid, yaag zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.’+” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
2.32: sia'q haib la'Ku'q ninb Eei syrub setq fai? fai syavb Bwavd haib la'Ku'q ninb zxv sin Eei ka'naaiq? mq paag yia Eei pc'g fivj la'Ku'q yia Eei Nxi zuvq saauq maiq hivb.
2.21: yia zwavj meib penj kaub lovj Jiaj Eei a'vung Mei, penj zyen pwrnq Revg. uaq Euvg meib Navq haiq nx kunq zruj kunq waaig, penj Yiab a'vung Mei.
2.35: meib kxvq, ‘yia maiq zruj txvg haiq Euvg. Tinb huvb ka'Qiaj fiu mig a'q. maiq Qiaj Jiad yia a'q.’ mavg maa'b! yia zuvq xij pun meib zu'g syemq zwid, weig zu'g meib kxvq, ‘yia maiq paamd zwid.’
2.14: i-saa-laa-en penj nrub fai? se yem pyauq Zwrtq seij Eei pru fai? uaq Euvg ninb weig haiq tiug penj Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq?
2.23: “meib Navq haiq nx haib kxvq, ‘yia maiq maaib wij, yia maiq kan Baa-an zyenb’? mavg meib yem hxvd zavg Eei Jauq maa'b! meib zyrug hiuq tu'q meib zruj haiq Euvg. meib Navq taub lxb Txb zeig Tiuj Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq,
2.6: ninb Bua maiq kxvq, ‘zyruq yem haaij, tovb txb yia Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, yend yia Bua Jiaj teib puvb Waav, maaib Daub Waav, Kwrtq Do Eei teib puv, se teib puvb haand, mapq Mwavj Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb Jiaj, maiq maaib haiq taub myenb yem Eei teib puv?’
2.34: meib Eei lwib Jua'q pwatg kua'q Jyenq maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb Jomg myenb Eei Ryaamq. meib yaag maiq zeid pwatg ninb Bua pxvd pia'g meib Eei pyauq. maiq kunq maaib naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig,
2.2: “meib xij zu'g mivb zunb pun yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb mwavj haid naaiq teij waag. ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘yia Javj tu'q meib Havb Jeiq lunj Eei zyavb hog meib Dovg haaij Namq yia, zruj syavb Bwavd uaq zang meib Namq haig yia, meib yaag kan yia Jiaj teib puvb Waav, Jiaj maiq zwavj Jiaj ka'naaiq Eei teib puv.
2.36: meib huvb heg saau mivb saau taaib Tiuq meib Eei Jauq. meib zuvq xij zu'g i-yipq myenb pun meib Eaiq Navq zinb Daavg atg-si-lia myenb pun meib Eaiq nx.
2.20: “zinb Daavg lob Nxi meib wrtq meib Eei Dyavb kaad nauq, yaag Zutq Dutq Dob meib Eei Laav. meib yaag kxvq, ‘yia maiq fub suj meib a'q.’ meib zuvq yem nxmb nxm Bovb Lav, Zauj tiub tiub Dyavb Eyemd ka'Diaq, kweig Fiag paaij zyenb.
2.24: Navq Yiab lxb Eeid kwenj yem teib puvb Waav scv haig zyrug Nomq Ryaauj. ninb Dovg naaig xij, haiq taub haib laanb tu'q ninb? haiq taub lxd ninb, maiq zu'g lxd Kruq. txij ninb scv Eei Nxib Eia'g ninb Bua haib lxd pwatg a'q.
2.28: mq paag meib weig kanb zruj taaib Eei zyenb yem haaij? sij kxvq ninb Bua haib Fruj meib, meib pwavb zu'g Kruq naang Eei zyavb hog heug ninb Bua Jiad taaib maa'b! yu-Daa aa'b! meib Eei zivb Bu'ziaj, meib Eei zyenb Bua'g uaq.
2.7: yia txb meib Bua pia'g nxm Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv, pun meib Bua a'Neiq Eang teib puv Eei pyruq Zauj Zwrtq taaib lovj Eei ka'naaiq. mq paag meib Bua pia'g taaib uaq zang meib Bua pun yia Eei teib puv maaib wij, yaag pun yia Ripg Eei pwrng penj kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq.
2.29: “meib Bua weig haiq tiug vopq yia? meib Bua yetg zuvq vcvg Jyenq yia.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
2.19: meib zruj Eei x'q sig xij Bx'q Faauj meib, meib vcvg Jyenq tod xij koj meib. meib xij zu'g hiuq, xij zu'g pwatg, meib kwavg zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, penj x'q sig Zauj im Eei sig. meib yaag maiq maaib Hruq Taaib yia.” nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.
2.17: meib zu'g naaiq teij sig se laaij meib kanb maiq zeid? weig zu'g zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, txb meib kan Jauq mivb uaq zang, meib kwavg ninb.
2.31: “meib Bua naaiq txig myenb aa'b! mwavj lovj zyruq Eei waag maa'b! “yia weig i-saa-laa-en penj teib puvb Waav, fai Navq mapq Mwavj Eei teib puv fai? uaq Euvg yia Eei pc'g fivj weig haiq tiug kxvq, ‘yia Bua zruj puvj Gxi Eei myenb, yia Bua maiq cvj taaib lxd meib a'q’?
2.30: yia Bx'q meib Bua Eei naamb Erud, ninb Bua yaag maiq mwavj yia Faauj. meib Bua kanb Eei Ru'g Daauq myetg meib Bua Eei trug waag myenb Navq syenb nx, xij zruj myetg.
2.27: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj Dyavj, ‘meib zruj yia Eei tia,’ cvj kxvq Buaj la'pyeiq, ‘meib yuvd yia taaib.’ ninb Bua Win ti'g taand pun yia, maiq Win Myen, mq paag pwavb zu'g Kruq naang Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua kxvq, ‘Jiad taaib Fruj yia Bua maa'b!’
2.11: maaib haiq nxm kua'q Eei myenb Tiuq Jiaj ninb Bua Eei zyenb fai? maiq kunq naaiq teij zyenb se maiq zyen. mq paag yia Eei pc'g fivj zx'q ninb Bua Eei Favb laavg yeng Tevj maiq tu'q haiq Euvg Eei ka'naaiq.
2.5: “meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij pwatg yia txvg haiq Euvg ninb Bua Zivj taaib leib ko yia? ninb Bua mivb kan maiq lamb lovg Eei ka'naaiq, ninb Bua kanb zyrug maiq lamb lovg a'q
2.9: zyruq kxvq, “weig naaiq yia cvj Zauj meib Bua Rcv, yaag xij Zauj meib Bua Eei zeib fun Rcv.
2.16: maiq taan Bua'g naaiq, mem-fitq myenb Zauj Taa-paan-hetg myenb Bx'q meib Eei mGxvb pcvb Baaij.
2.37: meib yaag xij lovg puad pwav Jyenq mGxvq yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib, weig zu'g zyruq Gemb meib Kauj uaq teij, meib maiq haib pavg ninb Bua tu'q lovj Jyenq faauj.
2.4: yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun aa'b! i-saa-laa-en zeib fun Eei fivb fivj myenb aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag.   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq,
2.10: meib Bua kunq mivb Tauj sai-patgKxib Rru mavg kaaj, fai Paaiq myenb mivb Ke-Daa zaab mavg lovj, mavg kaaj maaib Jiaj naaiq Euvg sig fai?
2.22: maiq kunq meib lovg Riab uam Raauj yaag lovg sa'Bu Zamq, kua'q meib uaq teij zruj txvg Eei zwid Zxg yem yia Eei Ra'Myen hing Zwrtq Eei.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
2.12: zwavj luvb aa'b! xij zu'g kamb Riaj haig, zu'g hc'q Eanb Eanb Eei.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
2.15: syenb Funb ninb, Funb tu'q Bwi Eei, ninb Bua pun ninb Eei teib puv penj Daub Waav, ninb Eei zivb zu'g paaig waaig, maiq maaib haiq taub yem.
2.13: “weig zu'g yia Eei pc'g fivj zruj i Euvg x'q sig. ninb Bua kwavg yia, se kwavg uamb taaib Eei zivq, yaag weig kanb zu'g Zwrtq syru uam Eei Kwrtq, penj Baaij Eei syru uam txvj, maiq haib syru maiq tu'q uam.
2.1: yia zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
2.26: “Navq Janb za'g zu'g zx'q taaib zyrug paaig Myen, i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Navq uaq nx xij zu'g paaig Myen, se ninb Bua kanb, ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj, ninb Bua zruj Lo Eei myenb, ninb Bua Eei sai myenb Zauj ninb Bua Eei trug waag myenb.
2.25: maiq tuvq zung Tauj zauj huq, yaag maiq tuvq pun meib Eei Jaav Gaatq. mq paag meib kxvq, ‘maiq lamb Namq a'q. yia Namq Eiag Eei zyenb. yia xij mivb kan ninb Bua.’

36.18: Baa-lukq tau, “ninb kxvq Jyenq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag, yia lovg matg uam fiaq Jyenq naaiq Fung sru.”
36.8: ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq, ziuj trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, Paaiq Eei waag, yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq to'g fiaq Jyenq zyruq Eei waag uaq Fung sru.
36.3: Riaj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun mwavj haid yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Eei yetg zuvq Zyruq Eei ze'g naang, weig pun taub taub kwavg ninb Bua zruj x'q Eei Jauq, yia zyrug haib kwavg ninb Bua zruj txvg Eei zwid Zauj paamd Eei zwib nipg.”
36.32: ye-le-mi zyrug cvj zx'q Fung sru pun ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq srub piuq. Baa-lukq zyrug fiaq Jyenq ziuj ye-le-mi kxvq yu-Daa huvb, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, puaq Eei ta'yetq Fung sru Eei yetg zuvq waag. ninb cvj Tipq waag fib Navq Zamq teij Eei.
36.21: huvb tiaj Paaiq ye-hu-Di mivb txb uaq Fung sru taaib. ninb zyrug mivb e-li-saa-maa srub piuq uaq Qovj pyauq zx'q srub Fung taaib. ye-hu-Di zyrug to'g pun huvb tiaj Zauj sruq huvb tiaj ka'Len Eei zwavj Jyen mwavj.
36.14: weig naaiq zwavj Jyen zyrug Paaiq Ku-si Eei fa'q, se-le-mi-yaa Eei fun, ne-Taa-ni-yaa Eei txn, ye-hu-Di, mivb kxvq Buaj Baa-lukq, “Toq nanq Jyenq meib to'g pun pc'g fivj mwavj Eei srub Fung txb taaib.” ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq, zyrug nanq Jyenq uaq Fung sru mivb ninb Bua uaq.
36.23: ye-hu-Di to'g liud pua pyei trug, huvb tiaj lovg Ru'g txn kaatq Dutq kwcvj pia'g trub Raug ka'Euad. ninb Navq naaig zruj Jyenq mivb Tauj yetg zuvq srub Fung zu'g yem trub Raug ka'Euad Eei trud puaq Qwi Revg.
36.6: Navq naaig meib xij zu'g mivb. zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg Eei Nxi meib xij zu'g zx'q tovb meib ziuj yia kxvq Eei waag fiaq Jyenq srub Fung to'g pun yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei zwavj myenb mwavj. meib yaag xij zu'g to'g pun yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zwrtq taaib Eei yetg zuvq myenb mwavj.
36.2: “meib zx'q Fung sru fiaq Jyenq yia kxvq i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa Zauj maang kua'q myenb Buaj meib Eei yetg zuvq waag, yem yia Zauj meib kxvq waag uaq Nxi, se yem yo-si-yaa Eei Nxib Eia'g, Tauj ib Nxi.
36.20: ninb Bua zx'q srub Fung an Jyenq e-li-saa-maa srub piuq uaq Qovj pyauq zyrug mivb Tauj huvb tiaj Eei Tiv. ninb Bua yaag kxvq Revg naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag Buaj huvb tiaj.
36.24: mq paag lyemb huvb tiaj fai ninb Eei haiq taub Jyen, tovb haid liud uaq teij yetg zuvq waag Eei myenb, maiq kamb Riaj. ninb Bua yaag maiq petq ninb Bua Eei lwib hruj.
36.28: “meib cvj kanb zx'q Fung sru fiaq Jyenq yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, puaq ta'yetq Fung sru Eei yetg zuvq waag.
36.7: Riaj ninb Bua Toq Eei waag haib mivb tu'q Tauj zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, kx'g myenb yaag leib Gxi kx'g myenb zruj x'q Eei Jauq, weig zu'g zyruq za'kevb! Qiaj Jiad, nrud Jyenq kxvq naaiq teij pc'g fivj.”
36.29: meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib puaq naaiq Fung sru yaag kxvq, ‘meib weig haiq tiug fiaq Jyenq uaq Fung sru kxvq Baa-Bi-lon huvb Dovg haaij zuvq xij taaib myetg naaiq nxm teib puv, pun yem naaiq nxm teib puv Eei myenb Zauj scvb Kuq zutg Revg?’+”
36.19: uaq teij Jyen zyrug Buaj Baa-lukq, “meib Zauj ye-le-mi xij zu'g mivb pivj Jyenq. maiq tuvq pun haiq taub hiuq tu'q meib Bua yem haaij.”
36.17: ninb Bua naaig Baa-lukq, “Buaj yia Bua, meib Navq haiq nx tu'q fiaq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag? ye-le-mi kxvq pun meib fiaq fai?”
36.31: yia yaag xij tivg ninb Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Eei zwid weig ninb Bua Eei zwib nipg. yia xij pun ninb Bua yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj Zauj yu-Daa myenb zu'g tovb yia kxvq xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Eei yetg zuvq Zyruq Eei ze'g naang. mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj.’+”
36.30: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq Tauj yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, “ninb maiq maaib yetg taub hod txig zeib fun zweid Daa-witq Eei weig. ninb kanb Eei sei yaag xij zu'g zxi kwavg, luvb Nxi zang zu'g Eutg Pwi, luvb mwrnd zang zu'g sxv kitq.
36.27: huvb tiaj puaq liud Baa-lukq ziuj ye-le-mi kxvq Eei waag fiaq Eei srub Fung, ye-le-mi cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
36.11: saa-faan Eei fun, ke-maa-li-yaa Eei txn, mi-Kaa-yaa, mwavj haid uaq Fung sru, zyruq Eei yetg zuvq waag uaq zang,
36.5: ye-le-mi zyrug Paaiq Baa-lukq. ninb kxvq, “yia zu'g laanb Jyenq, maiq tu'q pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.
36.9: yo-si-yaa Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb ta'Mmd Havj Juaq Laaj, yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj pc'g fivj Zauj yem yu-Daa Eei zivb taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj pc'g fivj zunb kxvq, xij zu'g yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg.
36.16: ninb Bua mwavj haid naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag, ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig, laanb mavg laanb. ninb Bua kxvq Buaj Baa-lukq, “yia Bua xij zu'g txb naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag mivb Buaj huvb tiaj.”
36.4: ye-le-mi zyrug heug ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq, taaib. Baa-lukq zyrug ziuj ye-le-mi kxvq zyruq Buaj ninb Eei yetg zuvq waag fiaq Jyenq srub Fung.
36.10: Baa-lukq zyrug yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, saa-faan Eei txn, ke-maa-li-yaa srub piuq Eei uaq Qovj pyauq, se yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad uaq Jiaj puv, syavb kcvb Eei kcvb Daavg, to'g fiaq Jyenq ye-le-mi Eei waag uaq Fung sru, pun zwavj pc'g fivj mwavj.
36.22: uaq zang txij zu'g Juaq Laaj. huvb tiaj zweid Jyenq Jiaj tovb ken Eei pyauq ka'Euad, yaag maaib trub lrub Eei trud zia'g Jyenq yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen.
36.12: ninb zyrug mivb Tauj huvb ting pia'g srub piuq uaq Qovj, yaag maaib zwavj Jyen zweid Jyenq naaig. maaib e-li-saa-maa srub piuq, maaib se-mai-aa Eei txn, De-lai-yaa, maaib akg-Bo Eei txn, en-naa-Tan, maaib saa-faan Eei txn, ke-maa-li-yaa, maaib haa-nan-yaa Eei txn, sej-De-Ki-yaa, Zauj yetg zuvq Jyen.
36.15: ninb Bua zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “Toq zweid Fiag to'g pun yia Bua mwavj og.” Baa-lukq zyrug to'g pun ninb Bua mwavj.
36.13: mi-Kaa-yaa zyrug kxvq Revg ninb haid Baa-lukq to'g uaq Fung sru pun pc'g fivj mwavj Eei yetg zuvq waag Buaj ninb Bua.
36.1: yu-Daa Eei huvb, yo-si-yaa, Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, zruj huvb ta'feij Havj uaq Havj, ye-le-mi zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
36.26: huvb tiaj zyrug Paaiq ninb Eei txn, ye-laa-me-en, Zauj atg-li-en Eei txn, sej-lai-aa, Zauj apg-De-en Eei txn, se-le-mi-yaa, mivb zx'q Baa-lukq srub piuq Zauj trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi. mq paag zyruq zx'q ninb Bua pivj mig a'q.
36.25: maiq kunq en-naa-Tan Zauj De-lai-yaa Zauj ke-maa-li-yaa Qa'q Toq huvb tiaj maiq tuvq puaq srub Fung, huvb tiaj maiq mwavj.

35.18: ye-le-mi zyrug kxvq Buaj le-Kaapq uaq puvb myenb, “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “weig zu'g meib Bua mwavj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij, yo-naa-Dapg, Eei waag, yaag ei Jyenq ninb kxvq Eei yetg zuvq livg, yaag ei Jyenq ninb hatg Eei yetg zuvq waag zruj,”
35.3: yia zyrug txb haa-Baa-sin-yaa Eei fun, ye-le-mi Eei txn, yaa-aa-san-yaa, Zauj ninb Eei muab txig Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq txn taaib Zauj le-Kaapq Eei yetg puvb myenb.
35.8: yia Bua mwavj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij, le-Kaapq Eei txn, yo-naa-Dapg, hatg yia Bua Eei yetg zuvq waag. se yetg seij maiq tuvq hopq a'vung tiuq, lyemb yia Bua kanb, yia Bua Eei auq Zauj yia Bua Eei naamb Erud.
35.19: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “weig naaiq le-Kaapq Eei txn, yo-naa-Dapg, yetg liud maiq tavj Eei maaib mJavg myenb fub suj yia.”+’+”
35.9: yia Bua yaag maiq komq pyauq yem. yia Bua maiq maaib a'vung Wivj fai livb teig fai ka'naaib Eim.
35.7: yaag maiq tuvq komq pyauq, maiq tuvq zwavj ka'naaiq fai zruj a'vung Wivj. meib Bua xij zu'g yetg seij yem Dopg liub pun meib Bua Eei Nxib Eia'g yem meib Bua tivb zepq Eei teib puv zyavb Daauq.’
35.5: yia zyrug zx'q tapq Jyenq a'vung tiuq Eei pcvb Zauj zaanq an Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “hopq a'vung tiuq og.”
35.16: le-Kaapq Eei txn, yo-naa-Dapg, Eei zeib fun ei Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij hatg Eei waag, mq paag naaiq teij pc'g fivj maiq mwavj.
35.17: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj pc'g fivj zu'g tovb yia kxvq Eei yetg zuvq Zyruq Eei ze'g naang, weig zu'g yia Zauj ninb Bua kxvq, ninb Bua yaag maiq mwavj. yia heug ninb Bua, ninb Bua yaag maiq tau.”+’+”
35.14: le-Kaapq Eei txn, yo-naa-Dapg, hatg ninb Eei zeib fun maiq tuvq hopq tiuq. ninb Bua yaag ei Jyenq zruj. ninb Bua maiq hopq tiuq Tauj ib Nxi, weig zu'g ninb Bua mwavj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij hatg Eei waag. yia maiq tivb lyrub Eei Kwinj meib Bua, meib Bua yaag maiq mwavj.
35.4: yia txb ninb Bua Tauj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq cvj pia'g Tinb huvb Eei myenb, ikg-Daa-li-yaa Eei txn, haa-nan Eei txn Bua uaq Qovj. naaiq Qovj yem nitq zruj Jyen uaq teij Eei Qovj, yem san-lum Eei txn uaq taub zuaq kcvb myenb, maa-aa-sej-aa, Eei Qovj kub vwaaig.
35.2: “mivb lxd le-Kaapq uaq puvb myenb Zauj ninb Bua kxvq waag yaag txb ninb Bua pia'g zavg zyruq Eei yetg Qovj pyauq, zx'q a'vung tiuq pun ninb Bua hopq.”
35.6: mq paag ninb Bua tau, “yia Bua maiq hopq tiuq weig zu'g yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij le-Kaapq Eei txn, yo-naa-Dapg, hatg yia Bua. ninb kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq hopq a'vung tiuq. lyemb meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei zeib fun yetg liud maiq tuvq hopq.
35.13: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘mivb Buaj yu-Daa myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj, zyruq kxvq, “meib Bua maiq xij mwavj Faauj Eei Jauq yaag maiq xij mwavj yia kxvq Eei waag fai?
35.12: ye-le-mi cvj zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
35.15: yia Paaiq yia Eei zwavj pru, se trug waag myenb, yaag zanb zang Paaiq ninb Bua mivb kxvq, ‘ib zang meib Bua kx'g myenb xij zu'g leib Gxi kx'g myenb zruj x'q Eei Jauq, yaag kxiq yeng meib Bua zruj Eei sig, maiq tuvq kan cvj fub suj Eiag Eei zyenb. Navq naaig meib Bua tu'q yem yia Jiu pun meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv.’ mq paag meib Bua maiq mwavj yia yaag maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj yia.
35.11: mq paag Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, taaib Bx'q teib puv uaq zang yia Bua kxvq, ‘taaib maa'b! Bua mivb ye-lu-saa-lem weig zu'g kamb Riaj Ken-Dia myenb Eei Junb pcv Zauj si-lia myenb Eei Junb pcv.’ weig naaiq yia Bua yem ye-lu-saa-lem.”
35.1: yo-si-yaa Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb Eei zyavb hog, ye-le-mi zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
35.10: yia Bua yem Dopg liub yaag ei Jyenq yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij, yo-naa-Dapg, hatg yia Bua Eei yetg zuvq waag.

24.3: zyruq naaig yia, “ye-le-mi aag, meib pwatg haiq Euvg?” yia kxvq, “yia pwatg vovb Exj pyruq. lovj Eei uaq teij lovj kau, waaig uaq teij za'kevb waaig kau, zuvq maiq penj Eang.”
24.8: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘uaq teij waaig Eei vovb Exj pyruq, tovb waaig kau, zuvq maiq penj Eang Eei pyruq, yia xij Navq naaiq zruj pun yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Zauj zevg Fiag yem naaiq nxm teib puv Zauj yem Jyenq i-yipq teib puv Eei ye-lu-saa-lem myenb.
24.4: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
24.2: yetg Daan se lovj haig Eei vovb Exj pyruq, Navq zua'g Daavg Eei taaub Txvj pyruq. mq paag cvj maaib Daan se waaig haig Eei pyruq. waaig kau, zuvq maiq penj Eang.
24.6: yia Eei mziv xij mavg Jyenq ninb Bua weig pun ninb Bua tu'q lovj. yia yaag xij txb ninb Bua Rwrnj naaiq nxm teib puv. yia Zeij Jiad ninb Bua, maiq zeid Zc'q ninb Bua Fiag. yia xij zwavj ninb Bua, maiq zeid pcv ninb Bua Zwrtq.
24.9: yia xij pun ninb Bua penj luvb Diaq maang kua'q myenb kamb Riaj haig Eei ka'naaiq, pun ninb Bua zu'g myenb taanb, zu'g penj kruq kxvq, yem yia xij zung ninb Bua mivb yem Eei nxmb nxm txvj zu'g myenb Jyetq yaag zu'g myenb zyruj.
24.5: “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘naaiq teij lovj Eei vovb Exj pyruq peiq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei yu-Daa myenb, tovb yia pun yem naaiq nxm txvj Zwrtq mivb Tauj Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv.
24.7: yia xij pun ninb Bua maaib Hruq hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ninb Bua zyrug zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj, yia yaag zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, weig zu'g ninb Bua xij pwavq Hruq Rwrnj taaib lxd yia.”
24.1: Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, zx'q yu-Daa huvb, ye-ho-yaa-Kim Eei txn, ye-Ko-ni-yaa, Zauj yu-Daa Eei Jyen Zauj zavg myenb Zauj Lia'g zavg yem ye-lu-saa-lem kwaatq mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon mig a'q. naaiq teij sig Jiaj liud, zyruq pun yia pwatg naaiq teij hing yaavb Eei sig. maaib i Daan vovb Exj pyruq an Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Ra'Myen.
24.10: yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg, Tauj ninb Bua yem yia Zeij pun ninb Bua Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv zu'g myetg Revg mig a'q.’+”

7.18: fu'Jweiq Raud zaavb, tia puaq trud, msia'q txn Zaij Bwrnq zruj Fuaq fovg hxg pun luvb Eei huvb maag. ninb Bua yaag toj Zwrtq Ziaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq fovg hxg pun Eiag Eei zyenb weig Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad.
7.8: mavg maa'b! meib Bua Kauj Duaq myenb Eei waag yaag maiq lamb lovg.
7.33: naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eei sei zyrug penj Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Zauj lomb Waav Eei Yiab zxib Eei Eang hopq. yaag maiq maaib myenb hc'q pyauj.
7.3: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘xij zu'g zxg meib Bua Eei Jaub lrug Zauj zruj Eei sig, yia zyrug pun meib Bua yem Jyenq naaiq nxm txvj.
7.32: zyruq kxvq, ‘weig naaiq mavg maa'b! Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, naaiq nxm txvj maiq heug To-fetq fai Ben-hin-nom hxvd, mq paag penj taij taig Eei hxvd, weig zu'g ninb Bua xij yem To-fetq pyopq sei laaij kanb nxm txvj maiq maaib txvj Kuvj.
7.21: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘zx'q meib Bua fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Jaa Jyenq meib Bua weig kanb Euvg Jauq fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq yaag Eang uaq teij xq.
7.14: weig naaiq yia xij zruj pun tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug uaq nxm pyauq, se meib Bua Kauj Eei txvj, tovb yia pun meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Navq yem si-lo zruj nx.
7.23: mq paag yia Navq naaiq hatg ninb Bua, ‘xij zu'g mwavj yia Eei waag, yia zyrug zruj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, meib Bua tu'q zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj yaag kan yia hatg meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq Jauq weig pun meib Bua tu'q lovj.’
7.6: sij kxvq meib Bua maiq zeij kanb fivj myenb fai kub hanb fu'Jweiq fai aub kwaaq, yem naaiq nxm txvj maiq taij maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb yaag maiq kan Eiag Eei zyenb hxig zu'g kanb,
7.34: Tauj uaq zang yia xij pun yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg Fyenb yrub naug Eitg Eei Qiaj Zauj syavb laavb syavb Bwavd Eei Qiaj sekq, weig zu'g teib puv xij zu'g penj paaig Waav Eei txvj.
7.2: “meib xij zu'g sruq Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg zunb kxvq naaiq teij waag, ‘ta'faanb meib Bua pia'g naaiq teij kcvb zavg zyruq Eei yu-Daa myenb aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag.’
7.20: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia zyrug nrud haig, ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Fiag naaiq nxm txvj Eei myenb, lyemb myenb lyemb scvb Kuq Zauj lomb Waav Eei Dyavj Zauj Dau Zwrtq Eei kcvb zwavj. trud xij puaq Qwi yaag Bx'q maiq taig.’
7.24: mq paag ninb Bua maiq ei Jyenq zruj yaag maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj. ninb Bua ei Jyenq ninb Bua kanb Eei za'eij Zauj ninb Bua Hruq vcvg Hruq x'q Eei zruj yaag Lwrtq Gaav, maiq mivb uaq Daavg.
7.28: meib zyrug xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘naaiq kua'q myenb maiq mwavj zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei waag, yaag maiq ei Jyenq Faauj Eei Jauq. zyen leid zu'g myetg mig a'q. yem meib Bua Eei Rwib zyen leid zutg mig a'q.
7.7: yia zyrug pun meib Bua tu'q yem naaiq nxm txvj, se yem lob Nxi yia Zeij pun meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij yetg liud yem Eei txvj.
7.29: xij zu'g Japq meib Bua Eei Ba'pyei zxi kwavg mivb. yem Lav, Fav Eei txvj xij zu'g Raub Eyemq, weig zu'g zyruq Gemb yaag kwavg ninb nrud Eei naaiq txig myenb.’
7.19: zyruq kxvq, ‘ninb Bua Zua'q Qiaj Jiad se yia fai? se Zua'q ninb Bua kanb pun ninb Bua kanb lung maiq zeid?’
7.17: meib maiq pwatg ninb Bua yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg zruj Eei sig fai?
7.31: ninb Bua Zeij To-fetq Lav Eei txvj yem Ben-hin-nom hxvd, weig lovg trud puaq ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud. yia yaag maiq hatg ninb Bua zruj. yia Eei Hruq zuvq maiq Namq Tauj Navq naaig zruj.’
7.30: “zyruq kxvq, ‘ziuj yia Eei mziv mavg, yu-Daa myenb zruj x'q sig. ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua zruj kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq an tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug uaq nxm pyauq, pun pyauq maaib wij.
7.27: “meib xij zu'g kxvq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag Buaj ninb Bua, mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj. meib Qa'q heug ninb Bua mq paag ninb Bua maiq tau meib.
7.11: tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug naaiq nxm pyauq, ziuj meib Bua Eei mziv mavg, maiq zeid penj Janb za'g pivj Eei Kwrtq fai?  zyruq kxvq, “yia kanb zuvq pwatg mig a'q.”
7.5: sij kxvq meib Bua za'kevb zxg meib Bua Eei Jaub lrug Zauj zruj Eei sig, sij kxvq meib Bua laanb Zauj laanb za'kevb zruj pcvb fim Eei,
7.9: “+‘meib Bua zruj za'g, taij myenb, Yenj auq Yenj Goj, lcvd waag Jaaq Eei, puaq huv pun Baa-an zyenb yaag kan Jyenq meib Bua maiq hiuq Eei zyenb,
7.16: “meib c'q, maiq tuvq weig naaiq teij pc'g fivj tauj kauj. maiq tuvq weig ninb Bua heug Jyenq tauj kauj yaag maiq tuvq weig ninb Bua Toq yia, weig zu'g yia maiq mwavj meib.
7.4: maiq tuvq Kauj naaiq teij Duaq Eei waag, “naaiq se zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.”
7.10: Ga'haaq taaib tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug naaiq nxm pyauq, sruq Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen kxvq, “yia Bua tu'q Fruj Zwrtq mig a'q.” mq paag meib Bua Zxg zruj Jyenq naaiq teij yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig.
7.22: weig zu'g yia txb meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq Nxi, yia maiq tu'q Zauj ninb Bua kxvq fai hatg ninb Bua Tauj puaq ziag fai weig kanb Euvg ziag Eei ka'naaiq.
7.12: “+‘meib Bua mivb yia Eei txvj, se si-lo uaq, tovb taaub tavb yia weig yia Eei mevb lyepg Eei txvj. mavg kaaj laaij yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, zruj Eei x'q sig yia Navq haiq nx zruj pun uaq nxm txvj.’
7.15: yia xij zx'q meib Bua yem yia Eei Ra'Myen zung Zwrtq, Navq yia zung Zwrtq meib Bua Eei zwavj kxb yrud, se e-faa-im Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun.’
7.13: zyruq kxvq, ‘ib zang laaij meib Bua zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig, yia zanb zang Zauj meib Bua kxvq, meib Bua yaag maiq mwavj. yia heug meib Bua, meib Bua yaag maiq tau.
7.1: naaiq se ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
7.26: mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj yia, maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj. ninb Bua vcvg Jyenq Hruq. ninb Bua zuvq zruj kaub waaig ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij.’
7.25: yem meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zwrtq i-yipq uaq Nxi Tauj ib Nxi, yia maiq tivb lyrub Eei Paaiq yia Eei pru, zwavj trug waag myenb, mivb ninb Bua uaq yetg Nxi Jiaj yetg Nxi.

17.18: Toq pun zruj to'g yia uaq teij zu'g paaig Myen, mq paag maiq tuvq pun yia paaig Myen. Toq pun ninb Bua kamb Riaj, mq paag maiq tuvq pun yia kamb Riaj. Toq pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang Eei Nxi, pun ninb zu'g myetg cvj Jaa zu'g myetg.”
17.8: ninb Navq Dyavj zwavj Jyenq Do'g Len, Dyavj Eei Ruvb Zwrtq mivb Tauj uam. yua'q Eei zyavb hog ninb maiq kamb Riaj, weig zu'g ninb Eei nxmb zanb zang mcv Eei. haand Eei Havj ninb yaag maiq Raub, weig zu'g zanb zang zyavb pyruq maiq tivb.
17.3: Zauj yem lomb Waav Bu'Dovj Eei Bov. meib Eei zinb zxib Zauj yetg zuvq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq yia Jiu pun myenb luq, laaij yem kxmj meib Eei teib puv meib paamd Eei zwid.
17.21: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua xij zu'g faij fim weig kanb Eei mcvg. tivb kov Nxi maiq tuvq pyenb haiq Euvg ka'naaiq fai txb pia'g ye-lu-saa-lem Eei kcvb.
17.14: “zyruq aag, Toq zxg yia, yia zyrug tu'q zxg lovj. Toq Fruj yia, yia zyrug tu'q Fruj, weig zu'g meib se tovb yia Zev uaq taub.
17.23: mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj yia, maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj. ninb Bua vcvg Jyenq Hruq. ninb Bua maiq mwavj yaag maiq ei Jyenq Faauj Eei waag.’
17.6: ninb zyrug Navq yem teib puvb haand Eei Dyavb txnb fomq maiq pwatg haiq Euvg lovj Eei Jauq Tauj. ninb xij zu'g yem teib puvb Waav Bxvj Gaai Eei txvj, Dau Raaib, maiq maaib myenb yem Eei teib puv,
17.2: ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq Javj ninb Bua Eei ziab txvb Zauj aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei favj yem tiub tiub Dyavb Eyemd ka'Len Zauj Bovb Lav kub vwaaig,
17.20: kxvq Buaj yavb naaiq teij kcvb pia'g Eei myenb, se yu-Daa Eei huvb Zauj yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei yetg zuvq myenb xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag,
17.24: “mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua mwavj yia, tivb kov Nxi maiq pyenb haiq Euvg pia'g naaiq nxm zivb Eei kcvb, mq paag syru tivb kov Nxi penj Zivb Revg Nxi, yaag maiq lovg uaq nxm Nxi zruj haiq Euvg kov,
17.7: “Kauj zyruq Eei myenb, se za'kevb Kauj ninb uaq teij, zuvq xij tu'q xnb lx'g.
17.19: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj yia, “meib mivb sruq Jyenq pc'g fivj Eei kcvb Daavg, tovb yu-Daa huvb pia'g Zwrtq Eei kcvb, yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei taub taub kcvb Daavg,
17.17: Toq maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg hc'q yia kamb Riaj. zu'g ze'g naang Eei Nxi meib zruj yia Daaub Kauj Eei txvj.
17.27: mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua maiq mwavj yia, maiq syru tivb kov Nxi penj Zivb Revg Nxi, yaag pyenb ka'naaiq txij tivb kov Nxi pia'g ye-lu-saa-lem Eei kcvb, yia zyrug yem kcvb tyemq trud. trud zyrug puaq Qwi ye-lu-saa-lem Eei huvb ting. yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Bx'q tu'q taig.
17.11: myenb zruj maiq pcvb fim tu'q zinb zxib, se Navq nx'g Jiab txb maiq zeid kanb puag Eei Jauj zunj Eei txn taaib zunq. Tauj zov nin Eei zyavb hog, zinb zxib zyrug leib Gxi ninb. setq mweid Eei zyavb hog ninb pun Ziv ninb penj Vovj Eei myenb a'q.
17.5: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “haiq taub Kauj paamb myenb, yaag pavg xq sin zruj Qa'q, ninb Eei Hruq yaag leib Gxi zyruq, naaiq Euvg myenb zu'g zyruj a'q.
17.9: myenb Eei Hruq kaub kuq kwaij Jiaj maang mwrtg, za'kevb! waaig haig, haiq taub haib hiuq tu'q naaiq Euvg Hruq?
17.16: yia maiq zeid Toq meib pun x'q Eei ze'g naang Zwrtq. yia yaag maiq zeid xij pun zu'g Kruq naang Eei Nxi Tauj, meib kanb hiuq Eei. yia Eei Rwib kxvq Zwrtq Eei waag yaag yem meib Eei Ra'Myen.
17.4: meib xij zu'g puvj kwavg yia Zeij pun meib Ripg Eei pwrng. yia xij pun meib yem maiq hiuq Eei teib puv fub suj meib Eei winb wavq, weig zu'g yia Qiaj Jiad Navq Fopg trud nx, trud yaag xij yetg liud zia'g Jyenq.”
17.10: yia, zyruq, zaab myenb Namq Eei Jauq, yaag seij myenb Eei Hruq. yia ziuj kx'g myenb zruj Eei Jauq Zauj ninb zruj Eei sig winb pun ninb.
17.22: tivb kov Nxi yaag maiq tuvq pyenb haiq Euvg ka'naaiq Zwrtq kanb Eei pyauq, fai zruj haiq Euvg kov. xij zu'g syru tivb kov Nxi penj Zivb Revg Eei Nxi, yaag maiq tuvq lovg uaq nxm Nxi zruj haiq Euvg kov Navq yia hatg meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij nx.
17.12: yia Bua Eei sivj ting yem Eei txvj se Favb laavg Eei weig tovb Zx uaq lyepg yem Lav Eei txvj.
17.15: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj yia, ‘zyruq Eei waag yem haaij? Toq pun Zwrtq taaib maa'b!’
17.13: “zyruq aag, se i-saa-laa-en myenb maaib lamb Namq uaq taub, ta'faanb kwavg meib Eei myenb xij zu'g Eaiq. leib Gxi meib Eei myenb Eei Buaj zu'g fiaq Jyenq niab Buv, weig zu'g ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, tovb zruj zyavb mcvg Eei uamb zivq uaq taub.
17.1: “yu-Daa Eei zwid lovg Lia'g patq, tweib mweid se pc'g Eei, Rav Eei, vcvg Jiaj Eei la'pyeiq, fiaq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Hruq Navq Divb la'pyeib penq nx, yaag fiaq Jyenq ziab txvb Eei Jxv.
17.26: pc'g fivj xij yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj weib kxmj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei txvj taaib. ninb Bua yaag yem Ben-yaa-min teig Zauj Bovb Jua'q Zauj Bovb aiq txvj Zauj ne-kepg teig taaib. yaag txb Jyenq fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq, ziag Eei laavb zi'g Zauj huv yaag txb fovg hxg ziag weig lcvd zivb Eei ka'naaiq Tauj zyruq Eei pyauq.
17.25: uaq zang zyrug maaib zweid Jyenq Daa-witq Eei weig Eei huvb Zauj ninb Bua Eei Jyen pia'g naaiq nxm zivb Eei kcvb. ninb Bua zweid Jyenq maab Zia fai keb maad, se ninb Bua kanb, Zauj ninb Bua Eei Jyen, Zauj yu-Daa Eei myenb, Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb. naaiq nxm zivb zyrug yetg liud maaib myenb yem.

49.18: Navq soj-Dom Zauj ko-mo-laa Zauj nitq fatq Eei zivb zu'g paaig, maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q yem naaig. maiq maaib haiq taub tivb zepq.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
49.8: yem De-Daan Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g kwinb sin pyauj, pivj Jyenq Do Eei txvj, weig zu'g yia tivg e-saau Eei zwid Eei zyavb hog, yia xij pun ninb zu'g ze'g naang.
49.33: “haa-so xij zu'g penj Yiab Juq yem Eei txvj, yetg liud zu'g paaig Waav, maiq maaib myenb yem, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub hitq naaig.”
49.3: “hetq-Bon aa'b! meib xij zu'g Eyemq, weig zu'g ai zivb zu'g paaig Waav, lapq-Baa Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Eyemq, lovg la'maab Diab Zru sai Jyenq Jaaiq, yem weib Jyenq Eei txvj ka'Euad Tiuj mivb Tiuj taaib, weig zu'g min-Kom zyenb Zauj Jyenq ninb Eei sai myenb Zauj Jyen xij yetg Fiag zu'g kwaatq mivb mig a'q.
49.32: ninb Bua Eei lxb Txb xij zu'g penj luq taaib Eei ka'naaiq, ninb Bua Eei vovb kwanb zu'g Zaavq taaib. Japq Ba'pyei pcvb Eei Wiv kxmj mGxvq Eei myenb, yia xij pun Raanj mivb pyei puv Ryaaub Kwrtq, yaag xij pun ninb Bua zu'g yem puvb puv taaib Eei ze'g naang.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
49.21: e-Dom Baav Fiag Eei Qiaj Bwi Dang Dau tovd, ninb Bua heug Eei Qiaj cvq mivb Tauj Kxib si'q.
49.35: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij wrtq nauq e-laam Eei Jwavb zinj, tovb ninb Bua pavg Zamq Jiaj Tevj ninb Bua tu'q Qa'q.
49.14: yia tu'q haid yem zyruq taaib Eei fyenj. ninb Paaiq taub trug fyenj myenb mivb maang kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj kxvq, “meib Bua kapq zunq taaib Bx'q e-Dom, Jiad taaib Bx'q Jaaj maa'b!”
49.23: kxvq Tauj Daa-matq-katg. “haa-matq Zauj aan-patg zu'g paaig Myen weig zu'g ninb Bua mwavj haid Zyruq Eei fyenj. ninb Bua Ba'Riu yu'g mig a'q, ninb Bua Hruq Paanb Paan Pua'g Pua'q Eei Navq Kxiq maiq haib sekq nx.
49.6: mq paag Ga'haaq yia xij pun am-mon myenb cvj tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
49.34: sej-De-Ki-yaa Jiad kxn zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb uaq zang, ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq kxvq Tauj e-laam naaiq teij waag.
49.2: zyruq kxvq, “weig naaiq Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij pun myenb haid Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj Bwi, se yia Bx'q am-mon myenb Eei lapq-Baa zivb Eei zyavb hog. lapq-Baa zyrug penj paaig Waav Eei ka'naaib Dwi, weib kxmj Eei laavd yaag xij zu'g trud puaq Qwi. zinb Daavg Zaavq tu'q i-saa-laa-en Eei zivb uaq teij taauj Rwrnj i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag tu'q Zaavq Rwrnj.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
49.36: yia xij pun pyei puv Ryaauj yem pyei puv luvb pwrng taaib Tauj e-laam. yia xij pun ninb Bua kan uaq teij yetg zuvq Ryaauj Raanj mivb. uaq teij zu'g zung Zwrtq e-laam Eei myenb maiq maaib yetg nxm kua'q ninb Bua maiq Tauj.”
49.20: weig naaiq, xij zu'g mwavj zyruq taaq Eei za'eij weig Bx'q e-Dom Zauj ninb Bx'q Te-maan zivb Eei myenb tivg Eei za'eij. ninb Bua faij Jiaj Eei pa'ki yuvb txn zuvq xij zu'g Tx mivb. ninb Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb laanb Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g myetg.
49.24: Daa-matq-katg mau mig a'q. ninb kwinb sin pyauj, Hruq Waav Revg. ninb zu'g Hruq mun, Hruq Raub, Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad nx.
49.28: naaiq kxvq Tauj Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Bx'q Ke-Daa fivj Zauj haa-so Eei kua'q.   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “Jiad taaib mivb Bx'q Ke-Daa, myetg Revg yem tov puv Eei myenb.
49.7: kxvq Tauj e-Dom. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yem Te-maan Bu'Dovj maiq cvj maaib Zovb mevb fai? Zaavb laavb Eei waag yem kwai Eei myenb Dxtq Revg mig a'q fai? ninb Bua Eei Zovb mevb zu'g myetg Revg mig a'q fai?
49.29: ninb Bua Eei Dopg liub Zauj pa'ki yuvb kwanb, yuvb kwanb, xij zu'g zx'q, lyemb ninb Bua Eei Bc'g kcvb Dia Zauj ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq Jaab txvj. ninb Bua Eei lxb Txb zu'g zx'q mivb, myenb zyrug heug Jyenq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘puvb puv maaib kamb Riaj Eei sig a'q lo'b!’+”
49.19: “Navq taub syenb yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Len Eei lomg taaib pxvd wrnq Eei pa'ki yuvb laanb, yia xij lyemb zeib pun ninb Bua Tiuj leib Gxi naaiq nxm teib puv, pyauj e-Dom. yia kinq haiq taub yia zyrug Paaiq uaq taub kunq uaq nxm kua'q. haiq taub Navq yia? haiq taub haib heug yia taaib? maaib haiq taub kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb haib sruq tu'q Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen?”
49.17: “e-Dom zyrug penj pun myenb kamb Riaj Eei txvj. ta'faanb Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb za'kevb kamb Riaj haig, cvj weig e-Dom zu'g Eei yetg zuvq ze'g naang Wrtq ninb.
49.38: yia xij yem e-laam lyepg yia Eei weig, myetg Revg ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj Zauj Jyen.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
49.31: zyruq kxvq, “Jiad taaib, Zwrtq mivb Bx'q yetg fivj Kub yem Eei myenb, se yem tu'q wrnq Eei myenb. ninb Bua zuvq maiq maaib zivb kcvb, maiq maaib kcvb sxn, ninb Bua kanb yem Navq.
49.30: zyruq kxvq, “haa-so myenb aa'b! pyauj a'q. yrub Jyenq mivb ko, yem Do Eei txvj, weig zu'g Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, taaq za'eij Bx'q meib Bua, yaag Jiad Hruq hxig meib Bua.”
49.27: “yia xij yem Daa-matq-katg Eei zivb laatg tyemq trud, trud zyrug puaq Qwi Ben-haa-Datg weib wrnq Eei txvj.”
49.11: kwavg meib Bua Eei kub hanb fu'Jweiq, yia zyrug pun ninb Bua maaib mcvg zyavb, yaag pun meib Bua Eei aub kwaaq Kauj yia.”
49.5: zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij pun meib Bua kamb Riaj haig, laaij weib kxmj meib Bua yetg zuvq myenb. meib Bua xij zu'g zung Zwrtq, taub taub pcv za'g Eei mivb uaq Daavg, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub syru zunq pyauj Eei myenb.
49.9: sij kxvq kc'q a'vung pyruq Eei myenb taaib lxd meib, ninb Bua maiq zeid lyrub teij a'vung pyruq pun myenb Raud fai? sij kxvq luvb mwrnd zang maaib Janb za'g taaib nimg, ninb maiq zeid Kuvj zruj waaig kauj ninb Bua kanb Navq fai?
49.16: meib hc'q myenb kamb Riaj haig, Zauj meib Hruq mauj Eei Jauq Duaq meib, se meib yem Jyenq Bcvb vaamb yaag yem Jyenq Bovb nivq kub vwaaig Eei myenb. maiq kunq meib Navq tomb Jaavq yem Lav Eei txvj zruj laud, yia xij yem naaig pcv meib Fiag.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
49.37: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij pun e-laam myenb yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Zauj lxd ninb Bua Eei mcvg uaq teij Eei Ra'Myen kamb Riaj haig. yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang, se yia ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun ninb Bua. yia xij pun Ru'g Daauq zung ninb Bua, Tauj yia myetg Revg ninb Bua.
49.39: “mq paag Tauj setq mweid Eei zyavb hog yia xij pun e-laam tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx.”
49.4: maiq zyepg zua'q Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua weig haiq tiug puvj waab mauj kxvq meib Bua Eei hxvd? meib Bua Kauj zinb zxib kxvq, ‘haiq taub haib taaib Zauj yia txib tekg?’
49.10: mq paag yia Ziaq e-saau Fav Revg, Kxi Gxi ninb pivj Eei txvj, ninb zyrug pivj maiq Bweid ninb kanb a'q. ninb Eei zeib fun Zauj kxb yrud Zauj Jwavg laavd myenb zu'g myetg Revg, maiq maaib ninb a'q.
49.22: mavg maa'b! maaib taub Navq tomb Jaavq xij yav Gxi Daatq Daij taaib Bx'q Bo-saa-laa. uaq Nxi e-Dom Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv Eei Hruq Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad nx.”
49.12: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “sij kxvq maiq hxpg zu'g hopq uaq nxm zaanq Eei myenb zuvq zu'g hopq, meib haib pyauj tu'q Dutq, maiq zu'g tivg zwid fai? meib zuvq pyauj maiq Dutq, Dovg haaij xij zu'g hopq naaiq nxm zaanq.”
49.15: “weig zu'g yia xij pun meib yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj zruj faij, yem paamb myenb Bu'Dovj zu'g mavg Piaj.
49.13: zyruq kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb hruq waag kxvq, “Bo-saa-laa xij zu'g penj pun myenb kamb Riaj Eei txvj, zu'g myenb Wrtq, zu'g paaig Waav yaag zu'g zyruj. ninb Eei yetg zuvq zivb xij zu'g penj yetg liud paaig Waav Eei txvj.”
49.1: kxvq Tauj am-mon myenb.   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en maiq maaib txn fai? ninb maiq maaib hod txig Ripg fai? uaq Euvg min-Kom zyenb weig haiq tiug Ripg kaatg Eei Dau? ninb Eei pc'g fivj weig haiq tiug yem Fiag kaatg Eei zivb?”
49.26: weig naaiq ninb Eei myenb lunj myenb zyrug yem tomb zwavj zaamg zu'g taij taig. tovb uaq Nxi ninb Eei yetg zuvq pcv zu'g myetg Revg.” nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
49.25: maaib mevb taub uaq nxm zivb zu'g kwavg mig a'q, tovb maaib Fyenb yrub pwavq Revg Eei zivb.

11.18: zyruq pun yia hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig yia Zivj taaib hiuq. ninb piuj mevb pun yia hiuq tu'q ninb Bua taaq x'q Eei za'eij hxig yia.
11.8: maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Bua maiq ei Jyenq zruj yaag maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj. mq paag taub taub ziuj kanb Eei x'q Hruq vcvg Jyenq zruj. laaij ninb Bua maiq ei Jyenq yia hatg ninb Bua Eei vcvg waag, yia zyrug pun ninb Bua zu'g ziuj naaiq teij yetg zuvq vcvg waag Eei sig.’+”
11.3: meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq,  i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “haiq taub maiq mwavj naaiq teij lcvd Eei vcvg waag zuvq zu'g zyruj.
11.21: “weig naaiq zyruq kxvq Tauj lxd meib Eei mcvg uaq teij aa-naa-Totq myenb. naaiq teij myenb kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq tevq zyruq Eei mevb trug waag. maiq zei c'q, meib zyrug zu'g yia Bua Eei puad taij taig.’
11.14: “maiq tuvq weig naaiq teij pc'g fivj tauj kauj. maiq tuvq weig ninb Bua heug Jyenq Toq fai Tevj ninb Bua tauj kauj, weig zu'g ninb Bua pwavb zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog heug yia, yia maiq mwavj ninb Bua.
11.23: ninb Bua maiq zevg yetg taub weig zu'g yia tivg aa-naa-Totq myenb Eei zwid Eei Havb taaub Tauj, yia zyrug pun ninb Bua zu'g ze'g naang.’+”
11.6: zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “meib xij zu'g yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg zunb naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag kxvq, ‘meib Bua xij zu'g mwavj naaiq teij lcvd Eei vcvg waag yaag ei Jyenq zruj,
11.2: “meib xij zu'g mwavj naaiq teij lcvd Eei vcvg waag yaag kxvq Buaj yu-Daa myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb.
11.20: mq paag nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq aag, meib pcvb fim Eei syemq yaag seij myenb Eei Hruq Zauj Namq Eei sig. Toq pun yia pwatg meib winb pun ninb Bua, weig zu'g yia Eei Jauq yia Jiu pun meib mig a'q.
11.7: weig zu'g yia txb meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, yia Niab Niaq Eei tonq ninb Bua. Tauj ib Nxi yia maiq tivb lyrub Eei Kwinj ninb Bua. yia kxvq, “xij zu'g mwavj yia Eei waag.”
11.19: yia Navq taub swrng Eei pa'ki yuvb txn zu'g txb mivb taij Eei txvj. yia maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Bua taaq za'eij hxig yia. ninb Bua kxvq, “Bua xij zu'g zx'q lyemb Dyavj lyemb pyruq myetg Revg. Bua xij zu'g zx'q ninb yem yaavb ken Pai kwavg weig pun myenb yetg liud maiq Javj ninb Eei Buaj.”
11.17: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, se zwavj meib uaq taub, kxvq Zwrtq xij pun meib zu'g ze'g naang, weig zu'g i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Zauj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun zruj x'q sig puaq huv pun Baa-an zyenb Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad.”
11.11: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g x'q sig. ninb Bua maiq haib pyauj maiq Dutq. maiq kunq ninb Bua heug yia, yia maiq mwavj ninb Bua.
11.5: weig ei Jyenq yia hruq Jyenq Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij lcvd Eei vcvg waag. yia kxvq yia xij zx'q nxm Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv Zeij pun ninb Bua Navq ib Nxi nx.’+” yia tau, “zyruq aag, Toq pun Navq naaig a'q.”
11.9: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “yu-Daa myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj taaq za'eij vcvg Jyenq.
11.16: zinb Daavg zyruq kxvq meib Navq tiub ka'lanq Dyavj Eyemd Eei, Rweig Eei, yaag zyavb pyruq lovj. mq paag Navq tomb Ryaauj Eei Qiaj Bwi, yia xij tyemq zia'g trud pun ninb Eei Gwaab zu'g puaq Qwi Revg.
