11.4: naaiq teij vcvg waag tovb yia zx'q meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, se yem Lia'g lrub Zwrtq taaib hatg ninb Bua Eei waag.” yia kxvq, ‘mwavj yia kxvq Eei waag yaag ei Jyenq yia hatg meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq waag zruj. meib Bua zyrug penj yia Eei pc'g fivj. yia yaag penj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb,
11.10: ninb Bua Win Rwrnj taaib zruj tovb ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij maiq mwavj yia Eei waag paamd Eei zwid. ninb Bua kan Eiag Eei zyenb yaag fub suj ninb Bua. i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Zauj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun zruj txvg yia Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij lcvd Eei vcvg waag.
11.22: weig naaiq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia xij tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid. ninb Bua Eei myenb lunj myenb xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud zu'g vxg Naavj taig.
11.12: yu-Daa Eei zivb Eei myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj zyrug mivb heug tovb ninb Bua puaq huv pun uaq teij zyenb. mq paag zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog, naaiq teij zyenb Fruj maiq tu'q ninb Bua.
11.15: “yia Namq Eei myenb zruj x'q haig Eei sig, ninb fuvg maaib leid yem yia Eei pyauq? hruq waag fai ziag Eei scvb Kuq xq haib Tevj pyauj Dutq maiq zu'g tivg zwid fai? uaq Euvg meib haib Fyenb yrub Eei fai?”
11.13: yu-Daa myenb aa'b! meib Bua Eei zyenb Zauj meib Bua Eei zivb fib Bua'g Eei. meib Bua weig kamb Riaq Eei Baa-an zyenb lyepg puaq huv tiab Dovg ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg Zamq.’
11.1: ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,

33.18: le-wi sai myenb yetg liud yaag maaib myenb yem yia Eei Ra'Myen txb fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq, weig fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei laavb zi'g yaag weig yetg liud liug leid fovg hxg ziag Eei Jauq.”
33.8: yia xij saaj Revg ninb Bua zruj txvg yia Eei yetg zuvq zwid, se zruj txvg yaag vcvg yia Eei yetg zuvq zwid.
33.3: ‘kunq Toq yia, yia zyrug tau meib cvj zx'q tovb meib maiq hiuq tu'q Lo haig, kem Jyenq Eei sig piuj mevb Buaj meib.’
33.21: yia Zauj yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei vcvg waag yaag haib tavj. Navq naaig zyrug pun ninb maiq maaib txn zweid ninb Eei weig zruj huvb. yia Zauj fub suj yia Eei le-wi sai myenb lyepg Eei vcvg waag yaag tavj.
33.14: zyruq kxvq, “Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij zruj zyavj yia Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Zauj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun lcvd Eei vcvg waag.
33.23: ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
33.6: “+‘mavg maa'b! yia zuvq xij pun naaiq nxm zivb tu'q zxg lovj. yia xij zxg ninb Bua lovj taaib yaag pun ninb Bua za'kevb puvb zua'g yaag tu'q pcvb xn Eei yem.
33.2: “zyruq, tovb zeij Dau uaq taub, se zyruq nanq Daub peib taaib weig lyepg Jiad. ninb Eei Buaj se zyruq, Navq naaiq kxvq,
33.20: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘sij kxvq meib Bua haib pun yia weig luvb Nxi zang lyepg Eei vcvg waag Zauj yia weig luvb mwrnd zang lyepg Eei vcvg waag tavj nx, zyrug pun luvb Nxi luvb mwrnd maiq ziuj tivg taaib Eei zyavb hog Zwrtq,
33.24: “meib maiq Javj mwavj naaiq teij pc'g fivj kxvq Eei waag fai? ninb Bua kxvq, ‘zyruq kinq taaib Eei i fivj ninb zuvq kwavg mig a'q.’ Navq naaig ninb Bua mavg Piaj yia Eei pc'g fivj. ziuj ninb Bua mavg zuvq maiq tu'q cvj penj yetg kua'q myenb.
33.7: yia xij pun zu'g Zaavq mivb Eei yu-Daa myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb tu'q Rwrnj taaib cvj lyepg ninb Bua Jiad Navq tovb Zx uaq nx.
33.19: ye-le-mi cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
33.17: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘Daa-witq yetg liud maaib myenb zweid i-saa-laa-en zeib fun Eei weig.
33.11: mq paag yem naaig zuvq cvj tu'q mwavj haid Fyenb yrub, naug Eitg Eei Qiaj, syavb laavb syavb Bwavd Eei Qiaj, Zauj paauj Ruv myenb Eei Qiaj txij ninb Bua txb fovg hxg lcvd zivb Eei ka'naaiq mivb zavg zyruq Eei pyauq kxvq, “xij zu'g lcvd zivb nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq weig zu'g zyruq se lovj haig, weig zu'g ninb yetg liud zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb.” weig zu'g yia xij pun teib puv Rwrnj taaib tu'q lovj Navq tovb Zx uaq nx.’ zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
33.5: myenb xij Zauj Ken-Dia myenb Bx'q Jaaj, Ken-Dia myenb zyrug zx'q tovb yia Qiaj Jiad, nrud Jyenq taij uaq teij myenb Eei sei, tapq pwavq uaq teij pyauq, weig zu'g yia nyruq Myen kanb puv, maiq mavg naaiq nxm zivb, laaij ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq x'q sig.
33.9: luvb Diaq maang kua'q myenb mwavj haid yia Navq haiq nx zruj lovj pun naaiq nxm zivb Eei yetg zuvq sig, ninb Bua zyrug pun yia tu'q mevb hog, tu'q Fyenb yrub, tu'q myenb Zev, yaag tu'q myenb Taaib. uaq teij myenb zyrug kamb Riaj, sin zinj weig yia Dovg naaig pun naaiq nxm zivb tu'q yetg zuvq lovj Eei, puvb zua'g Eei Jauq.
33.16: yem uaq teij Nxib Eia'g yu-Daa zuvq tu'q Fruj, i-saa-laa-en yaag tu'q Taaib pcvb Eei yem. naaiq nxm zivb xij tu'q Buaj heug, ‘zyruq se yia Bua Eei pcvb fim.’
33.4: weig zu'g zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj naaiq nxm zivb Eei pyauq Zauj yu-Daa huvb Eei ting, tovb Zc'q Fiag weig tavq Jyenq winb wavq Dwi nia Lav weib zivb Eei txvj Zauj Ru'g Daauq.
33.10: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj naaiq nxm txvj, “penj paaig Waav Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb yaag maiq maaib scvb Kuq.’ yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg maiq maaib myenb, maiq maaib scvb Kuq Eei txvj,
33.22: luvb Eei Leij saauq maiq hivb, Kxib Len Eei saab zyru yaag Laau maiq zyend Navq haiq nx, yia yaag xij Navq uaq nx pun yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, Eei zeib fun Yaavj Zamq Jyenq faauj. fub suj yia Eei le-wi sai myenb yia yaag xij pun Yaavj Zamq Jyenq faauj.’+”
33.12: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yem naaiq nxm paaig Waav Eei txvj, tovb maiq maaib myenb, maiq maaib scvb Kuq Eei txvj, yem naaiq nxm txvj Eei nxmb nxm zivb cvj xij maaib puvj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb yem Eei txvj, pun ninb Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb yem naaig hitq Kwrnj.
33.15: “Tauj uaq teij Nxib Eia'g Zauj uaq teij zyavb hog, yia xij weig Daa-witq pun pcvb fim Eei Zunj Zwrtq. ninb xij yem teib puv zruj pcvb fim, zruj tu'q hxpg.
33.13: yem Bovb aiq txvj Eei zivb, Bovb Jua'q Eei zivb, yem ne-kepg Eei zivb, yem Ben-yaa-min teig, yem weib kxmj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei txvj, Zauj yem yu-Daa Eei zivb zuvq cvj maaib pa'ki yuvb kwanb Jiaj saauq Eei myenb Eei puab Diaq.’ zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
33.1: ye-le-mi Zxg zu'g wrnj Jyenq syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad, ninb cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag ta'Eeig Rung kxvq,
33.26: yia zyrug kwavg yaa-Kopq Zauj yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, Eei zeib fun, maiq kinq yetg taub ninb Eei zeib fun kunq apg-laa-ham, i-sakg Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun. weig zu'g yia xij pun ninb Bua tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx, yaag Kxb lyenb ninb Bua.’+”
33.25: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘sij kxvq yia maiq Zauj luvb Nxi Zauj luvb mwrnd lyepg vcvg waag yaag tivg luvb Zauj Dau Eei leid,

16.18: yia xij weig ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig Zauj ninb Bua Eei zwid pwib i kruq, laaij ninb Bua pun ninb Bua Eei kamb Riaq haig, maiq maaib mcvg Eei miub favj zruj pun yia Eei teib puv maaib wij, yaag pun yia Ripg Eei pwrng maaib ninb Bua Eei yruj haig Eei ka'naaiq pwavq.”
16.3: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq Tauj yem naaiq nxm txvj Zwrtq seij Eei txn sia'q, yaag kxvq Tauj yem naaiq nxm teib puv yuvd ninb Bua uaq teij tiaj maag.
16.8: “meib yaag maiq tuvq pia'g zruj Jxm Beng Eang Eei pyauq Zauj ninb Bua zweid Jyenq Eang, zweid Jyenq hopq.”
16.19: “zyruq aag, meib se yia Eei Qa'q Zauj yia wrnq Eei txvj. yem zu'g Kruq Eei Nxi penj yia Daaub Kauj Eei txvj. maang kua'q myenb xij yem Jomg luvb Diaq taaib lxd meib kxvq, “yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Ripg Eei pwrng se Jaaq Eei zyenb, se maiq lamb lovg, Tevj maiq tu'q haiq Euvg Eei ka'naaiq.
16.9: weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yem meib Bua zyavb Jyenq Eei Nxib Eia'g, yia xij txv Jyenq meib Bua pun zruj Jxm, zruj naug Eitg Eei Qiaj, Zauj syavb laavb syavb Bwavd Eei Qiaj, yem naaiq nxm teib puv sekq Ria'g.
16.7: maiq maaib haiq taub Beng Eang hopq Tevj weig myenb taig Raub Eyemq Eei myenb Jaiq Raub. lyemb weig ninb Bua Eyemq tia fai maa, maiq maaib haiq taub pun zaanq tiuq xn ninb Bua Eei Hruq.
16.5: weig zu'g zyruq kxvq, “maiq tuvq pia'g myenb Raub Eyemq Eei pyauq fai mivb Tevj myenb Eyemq fai Tevj ninb Bua Raub.” zyruq kxvq, “weig zu'g yia yem naaiq teij pc'g fivj zuvq zx'q yia Eei pcvb xn Zauj yia zyepg zua'q Namq myenb Eei Jauq Zauj Kxb lyenb myenb Eei Hruq Zwrtq mig a'q.
16.16: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij heug zx'q Byaud myenb Zamq Eei taaib. ninb Bua zyrug mivb zx'q naaiq teij myenb. Ga'haaq yia yaag heug zung xq myenb Zamq Eei taaib. ninb Bua zyrug mivb nxmb nxm tomb Bov fiub Bov Zauj la'pyeib Qavj zx'q ninb Bua.
16.20: paamb myenb haib weig kanb zeij zyenb fai? naaiq maiq zeid zyenb.”
16.17: weig zu'g yia Eei mziv mavg Jyenq ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq Jauq. ninb Bua pivj maiq Jyenq yia. ninb Bua Eei zwid yaag pivj yia Eei mziv maiq Bweid.
16.14: zyruq kxvq, “Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, maiq maaib myenb cvj kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq, tovb txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq taub.’
16.4: ninb Bua zuvq zu'g Zyruq Eei wrnb pcvg taig yaag maiq maaib haiq taub weig ninb Bua Raub Eyemq, maiq maaib haiq taub pyopq. ninb Bua Eei sei zyrug yem uaq Dau Navq Gaiq nx. ninb Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj taig. ninb Bua Eei sei zyrug penj Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Zauj Daub peib Eei Yiab zxib Eei Eang hopq.
16.21: “weig naaiq yia xij pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q. naaiq Rung yia xij pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia Eei Qa'q, Zauj yia Dovg haaij henq. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia Eei Buaj se zyruq.
16.2: “meib yem naaiq nxm teib puv maiq tuvq lovg auq, maiq tuvq maaib txn maaib sia'q.
16.6: lyemb zruj Lo zruj faij zuvq zu'g yem naaiq nxm teib puv taig. maiq maaib haiq taub pyopq fai weig ninb Bua Raub Eyemq, fai kaatq sin fai Teij mGxvq weig ninb Bua Raub.
16.13: weig naaiq yia xij zx'q meib Bua yem naaiq nxm teib puv Zwrtq mivb Tauj meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij maiq hiuq Jiaj Eei teib puv. yem uaq meib Bua zyrug zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd fub suj Eiag Eei zyenb, weig zu'g yia maiq zruj haiq Euvg Kxb lyenb meib Bua.’
16.12: mq paag meib Bua zruj kaub waaig Jiaj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij weig zu'g kx'g myenb ei Jyenq kx'g myenb kanb x'q Eei eij zruj Hruq vcvg, maiq Kavq mwavj yia.
16.15: mq paag ninb Bua xij kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq, tovb txb i-saa-laa-en myenb yem pa'q puv Eei txvj, Zauj yia zung ninb Bua mivb Tauj Eei nxmb nxm kua'q Rwrnj taaib.’ weig zu'g yia xij txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib yem tovb zinb Daavg yia Jiu pun ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv.”
16.11: uaq zang meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, zyruq kxvq, ‘se laaij meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij kwavg yia mivb kan Eiag Eei zyenb zyrug fub suj, paaij uaq teij zyenb. ninb Bua kwavg yia, maiq ei Jyenq yia Eei leib latg zruj.
16.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
16.10: “meib zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag Buaj naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua xij naaig meib, ‘zyruq weig haiq tiug kxvq xij pun yia Bua zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq ze'g naang? yia Bua zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig? yia Bua paamd haiq Euvg zwid txvg zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb?

40.3: zyruq pun naaiq teij sig Zwrtq, yaag ei Jyenq ninb kxvq Eei waag zruj. laaij meib Bua paamd zwid txvg zyruq, maiq mwavj ninb Eei waag, meib Bua Zivj zu'g naaiq teij sig.
40.8: ninb Bua mivb mitq-paa lxd ke-Daa-li-yaa. maaib ne-Taa-ni-yaa Eei txn, i-saa-maa-en, Zauj Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, Zauj Tan-hu-metq Eei txn, sej-lai-aa, Zauj ne-To-faa myenb, e-faai Eei txn Bua Zauj maa-aa-Kaa myenb Eei txn, ye-san-yaa, lyemb ninb Bua kanb Zauj ninb Bua Eei myenb.
40.9: saa-faan Eei fun, aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, hruq Jyenq lcvd waag Buaj ninb Bua Zauj ninb Bua Eei myenb kxvq, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj fub suj Ken-Dia myenb. kunq yem teib puv fub suj Baa-Bi-lon huvb, meib Bua zyrug tu'q lovj.
40.7: yem lomb Waav Eei yetg zuvq pcvb pyeiq Zauj ninb Bua Eei pcv mwavj haid Baa-Bi-lon huvb lyepg aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, zruj teib puv Eei scvb zyruq, pun ninb kunq maiq zu'g kwaatq mivb Baa-Bi-lon zevg Fiag kaub Jomg Jiaj Eei myenb, mJavg msia'q Zauj fu'Jweiq.
40.5: sij kxvq meib Zxg yem naaiq kunq Rwrnj mivb Zauj saa-faan Eei fun, aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, uaq. Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb Paaiq ninb zruj yu-Daa Eei zivb Eei scvb zyruq. Zauj ninb yem naaig pc'g fivj Eei Bu'Dovj. fai meib pwatg haiq nxm txvj hxpg zu'g mivb nx, kunq mivb a'q.” kruj huvb tiaj Eei pcvb pyeiq zyrug pun teij pyenb fwij Zauj zivb Eeig ye-le-mi yaag puvj ninb mivb a'q.
40.16: mq paag aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, Buaj Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, “meib maiq tuvq Navq naaig zruj, weig zu'g meib kxvq Tauj i-saa-maa-en uaq teij waag se Jaaq Eei.”
40.14: yaag kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib hiuq Eei fai? am-mon myenb Eei huvb, Baa-aa-litq, Paaiq ne-Taa-ni-yaa Eei txn, i-saa-maa-en, taaib zx'q meib Eei mcvg.” mq paag aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, maiq syenj ninb Bua.
40.4: ib zang yia Jaiq Gxi Dob meib Eei puad Eei limg. sij kxvq meib pwatg hxpg Zauj yia mivb Baa-Bi-lon, kunq mivb, yia zyrug kruj lovj meib. mq paag sij kxvq meib pwatg maiq hxpg zu'g Zauj yia mivb Baa-Bi-lon, maiq tuvq mivb. mavg maa'b! zyavb nxm teib puv yem meib Eei Ra'Myen. ziuj meib pwatg haiq nxm txvj lovj yaag hxpg, kunq mivb a'q.
40.2: kruj huvb Eei pcvb pyeiq heug ye-le-mi taaib kxvq, “zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq naaiq nxm txvj xij zu'g naaiq teij Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.
40.6: ye-le-mi zyrug mivb mitq-paa lxd aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, Zauj ninb yem uaq teib puv zevg Fiag Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj.
40.13: Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, Zauj yem lomb Waav uaq teij Junb pcv Eei yetg zuvq pcvb pyeiq, taaib Tauj mitq-paa lxd ke-Daa-li-yaa,
40.12: yetg zuvq yiu-Tai myenb zyrug yem ninb Bua zu'g zung mivb yem Eei nxmb nxm txvj Rwrnj taaib Tauj yu-Daa teib puv mivb mitq-paa, ke-Daa-li-yaa uaq. ninb Bua tu'q syru a'vung tiuq Zauj Gaai kxv Eei pyruq Zamq Eei.
40.15: Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, yem mitq-paa pivj Jyenq kxvq Buaj ke-Daa-li-yaa, “Toq pun yia mivb taij ne-Taa-ni-yaa Eei txn, i-saa-maa-en, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub hiuq. weig haiq tiug pun ninb zx'q meib Eei mcvg, pun kapq zunq taaib meib naaiq Eei yiu-Tai myenb Raanj, yaag pun zevg Fiag Eei yu-Daa myenb zu'g myetg?”
40.11: fib Navq Eei, yem mo-apg teig, yem am-mon myenb Bu'Dovj, yem e-Dom teig, Zauj yem kanb kua'q Eei yetg zuvq yiu-Tai myenb, haid kxvq Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb lyrub Fiag teij yu-Daa myenb, yaag Paaiq saa-faan Eei fun, aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, zruj scvb zyruq kunq ninb Bua.
40.1: kruj huvb Eei pcvb pyeiq, ne-Bu-saa-laa-Daan, zx'q ye-le-mi Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj yu-Daa yetg zuvq myenb, Dob Jyenq limg kwaatq mivb Baa-Bi-lon. yem laa-maa ninb puvj ye-le-mi. Ga'haaq ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag.
40.10: yia kanb c'q, xij yem mitq-paa. zuaq Ken-Dia myenb taaib lxd Bua, yia haib yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen tiq meib Bua. meib Bua c'q, xij zu'g syru a'vung tiuq Zauj Gaai kxv Eei pyruq Zauj ka'lanq yrub, tapq Jyenq meib Bua Eei Jaab txvj ka'Euad. kunq yem Jyenq meib Bua Zaavq tu'q Eei zivb.”

37.18: ye-le-mi cvj naaig sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb, “yia zruj txvg haiq Euvg pun meib fai meib Eei Jyen fai naaiq teij pc'g fivj meib Zivj pun yia zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob?
37.3: sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb Paaiq se-le-mi-yaa Eei txn, ye-hu-Kan, Zauj maa-aa-sej-aa sai myenb Eei txn, sej-fan-yaa, mivb lxd trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq, “Toq weig yia Bua tauj kauj Jrub zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb.”
37.8: Ken-Dia myenb cvj xij taaib Bx'q naaiq nxm zivb, Zaavq tu'q, yaag lovg trud puaq.”+’
37.19: trug waag kxvq, ‘Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb maiq taaib Bx'q meib fai Bx'q naaiq nxm teib puv,’ uaq teij trug waag myenb yem haaij?
37.9: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua maiq tuvq Duaq kanb kxvq, “Ken-Dia myenb Dovg haaij zuvq maiq taaib yia Bua naaiq.” weig zu'g ninb Bua zuvq xij taaib Eei.
37.7: “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yu-Daa Eei huvb Paaiq myenb taaib lxd meib Toq naaig yia, meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq tau ninb, “mavg maa'b! faa-lo huvb Eei Junb pcv Zwrtq taaib Tevj meib mq paag ninb Bua zuvq xij Rwrnj ninb Bua kanb Eei pwrnb kua'q, i-yipq.
37.5: faa-lo Eei Junb pcv kwanb zuvq Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv. weib Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Ken-Dia myenb mwavj haid fyenj kxvq Tauj uaq teij myenb, ninb Bua zyrug yem ye-lu-saa-lem Twij mig a'q.
37.16: ye-le-mi zu'g wrnj Jyenq lob Mwavj yaag yem uaq Zamb Nxi Eei.
37.20: ib zang Toq yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, mwavj yia. Toq zipq yia yem meib Eei Ra'Myen Jrub Eei waag. Toq meib maiq tuvq fuvj yia Rwrnj mivb yem yo-naa-Taan srub piuq Eei pyauq. Riaj yia haib yem uaq taig.”
37.17: sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb Paaiq myenb mivb txb ye-le-mi Zwrtq taaib zyrug zipq ninb. huvb tiaj yem ninb Eei ting pivj Jyenq naaig ninb, “zyruq maaib haiq Euvg waag kxvq fai?” ye-le-mi tau, “maaib Eei.” ninb cvj kxvq, “meib xij zu'g Jiu pun yem Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei puab Diaq.”
37.14: ye-le-mi kxvq, “naaiq maiq zyen. yia maiq zeid pyauj mivb lxd Ken-Dia myenb.” mq paag i-li-yaa maiq mwavj ye-le-mi Eei waag zyrug zx'q ninb txb mivb Tauj Jyen uaq.
37.4: uaq zang ye-le-mi Zxg yem pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj pia'g pia'g Zwrtg Zwrtq, weig zu'g ninb maiq kcvb zu'g wrnj lob.
37.21: huvb tiaj zyrug Fiag livg. ninb Bua txb ye-le-mi mivb yem syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad. ninb Bua Nxib Nxi pun nxm Fuaq ninb, tovb yem zruj Fuaq zavg uaq tiub Jauq zx'q taaib, Tauj zivb ka'Euad Eei Fuaq Revg mig a'q. ye-le-mi zyrug yem Jyenq syruq kcv myenb Eei laatg ka'Euad.
37.2: mq paag sej-De-Ki-yaa fai ninb Eei Jyen fai teib puv Eei pc'g fivj maiq maaib haiq taub mwavj zyruq Eei waag, tovb ninb lovg trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq Eei waag.
37.6: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
37.13: mivb Tauj Ben-yaa-min kcvb, maaib taub zuaq kcvb myenb, se haa-nan-yaa Eei fun, se-le-mi-yaa Eei txn, i-li-yaa, zx'q Jyenq trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq, “meib pyauj mivb lxd Ken-Dia myenb a'q nyaa.”
37.12: ye-le-mi yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zwrtq Jauq mivb Ben-yaa-min teig weig yem uaq teij pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj tu'q Ripg ninb kanb Eei pwrng.
37.15: uaq teij Jyen Qiaj Jiad! haig ye-le-mi, zyrug Bx'q ninb cvj txb ninb mivb wrnj Jyenq yo-naa-Taan srub piuq Eei pyauq, weig zu'g naaiq nxm pyauq zruj penj lob mig a'q.
37.11: Ken-Dia Eei Junb pcv Twij ye-lu-saa-lem weig zu'g faa-lo Eei Junb pcv Tauj fatq uaq zang,
37.1: yo-si-yaa Eei txn, sej-De-Ki-yaa, se Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, lyepg zruj huvb kunq yu-Daa tiq ye-ho-yaa-Kim Eei txn, Ko-ni-yaa.
37.10: maiq kunq meib Bua Bx'q hivb Ken-Dia Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv, tovb taaib Bx'q meib Bua uaq teij, Kuvj zevg zu'g mun Eei myenb Navq, kx'g myenb yem kx'g myenb Eei Dopg liub, ninb Bua zuvq xij Jiad sin taaib lovg trud puaq naaiq nxm zivb.’+”

4.18: “meib Eei Jauq Zauj meib zruj Eei, pun meib zu'g naaiq teij sig. naaiq se meib zu'g myetg Eei Jauq yaag za'kevb im haig, zuvq Kruq Tauj meib Eei Hruq a'q.”
4.8: weig naaiq meib Bua xij zu'g sai Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru, Eyemq Jyenq heug Qiaj Bwi Eei, weig zu'g zyruq Zxg za'kevb! Qiaj Jiad haig yia Bua, maiq Win kanb puv.”
4.3: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj yu-Daa Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb, “xij zu'g za'q meib Bua Eei Deib Luvq, yaag maiq tuvq haad Eim yem Fimb lomg ka'Euad.
4.21: yia xij zu'g mavg uaq Kwaaiq keb cvj mwavj Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi Dovg haaij laub?
4.14: ye-lu-saa-lem aa'b! xij zu'g Raauj Revg Hruq ka'Euad Eei x'q sig weig pun meib tu'q Fruj. meib Namq Zwrtq x'q Eei Jauq xij yem meib Eei Hruq Tauj haiq zang?
4.23: yia mavg Daub peib yaag pwatg Kuvb Kuvj Waavb Waav uaq. yia mavg luvb, yem naaig yaag maiq maaib Fav.
4.6: xij zu'g huvj Jyenq si-on Zia keb, xij zu'g kaanq pyauj, maiq tuvq vaib weig pyauj Dutq, weig zu'g yia txb Zyruq Eei ze'g naang Zauj pun myenb zu'g myetg Eei tomb sig yem pa'q puv taaib.”
4.2: sij kxvq meib yaag Kauj zyen leid, pcvb fim Eei, Hruq zivj Eei zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq hruq waag, maang kua'q myenb zyrug Kauj ninb tu'q fu'q, ninb Bua yaag xij Taaib ninb.”
4.20: ze'g naang Ripg Jyenq ze'g naang taaib, zyavb nxm teib puv zu'g paaig Waav. yia Eei Dopg liub lyemb zeib zu'g myetg, yetg sib ken Navq yia Eei Bc'g kcvb Dia huq Revg.
4.24: yia mavg tomb Bov yaag pwatg tovd Revg, yetg zuvq Bovb txn yaag laib mivb laib taaib.
4.28: weig naaiq teij sig Daub peib zyrug Raub Eyemq, kub vwaaig luvb xij Jia'q mivb, weig zu'g yia kxvq liud a'q, yia tivg zyavj, yia maiq kxiq yeng, zuvq maiq kxiq Rwrnj.”
4.7: maaib syenb yem ninb pivj Eei lomb Byx'g Zwrtq taaib, paaig waaig kua'q uaq taub yaag Zwrtq Jauq. ninb yem ninb Eei txvj Zwrtq mivb, weig pun meib Eei teib puv penj paaig Waav Eei txvj. meib Eei zivb zyrug penj Baav waaig Eei zivb, maiq maaib haiq taub yem.
4.29: haid keb maad pcv Zauj pwrnq Jwavb zinj Eei Qiaj Bwi, nxmb nxm zivb Eei myenb pyauj. ninb Bua pia'g lomb Byx'g, Exv faauj la'pyeiq, nxmb nxm zivb zu'g kwavg Waav, maiq maaib yetg laanb myenb yem ka'Euad.
4.19: yia Kruq! haig. yia za'kevb! Kruq haig. mun kau, tiaq maiq hivb. yia Eei Hruq mun tu'q Kruq haig, Ba'Riu Bokg Bokg Eei tovd tu'q seij haig. yia maiq haib sekq, weig zu'g yia haid pyomq Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi, penj xij Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj.
4.17: ninb Bua weib Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem Navq zuaq Deig myenb zuaq Deig, laaij yu-Daa vcvg yia.’+” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
4.31: yia haid Qiaj heug Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad, mun Kruq Navq yuvd taaub Txi kub vwaad. se si-on zivb Eei Qiaj aaq lamb zutg Eei zyavb hog heug Jyenq, yaag suv Jyenq puad kxvq, “yia zu'g Kruq a'q. yia txv Jyenq taij myenb Eei myenb Eei Ra'Myen zyrug meib a'q.”
4.30: meib zu'g paaig Waav uaq taub aa'b! meib fuvg zu'q lwib si'q, yaag zxv Jyenq Jyem Eei syrub setq, yaag lovg setq Raatq mziv weig pun mziv Lo? meib zxv kanb Rweig yaag maiq lamb lovg. Namq meib uaq teij mavg Piaj meib, zuvq xij zx'q meib Eei mcvg.
4.27: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “luvb Diaq Daub peib xij penj zu'g paaig Waav Eei txvj. maiq kunq Navq naaig, yia yaag maiq myetg Revg.
4.11: Tauj uaq zang maaib waag Buaj naaiq teij pc'g fivj Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem, “maaib Ryaaub Jxm yem teib puvb Waav Lav, Fav Eei txvj huvj Jyenq yia Eei zwavj pc'g fivj, maiq zeid weig pwrng mauj Eei ka'naaiq Zwrtq fai pun Zivb Revg.
4.5: “xij zu'g yem yu-Daa kxvq yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem zunb kxvq, ‘xij zu'g pyomq Jxv kxmj teib puv’ cvj Qa'q heug Qiaj Bwi Eei kxvq, ‘kapq zunq taaib maa'b! Bua xij zu'g pia'g weib wrnq Eei zivb.
4.9: zyruq kxvq, “Tauj uaq Nxi huvb tiaj Zauj Jyen Ba'Riu yu'g, sai myenb kamb Riaj, trug waag myenb yaag Bua'g hxvb haig.”
4.16: “xij zu'g zunb Buaj maang kua'q myenb, winb wavq xij taaib, yaag kxvq Buaj ye-lu-saa-lem, ‘maaib winb wavq yem ko Eei teib puv taaib weib kxmj naug yu-Daa Eei zivb.
4.4: yu-Daa myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij zu'g Jiaj kaatq Eei leid fuvj pun zyruq, yaag xij zu'g Jamq Hruq, Riaj laaij meib Bua zruj Eei x'q sig, yia Eei ka'Qiaj haib pctq Zwrtq Navq trud nx Fopg taaib, yaag maiq maaib myenb haib Bx'q taig.
4.10: yia zyrug kxvq, “zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! meib za'kevb Duaq naaiq teij pc'g fivj Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem myenb Revg, weig zu'g meib kxvq, ‘meib Bua xij tu'q yem lovj.’ taauj Rwrnj Ru'g Daauq zuvq hxig Jyenq ninb Bua Eei mcvg a'q.”
4.22: zyruq kxvq, “yia Eei pc'g fivj Vovj, maiq hiuq tu'q yia. ninb Bua se maiq hiuq haiq Euvg Eei naamb Erud, maiq pia'g Hruq haiq Euvg. zruj waaig Eei Jauq ninb Bua haib haig, mq paag ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx zruj lovj.”
4.12: zuvq xij maaib tomb Ryaauj kaub Lo Jiaj naaig ziuj yia hatg Eei waag pwrng taaib. ib zang yia kanb kxvq Zwrtq waag tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid.”
4.15: maaib Qiaj yem Daan zunb yaavb, yem e-faa-im Bov zunb kxvq Zyruq Eei sig.
4.13: mavg maa'b! ninb faauj taaib Navq Bwrnj, ninb Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Navq Ryaaub zung, ninb Eei maad kaub syepq tomb Jaavq. yia Bua zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g yia Bua zu'g paaig Revg.
4.1: zyruq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en aa'b! sij kxvq meib xij Rwrnj, Rwrnj taaib lxd yia maa'b! sij kxvq meib zx'q Zwrtq meib kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq maiq pun yem yia Eei Ra'Myen, meib yaag maiq Luvb Lwrtq,
4.26: yia mavg yaag pwatg Daub Jung penj teib puvb Waav. teib puv Eei yetg zuvq zivb yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, txij ninb Qiaj Jiad! haig Eei zyavb hog, zu'g paaig waaig.
4.25: yia mavg, pwatg maiq maaib yetg laanb myenb, Daamb luvb Eei yetg zuvq nx'g yaag pyauj Revg.

51.18: miub favj maiq maaib Jaab zinb, zruj taaib penj Jaaq Eei ka'naaiq Navq. Tauj ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua zyrug zu'g myetg.
51.45: “yia Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! meib Bua xij zu'g yem ninb pyauj Zwrtq. kx'g myenb xij zu'g Fruj kx'g myenb Eei mcvg, pyauj Dutq zyruq Zyruq haig Eei ka'Qiaj.
51.3: maiq tuvq pun pwrnq Jwavb zinj Eei myenb pcv Jwavb zinj, yaag maiq tuvq pun ninb zu'q Lia'g lwi sruq Jyenq. maiq tuvq lyrub ninb Eei myenb lunj myenb Eei mcvg. xij zu'g myetg Revg ninb Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv.
51.43: ninb Eei zivb penj kamb Riaj Eei txvj, penj teib puvb haand, teib puvb Waav, maiq maaib myenb yem Eei teib puv, yaag maiq maaib paamb myenb Jiaj mivb.
51.50: meib Bua pyauj Dutq Ru'g Daauq Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g kaanq mivb, maiq tuvq vaib. yem ko Eei txvj Javj zyruq, yaag pun meib Bua Eei Hruq Javj ye-lu-saa-lem.
51.14: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq zyavq Jyenq ninb kanb hruq waag kxvq, yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij pun meib maaib myenb pwavq Dovg Jopg Eeig Zamq, ninb Bua zyrug naug Jyenq weig Bx'q hivb meib.
51.48: uaq zang luvb Zauj Dau Zauj yem luvb Dau ka'Euad Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq zyrug weig Baa-Bi-lon Fyenb yrub Eei heug weig zu'g zruj myetg Eei myenb xij yem pa'q puv taaib Bx'q ninb Bua.   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
51.34: “Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, na'q yia, yaag vatq Jyenq yia. ninb pun yia zruj Kuvj Eei Jaab txvj, ninb na'q yia Navq tomb Byaud. yia maaib haiq Euvg Kuq Eei ninb Eang pwavq ka'sia, yaag Twiq yia Zwrtq mivb.”
51.2: yia yaag xij Paaiq myenb mivb Eomj Baa-Bi-lon, ninb Bua zyrug Eomj ninb a'q. Tauj Kruq naang Eei Nxi ninb Bua yem puvb puv taaib zruj pun ninb uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug pun ninb Eei teib puv Kuvj Revg.
51.36: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij Tevj meib Bua Zcvj sig, cvj Tevj meib Bua Jaauq win. yia xij pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei Kxiq Gaai, yaag pun ninb Eei uamb zivq Gaai.
51.35: pun si-on Eei pc'g fivj kxvq, “ninb zruj to'g yia cvj hxig yia Eei Zyenb Ze'q, Toq pun Dxtq zu'g Baa-Bi-lon.” pun ye-lu-saa-lem kxvq, “Toq pun lyrug yia Eei Ryaamq Zwrtq Eei zwid Dxtq zu'g Ken-Dia myenb.”
51.24: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij txv Jyenq meib Bua Eei mziv Jaauq win pun Baa-Bi-lon Zauj yem Ken-Dia teib puv Eei yetg zuvq pc'g fivj weig ninb Bua yem si-on zruj Eei yetg zuvq x'q sig.”
51.61: ye-le-mi kxvq Buaj sej-lai-aa, “meib mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon meib zuvq xij zu'g to'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag,
51.7: zinb Daavg Baa-Bi-lon Navq nxm Jyemb zaanq yem zyruq Eei puad, pun luvb Diaq myenb Gwin mivb. maang kua'q myenb hopq ninb Eei a'vung tiuq, ninb Bua zyrug putq Din mig a'q.
51.17: “taub taub paamb myenb se Vovj Eei, maiq maaib wrnb zaav. mrud taub Jyemb zavg laaij ninb Bua zruj Eei miub favj zu'g Eaiq, weig zu'g ninb Eei miub favj se Jaaq Eei, maiq maaib yetg teij Qiaj Tauq.
51.58: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “Baa-Bi-lon Javq Eei zivb laatg zuvq xij zu'g Baav Fiag Dau. ninb Lav Eei zivb kcvb yaag xij zu'g trud puaq. zwavj pc'g fivj zruj kov yaag maiq lamb lovg. maang kua'q myenb laaub lwig zruj Eei Kuvj zu'g trud puaq.”
51.49: Baa-Bi-lon xij zu'g Baav laaij pun i-saa-laa-en myenb taig, Navq luvb Diaq myenb zu'g Baa-Bi-lon taij taig.
51.11: “xij zu'g Ryruj laig fxvb Zav, nanq Jyenq Txvb paaib.   zyruq tovd zu'g mi-Dia myenb Eei huvb, weig zu'g kxvq Tauj Baa-Bi-lon,   zyruq Eei eij se xij myetg Revg. weig zu'g naaiq se zyruq Jaauq win, se weig ninb Eei pyauq Jaauq win.
51.33: weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “Baa-Bi-lon myenb se Navq Bx'q Byaub Zyavq txij zu'g Zaaiq Eei zyavb hog. aaq tavb Navq, syru ninb Eei Byaub Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q.”
51.16: ninb yetq Zwrtq Qiaj, yem uaq luvb maaib uam Eei Qiaj Bwi zob zod Eei. ninb pun mrug yem luvb kxn faauj. ninb pun Ba'livg kan Byuvg, yaag pun Ryaauj yem ninb syru Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib.
51.40: “yia xij txb ninb Bua Fiag taaib Navq txb mivb taij Eei pa'ki yuvb txn, Navq pa'ki yuvb kruq Zauj yuvb kruq.
51.59: sej-De-Ki-yaa zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb ta'feij Havj uaq Havj, mivb Baa-Bi-lon Eei zyavb hog, maa-sej-yaa Eei fun, ne-li-yaa Eei txn, sej-lai-aa, Zauj ninb mivb. sej-lai-aa zruj pyeiq zeiq Beng ninb Bua hitq Eei txvj. naaiq se trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, Paaiq sej-lai-aa txb mivb Eei waag.
51.37: Baa-Bi-lon zyrug penj Baav waaig Eei ka'naaib Dwi, penj Yiab Juq yem Eei txvj, pun myenb kamb Riaj, pun myenb Wrtq, yaag maiq maaib myenb yem.
51.4: Ken-Dia myenb yem kanb Eei teib puv zu'g taij taig, yaag yem uaq Jaaib hxvg zu'g mun.
51.51: “yia Bua mwavj haid Wrtq Eei waag yia Bua zyrug zu'g Eaiq, yaag pun yia Bua za'kevb zu'g paaig Myen, weig zu'g kanb fivj myenb taaib pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, Zivb Revg Eei txvj.”
51.62: yaag kxvq, ‘zyruq aag, meib kxvq Tauj naaiq nxm txvj, se meib xij Pai kwavg zyrug lyemb myenb, lyemb scvb Kuq, maiq maaib haiq Euvg yem, xij zu'g yetg liud penj Daub Waav.
51.12: xij zu'g lyepg keb Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon Eei zivb laatg, pun zuaq Eei pcv Jaa henq, Paaiq zyavj syruq kcv Eei pcv, yaag liug leid zyavj pivj Jyenq zuaq Eei myenb, weig zu'g zyruq taaq za'eij yaag zruj zyavj ziuj ninb zyavq Jyenq kxvq Baa-Bi-lon myenb Eei waag.
51.46: maiq tuvq pun meib Eei Hruq mau, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj, weig meib haid teib puv ka'Euad Eei fyenj. tovb naaiq Havj maaib fyenj taaib, ta'Eeig Havj cvj maaib fyenj taaib. teib puv ka'Euad yaag maaib to'g Eei sig, zruj Lo kunq Eei myenb laanb Zauj laanb txib tekg.
51.13: meib yem uam Zamq Eei ka'Len, maaib zinb zxib Zamq Eei myenb aa'b! meib Eei setq mweid Tauj a'q, meib zyavb uaq tiub mcvg Tauj prug a'q.
51.26: “myenb maiq yem meib naaiq zx'q la'pyeiq fai zruj pyaub kx'q Eei la'pyeiq, yaag maiq lovg haiq nxm zruj kxnb Do'q Eei la'pyeiq. meib zuvq xij zu'g penj yetg liud paaig Waav Eei txvj.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
51.28: liug leid maang kua'q myenb taaib Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon, heug mi-Dia myenb Eei huvb Zauj ninb Bua Eei scvb zyruq Zauj scvb zyruq Eei pxvb puad myenb, Zauj mi-Dia kunq Eei nxmb nxm teib puv.
51.54: “mwavj maa'b! maaib Qiaj yem Baa-Bi-lon heug. yem Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv maaib zu'g myetg Eei tomb Qiaj Bwi.
51.63: meib to'g liud naaiq Fung sru xij zu'g zx'q sru pavg nxm la'pyeiq Dob Jyenq zxi yu-fe-titg Daaib ka'Euad.
51.8: Baa-Bi-lon lyemb zeib Baav Fiag huq Revg, xij zu'g weig ninb Eyemq. txb Diab laavb Yetq ninb mun Eei txvj, Riaj ninb haib zxg lovj taaib.
51.9: “+‘yia Bua xij zxg Baa-Bi-lon mq paag zxg maiq lovj. xij zu'g kwavg ninb a'q, kx'g myenb Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei kua'q. weig zu'g ninb zu'g syemq zwid Bcvg luvb. zuvq Dwi Jyenq Tauj Daamb luvb.’
51.32: Jiaj Eei Jaub prug zu'g Zaavq mig a'q. weib wrnq Eei txvj zu'g trud puaq. Junb pcv yaag lung Revg.
51.21: yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng maad Zauj keb maad myenb. yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng Bx'q Jaaj maab Zia Zauj zaavq Zia Eei myenb.
51.64: xij zu'g kxvq, “Baa-Bi-lon xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zemb Fiag, yetg liud maiq haib Byrub faauj, laaij yia pun ninb zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.’+” ye-le-mi kxvq Eei waag zevg Fiag Bua'g naaiq.
51.57: yia xij pun ninb Eei Jyen Zauj ninb Eei Zovb mevb myenb, ninb Eei scvb zyruq Zauj scvb zyruq Eei pxvb puad myenb, Zauj ninb henq haig Eei pcv tiuq Gwin. ninb Bua zyrug mFxmb mivb, yetg liud mFxmb maiq Eia.” huvb tiaj, tovb maaib Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, Navq naaiq kxvq.
51.23: yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb Zauj ninb Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb. yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng zruj Deig Eei myenb Zauj ninb Eei yetg txij vovb. yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng scvb zyruq Zauj zruj Lo Eei Jyen.”
51.6: “yem Baa-Bi-lon ka'Euad pyauj maa'b! kx'g myenb Fruj kx'g myenb Eei mcvg. maiq tuvq laaij ninb zu'g tivg zwid weig zu'g naaiq se zyruq Jaauq win Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q, ziuj Baa-Bi-lon zruj Eei xij winb pun ninb.
51.55: weig zu'g zyruq zruj pun Baa-Bi-lon penj Daub Waav, pun ninb Bwi Eei tomb Qiaj sekq. ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Navq uam Zamq Eei uamb laavg Bwi, ninb Bua Eei Qiaj Byrub Byrub Eei Zwrtq.
51.44: yia xij tivg yem Baa-Bi-lon Eei Ben zyenb Eei zwid, ninb na'q Fiag Eei ka'naaiq yia xij pun ninb loq Zwrtq. maang kua'q myenb maiq tu'q cvj mivb lxd ninb, Baa-Bi-lon Eei zivb laatg Baav mig a'q.
51.20: “meib se yia lovg Bx'q Jaaj Eei Lia'g zweib Zauj ua'g king. yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng ziaj fivj. yia lovg meib myetg Zamb nxm kua'q.
51.5: weig zu'g i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yu-Daa myenb maiq zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, kwavg ninb Bua, maiq kunq ninb Bua Eei teib puv paamd zwid zruj txvg i-saa-laa-en Eei Zivb Revg Tinb huvb.
51.56: zruj myetg uaq taub taaib Bx'q, se taaib Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon. ninb Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv zu'g Zaavq mivb, ninb Bua Eei Jwavb zinj nauq mwrng. weig zu'g zyruq se Jaauq win Eei Tinb huvb, ninb Dovg haaij zuvq xij Jaauq win.
51.53: maiq kunq Baa-Bi-lon faauj Tauj luvb, yaag maiq kunq ninb Zeij ninb Lav Jiaj Eei txvj wrnq, yia xij pun zruj myetg Eei myenb taaib myetg ninb.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
51.19: yaa-Kopq Eei pwrng maiq Navq naaiq teij, weig zu'g ninb se zeij maang mwrtg uaq taub, i-saa-laa-en se ninb Ripg taaib Eei fivj, ninb Eei Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq.
51.38: ninb Bua xij lomb Rxib Funb Navq syenb nx, ninb Bua yaag xij Navq syenb txn nx heug.
51.31: trug fyenj myenb yetg taub Tiuj mivb Ripg yetg taub, fuvj fyenj Eei myenb Ripg Jyenq fuvj Fiag yetg taub, mivb Buaj Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ninb Eei pyei puv zivb zu'g Zaavq mig a'q.
51.52: zyruq kxvq, “weig naaiq mavg maa'b! Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij tivg Baa-Bi-lon Eei miub favj Eei zwid. yem kxmj ninb Eei teib puv zu'g mun Eei myenb xij Funb Jyenq yem.
51.27: “yem Daub peib lyepg keb, yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj pyomq Jxv, heug maang kua'q myenb liug leid taaib Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon, heug naaiq teij kua'q taaib Bx'q ninb. se aa-laa-latq, min-ni Zauj atg-Ke-natq. Paaiq Junb pcvb pyeiq taaib Bx'q ninb, Paaiq maad faauj taaib Navq Jopg Eeig kwanb.
51.60: ye-le-mi zx'q Baa-Bi-lon xij zu'g pwavb Eei yetg zuvq Zyruq Eei ze'g naang fiaq Fiag sru. naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag kxvq Tauj Baa-Bi-lon.
51.41: “Baa-Bi-lon zu'g Zaavq mig a'q. luvb Diaq myenb Zev Eei txvj zu'g Zaavq mig a'q. Baa-Bi-lon yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj penj myenb kamb Riaj Eei txvj.
51.1: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij pun zruj myetg Eei Ryaauj pwrng taaib zruj pun Baa-Bi-lon, Zauj Ken-Dia myenb.
51.39: ninb Bua Jxm Jyenq zruj Eei zyavb hog, yia xij weig ninb Bua Beng Naavj Lo Eei, pun ninb Bua tiuq Gwin Tauj ninb Bua meib mwavq, yaag yetg liud mFxmb, maiq Eia.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
51.47: weig naaiq mavg maa'b! Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij tivg Baa-Bi-lon miub favj Eei zwid. ninb Eei zyavb nxm teib puv zyrug Eaiq, ninb Eei yetg zuvq zu'g taij taig Eei myenb zyrug yem ninb ka'Euad Kiv Fiag.
51.10: zyruq pun Ziv yia Bua hxpg. taaib maa'b! Bua xij zu'g mivb si-on zunb kxvq   zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, zruj Eei kov.
51.25: zyruq kxvq, “zruj myetg Eei Bov aa'b! se myetg luvb Diaq uaq nxm Bov, yia Zauj meib txib tekg a'q. yia xij suv yia Eei puad Zwrtq zruj pun meib, pun meib yem Bcvb nivq Favj Fiag mivb, pun meib penj puaq Qwi Eei Bov.”
51.22: yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng mJavg msia'q. yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng myenb koj myenb Zauj myenb lunj myenb. yia lovg meib Bx'q mwrng hrub scv Zauj sia'g txn.
51.42: Kxiq Eei uam faauj yemj Baa-Bi-lon, ninb zu'g Kxiq pe'q Eei uamb laavg Gomd Jyenq ninb.
51.15: “Tinb huvb lovg ninb Eei Qa'q zeij Dau, lovg ninb Eei Zovb mevb lyepg paamb ken, lovg ninb mevb pc'g Eei Jauq Zxv luvb.
51.29: Dau tovd, laaij mun yaag nyrub nyruq Eei, weig zu'g zyruq tivg zruj pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei za'eij Zxg yem Eei, se xij pun Baa-Bi-lon penj Daub Waav, maiq maaib myenb yem.
51.30: Baa-Bi-lon Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv tivb Fiag maiq Bx'q, ninb Bua yem Jyenq ninb Bua wrnq Eei txvj. ninb Bua Eei Qa'q Twij mig a'q, ninb Bua zyrug Navq msia'q txn nx. Baa-Bi-lon yem Eei txvj maaib trud zia'g Jyenq, ninb Eei kcvb sxn yaag nauq mig a'q.

12.3: mq paag zyruq aag, meib hiuq tu'q yia. meib pwatg yia, yaag seij yia Eei Hruq Navq haiq nx Namq Tauj meib. Toq Tx ninb Bua Zwrtq taaib Navq xij zu'g taij taig Eei pa'ki yuvb. zx'q taaib pun Gxi zuaq Jyenq zu'g taij Eei Nxi.
12.8: yia Ripg Eei pwrng weig yia Navq lomg Eei syenb ninb heug Jyenq xij hxig yia, yia zyrug Rxv ninb.
12.9: yia Ripg Eei pwrng weig yia Navq nxm zx'q xq Eang Eei nx'g pen fai? zx'q xq Eang Eei nx'g maiq zeid yem Wiv kxmj ninb fai? kunq mivb a'q. pun lomb Waav Eei yetg zuvq Yiab zxib kapq zunq. txb ninb Bua taaib na'q maa'b!
12.7: “yia kwavg yia Eei pyauq, leib Gxi yia Ripg Eei pwrng. yia zx'q yia Eei Hruq Namq uaq taub Jiu pun yem ninb Eei winb wavq Eei puab Diaq.
12.5: zyruq kxvq, “sij kxvq meib Zauj myenb saaij Tiuj ninb Bua yaag pun meib haid Kruq, meib fuvg haib Zauj maad saaij Tiuj? sij kxvq meib yem pcvb xn Eei teib puv zuvq haib Dxpg, meib yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Len Eei lomg Navq haiq nx?
12.16: sij kxvq ninb Bua Jyenb ho'g ling yia Eei pc'g fivj syenj Eei Jauq, se zyavq Jyenq yia Eei Buaj hruq waag kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq hruq waag,’ Navq ninb Bua zinb Daavg Faauj yia Eei pc'g fivj zyavq Jyenq Baa-an zyenb hruq waag nx, ninb Bua zyrug yem yia Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj tu'q Zeij Jiad taaib.
12.17: sij kxvq haiq nxm kua'q Eei myenb maiq mwavj, yia zyrug pcv Zwrtq yaag myetg Tauj Revg.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
12.14: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “kxvq Tauj yem nitq fatq uaq teij yetg zuvq zruj x'q Eei myenb, tovb Rcv yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Ripg Eei pwrng uaq teij, yia xij zx'q ninb Bua pcv Zwrtq ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv, cvj zx'q yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Eei yu-Daa myenb pcv Zwrtq taaib.
12.4: naaiq nxm teib puv xij Bxvj Gaai Dovg haaij laub? yetg zuvq livb teig Eei miaq xij Eauj Tauj haiq zang? laaij yem naaiq teij txvj Eei myenb zruj Eei x'q sig Yiab zxib Zauj nx'g taig Revg. weig zu'g myenb kxvq, “zyruq maiq pwatg yia Bua setq mweid Eei zyavb hog.”
12.2: meib zwavj ninb Bua, ninb Bua Fiag Ruvb. ninb Bua Lo Jyenq faauj yaag zyavb pyruq. ninb Bua Eei Rwib yem nitq fatq meib mq paag Hruq leib meib ko.
12.6: maiq kunq meib Eei muab txig Zauj meib Eei tia Eei pyauq zov myenb maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun meib, ninb Bua yaag zung Jyenq heug Jyenq meib mivb. maiq kunq ninb Bua Zauj meib kxvq waag lovj, meib maiq tuvq syenj ninb Bua.
12.13: ninb Bua zwavj Eei se Byaub witq mq paag syru tu'q Fimq. ninb Bua zruj Kruq mq paag maiq tu'q haiq Euvg. laaij zyruq Qiaj Jiad! haig, ninb Bua xij zu'g Eaiq ninb Bua syru taaib Eei ka'naaiq.”
12.12: zruj myetg Eei myenb taaib Tauj teib puvb Waav yetg zuvq yem Lav, Fav Eei txvj, weig zu'g yem teib puv naaiq puv mivb Tauj Jomg uaq puv,   zyruq Eei Ru'g Daauq pun ninb Bua zu'g myetg, maiq maaib haiq laanb myenb tu'q pcvb xn Eei yem.
12.15: yia pcv ninb Bua Zwrtq taaib, Ga'haaq yia cvj xij Kxb lyenb ninb Bua. yia cvj xij txb ninb Bua Rwrnj, pun kx'g myenb Rwrnj kx'g myenb Ripg Eei pwrng, kx'g myenb yaag Rwrnj kx'g myenb Eei teib puv.
12.11: ninb Bua pun naaiq teij Dau penj Daub Waav, paaig Waav, Bxvj Gaai Eei txvj. zyavb nxm teib puv zu'g kwavg Waav, mq paag maiq maaib haiq taub Yetq Hruq.
12.1: zyruq aag, yia vopq pun meib mwavj Eei zyavb hog, meib pun Ziv meib hxpg. maiq kunq Navq naaig, maaib yetg tiub Jauq yia xij Zauj meib Rcv. x'q myenb Eei Jauq weig haiq tiug lovj Jyenq faauj? maiq zyepg zua'q Eei myenb weig haiq tiug tu'q Kub yem?
12.10: maaib kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb Zamq Eei paaig waaig yia Eei a'vung Wivj. ninb Bua Zaaiq yia Eei pwrng Fiag, ninb Bua pun yia lovj Eei pwrng penj paaig waaig Eei teib puvb Waav.

46.18: huvb tiaj, tovb maaib Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq uaq taub, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, maaib taub xij taaib Navq Taa-Bo yem zwavj Bov Bu'Dovj, yaag Navq yem uaq Kxib Len Eei Kaan-men Bov.
46.8: i-yipq faauj taaib Navq nai-aa Daaib, Navq Daaib Eei uam kwaatq Jyenq taaib. ninb kxvq, ‘yia xij faauj taaib yemj kxmj luvb Diaq. yia xij myetg Revg zivb Zauj yem zivb Eei pc'g fivj.’
46.3: “meib Bua xij zu'g liug leid meib Bua Eei tomb Txvb paaib, fiub Txvb paaib, Zwrtq Jauq mivb Bx'q Jaaj.
46.21: yem ninb Bu'Dovj Zivq zruj pcv uaq teij Navq vovb txnb Jung. ninb Bua lomb Rxib taauj sin pyauj, maiq yem uaq Bx'q Jaaj, weig zu'g ninb Bua zu'g Kruq Eei Nxi Tauj a'q. Tauj zyavb hog tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid.
46.14: “xij zu'g yem i-yipq zunb kxvq, yem mikq-Don zunb, cvj yem mem-fitq Zauj Taa-paan-hetg zunb kxvq, ‘xij zu'g sruq Rxib, liug leid zyavj weig zu'g Ru'g Daauq xij yem weib kxmj myetg Revg.
46.23: zyruq kxvq, “maiq kunq i-yipq Eei Dyavb lomg mivb maiq Tov winb wavq zuvq xij kxij. weig zu'g ninb Bua kaub Zamq Jiaj Jopg Eeig, zuvq saauq maiq hivb.
46.6: “syepq Eei myenb pyauj maiq hivb, Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv yaag pyauj maiq Dutq. yem pa'q puv, yu-fe-titg Daaib ka'Len, ninb Bua Di'q zu'g Dxpg.
46.2: kxvq Tauj i-yipq, naaiq teij waag kxvq Tauj i-yipq huvb, faa-lo-ne-Ko Eei Junb pcv, yem yu-fe-titg Daaib Len, Kaan-Ke-mitq uaq. Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa yaag Bx'q hivb txij yo-si-yaa Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb ta'feij Havj uaq Havj. ninb kxvq,
46.20: i-yipq Navq taub Rweig haig Eei vovb Eeid mq paag maaib pa'q puv taaib Eei tuvb nuv taaib vaatg.
46.24: i-yipq myenb xij zu'g Eaiq, xij zu'g Jiu pun yem pa'q puv myenb Eei puab Diaq.”
46.28: zyruq kxvq, “yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq aag, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj, weig zu'g yia Zauj meib yem. yia xij pun tovb meib zu'g zung mivb Eei uaq teij kua'q zutg Revg, mq paag yia maiq myetg Revg meib. yia xij ziuj meib Bua hxpg zu'g tu'q Eei Bx'q Faauj meib, yia maiq zeid maiq tivg meib Eei zwid.”
46.7: “naaiq haiq taub Navq nai-aa Daaib faauj, Navq Daaib Eei uam kwaatq Jyenq taaib?
46.19: yem i-yipq Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g liug leid zyavj meib Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei zyavb hog lovg Eei ka'naaiq, weig zu'g mem-fitq xij zu'g penj Daub Waav, penj paaig waaig Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb yem.
46.17: xij zu'g Zwrtq Buaj heug i-yipq Eei faa-lo huvb, ‘ka'naaib Bwi, pun zyavb hog Pyatq’ uaq taub.”
46.27: “mq paag yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq aag, maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. i-saa-laa-en aag, maiq tuvq taamq faij, weig zu'g yia xij yem ko Eei txvj Fruj meib, yaag Fruj meib Eei zeib fun yem ninb Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib. yaa-Kopq zyrug Rwrnj taaib pcvb xn, sekq Ria'g Eei yem, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub pun ninb kamb Riaj.”
46.11: “i-yipq myenb aa'b! mivb ki-le-aatg lxd Diab Daav. meib lovg Zamb Euvg Dia yaag maiq lamb lovg. weig meib nx, maiq haib zxg maiq lovj.
46.5: yia weig haiq tiug pwatg ninb Bua kamb Riaj cvj taauj sin Rwrnj. ninb Bua Eei Bx'q Jaaj pcv zu'g swei yaag syepg syepq Eei pyauj, zuvq maiq Win Myen Rwrnj. maaib hc'q kamb Riaj Eei sig weib kxmj.”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
46.9: maad aa'b! huvj Jyenq mivb a'q. Bx'q Jaaj Eei Zia aa'b! pe'q Jyenq mivb. Paaiq Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv Zwrtq mivb, se nanq Jyenq Txvb paaib Eei e-Ti-o-pia myenb Zauj Putq myenb, Zauj haib pwrnq Jwavb zinj Eei li-Dia myenb.
46.16: meib Eei myenb Zamq haig Di'q zu'g Dxpg, laanb zyrug kxvq Buaj laanb, ‘Jiad taaib maa'b! Bua Rwrnj Bua kanb Eei pc'g fivj, Tauj Bua Zwrtq seij Eei teib puv, laaij zeij Bua uaq teij Eei Ru'g Daauq.’
46.4: xij zu'g pwig maad. keb maad pcv aa'b! faauj mivb keb Jyenq a'q. Dovj Jyenq Lia'g muag yem Bx'q Jaaj Eei txvj, Ryruj meib Bua Eei Zav, zu'q Jyenq meib Bua Eei Lia'g lwi.
46.10: uaq Nxi se zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, Eei Nxi, se ninb Jaauq win Eei Nxi, xij Jaauq win pun ninb Eei winb wavq. Ru'g Daauq zyrug Eang peuq, yaag hopq winb wavq Eei Ryaamq zuvj, weig zu'g zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, yem pa'q puv teib puv, yu-fe-titg Daaib Len fovg hxg ziag.
46.22: ninb Zwrtq Bwi Eei Qiaj Navq naav lwig Jyenq pyauj, weig zu'g ninb Eei winb wavq Dutg Dutg Eei taaib, ninb Bua txb Jyenq pruq taaib Bx'q, Navq kxij Dyavj Eei myenb lovg pruq kxij Dyavj nx.”
46.12: maang kua'q myenb tu'q haid myenb zu'g Eaiq Eei fyenj, meib Eyemq Eei Qiaj pwavq Revg luvb Diaq, weig zu'g Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv fib Navq Eei laanb Ryavg zu'g laanb, i laanb zuvq lomb Rxib Kiv Fiag.”
46.15: meib Bua Eei vovb kruq zyenb, aa-pitg, weig haiq tiug pyauj? meib Bua Eei vovb kruq weig haiq tiug sruq maiq Jyenq? se weig zu'g zyruq fovq ninb Kiv Fiag.
46.13: naaiq se zyruq kxvq Buaj trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, Eei waag, kxvq Tauj Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, xij taaib Bx'q i-yipq teib puv.
46.1: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, tu'q zipq zyruq Eei naaiq teij waag kxvq Tauj maang kua'q.
46.26: yia xij zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem lxd ninb Bua Eei mcvg uaq teij Eei puab Diaq, se Jiu pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Zauj ninb Eei pcvb pyeiq Eei puab Diaq. Ga'haaq i-yipq cvj maaib myenb yem Navq zinb Daavg uaq nx.” zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
46.25: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij tivg Te-Betg Eei aa-mon zyenb Zauj faa-lo Eei zwid, yaag tivg i-yipq Zauj i-yipq Eei zyenb Zauj ninb Eei huvb tiaj Eei zwid, yaag tivg faa-lo Zauj Kauj ninb uaq teij myenb Eei zwid.

13.18: xij zu'g Buaj huvb Zauj huvb Eei maa, “Fiag meib Bua Eei weig zweid Jyenq aiq Eei txvj, weig zu'g meib Bua Rweig haig Eei huvb nivq yem meib Bua Eei mGxvq zuvq Dxtq Fiag mig a'q.”
13.8: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
13.3: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag ta'Eeig Rung kxvq,
13.21: ninb Bua zx'q tovb meib kanb Faauj Zauj meib taaq lob kcv uaq teij lyepg taaib kunq meib, meib xij Navq haiq nx kxvq? meib maiq zeid xij mun Kruq Navq msia'q txn mun Jyenq kub vwaad nx fai?
13.14: zyruq kxvq, ‘yia xij pun ninb Bua laanb zov laanb, tia Zauj txn fib Navq Eei. yia maiq Kxb lyenb, maiq Kxb fi'q, maiq lyrub ninb Bua Eei mcvg, zuvq xij myetg ninb Bua.’+”
13.23: e-Ti-o-pia myenb haib Tiuq ninb Eei Dopq fai Da'maaub Beuj Tiuq ninb Eei pyavb fai? sij kxvq ninb Bua haib nx, meib Bua zruj kwenj x'q sig Eei myenb yaag haib zruj tu'q Kuq sig a'q.
13.6: Jiaj liud Zamb Nxi zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “Jiad taaib mivb yu-fe-titg Daaib. yem uaq zx'q yia Paaiq meib pivj uaq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia taaib.”
13.2: yia zyrug ei Jyenq zyruq Eei waag maaid tiub sai Jaaiq Dia sai Jyenq.
13.20: meib Bua xij zu'g Zau mziv mavg yem pa'q puv taaib Eei myenb. yia zinb Daavg pun meib kruj uaq kwanb pa'ki yuvb, se meib Rweig haig Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb, ib zang yem haaij?
13.24: “yia xij pun meib Bua faatq Raanj Navq Bia'q zu'g teib puvb Waav Eei Ryaauj pwrng mivb nx.
13.7: yia zyrug mivb yu-fe-titg Daaib, yia pivj uaq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia Eei txvj, wetq Zwrtq taaib. yia pwatg uaq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia zuvq huq Revg. maiq haib lovg zruj haiq Euvg a'q.
13.19: ne-kepg teig Eei zivb kwrn Revg mig a'q. yaag maiq maaib myenb Kxi. yu-Daa Eei yetg zuvq myenb zu'g kwaatq mivb, zuvq zu'g kwaatq mivb Revg.
13.17: mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua maiq mwavj, yia xij weig meib Bua zruj mauj Eei Jauq pivj Jyenq Eyemq. yia Eei mziv Eyemq tu'q Kruq, maaib uamb mweig lyrug Fiag, weig zu'g zyruq Eei pc'g fivj zu'g kwaatq mivb mig a'q.
13.27: yia mavg pwatg meib yem lomb Waav Eei Bovb aiq zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig, meib zruj Yenj Eei Jauq, Zwrtq scv Eei Qiaj, maaig sin zruj Eaiq Eei sig. o ye-lu-saa-lem aag, meib zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Tauj haiq zang Zivj saaj Zivb Revg taaib?
13.11: zyruq kxvq, ‘sai Jaaiq Dia Navq haiq nx nctq Jyenq myenb Eei Jaaiq, yia yaag Navq uaq nx pun i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj zeib fun Zauj yu-Daa Eei zwavj zeib fun nctq Jyenq yia, weig penj yia Eei pc'g fivj pun yia tu'q mevb taub, tu'q myenb Zev yaag tu'q myenb Taaib. mq paag ninb Bua maiq Kavq mwavj.’
13.5: yia zyrug mivb yu-fe-titg Daaib, zx'q uaq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia pivj Jyenq Daaib Len, Navq zyruq Paaiq yia Eei waag.
13.9: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia yaag Navq uaq nx xij zruj waaig yu-Daa mauj Eei Jauq, Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zruj mauj Lo haig Eei Jauq.
13.16: zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, maiq kcvb pun Mwavj Tauj, meib Bua Eei zauj yaag maiq kcvb yem Bov kub vwaaig, Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog, Di'q zu'g Dxpg, meib Bua xij zu'g Taaib ninb. meib Bua lxd Fav Eei zyavb hog, ninb pun Tiuq penj yemb yem Eei, yaag Tiuq penj mapq mcvb mapq Mwavj Eei.
13.4: “xij zu'g zx'q meib maaid taaib sai Jaaiq Dia, tovb meib sai Jyenq Eei Dia, Jiad taaib txb mivb yu-fe-titg Daaib pivj Jyenq la'pyeib Qavj.”
13.10: naaiq teij x'q myenb, tovb maiq Kavq mwavj yia Eei waag Eei myenb, se vcvg Jyenq ei kanb Eei Hruq zruj zyrug kan Eiag Eei zyenb yaag fub suj, paaij uaq teij zyenb, zyrug Navq naaiq tiub sai Jaaiq Dia maiq lamb lovg yetg teij.’
13.22: sij kxvq meib yem kanb Eei Hruq kxvq, “yia weig haiq tiug zu'g naaiq teij sig?” se laaij meib Eei zwid Lo haig meib Eei Junb Zivj zu'g Ziaq kwavg, meib yaag zu'g myenb Zaa.
13.12: “xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “nxmb nxm ovj xij zu'g maaib tiuq tapq pwavq.” ninb Bua zyrug Buaj meib, ‘yia Bua fuvg maiq hiuq tu'q nxmb nxm ovj xij zu'g maaib a'vung tiuq tapq pwavq fai?’
13.15: xij zu'g mwavj yaag pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj. maiq tuvq zruj mauj, weig zu'g zyruq kxvq liud a'q.
13.13: meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia pun naaiq nxm teib puv Eei yetg zuvq myenb Gwin Revg, se zweid Jyenq Daa-witq huvb Eei weig Eei huvb tiaj Zauj sai myenb, trug waag myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei yetg zuvq pc'g fivj.’
13.1: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj yia, “mivb maaid tiub la'maab Dia sai Jyenq Jaaiq yaag maiq tuvq zyemj uam.”
13.26: weig naaiq yia kanb xij zx'q meib Eei Junb Jua'q Ryen faauj pwav meib Eei Myen, pun meib Eei pivb Zyruq Zwrtq zyrug zu'g Eaiq.
13.25: “naaiq se meib Eei pwrng, se yia Laau pun meib Eei pwrng, laaij meib la'Ku'q yia, yaag Kauj kxvb pc'g Eei waag.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.

26.18: “yem yu-Daa Eei huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa, Eei Nxib Eia'g, yem mo-le-setq myenb, mi-Kaa, trug waag kxvq Buaj yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb, ‘nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “si-on xij zu'g laib Navq laib livb teig nx, ye-lu-saa-lem xij zu'g penj Baav waaig Eei ka'naaib Dwi. uaq nxm pyauq Eei Bov yaag penj Dyavb lomg.”+’+”
26.8: ye-le-mi kxvq liud zyruq Paaiq ninb kxvq Buaj zwavj myenb Eei yetg zuvq waag, sai myenb Zauj trug waag myenb Zauj zwavj myenb Eau Jyenq ninb kxvq, “meib xij zu'g taig a'q.
26.3: Riaj ninb Bua xij mwavj, taub taub zyrug leib Gxi ninb x'q Eei Jauq weig pun yia kxiq za'eij, maiq laaij ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.”
26.21: ye-ho-yaa-Kim huvb Zauj ninb henq haig Eei zwavj pcv Zauj zwavj Jyen haid u-li-aa Eei waag, huvb tiaj zyrug lxd ninb taij. u-li-aa mwavj haid naaiq teij waag ninb kamb Riaj zyrug pyauj mivb yem i-yipq.
26.14: mq paag yia kanb c'q, yia yem meib Bua Eei puab Diaq. meib Bua pwatg Navq haiq nx lovj, Navq haiq nx hxpg, meib Bua kunq Navq uaq nx zruj.
26.23: ninb Bua zyrug mivb i-yipq txb u-li-aa Rwrnj taaib Jiu pun ye-ho-yaa-Kim huvb. huvb tiaj lovg Ru'g Daauq taij cvj txb ninb Eei sei mivb zxi kwavg Prub Tov myenb Eei zrub kemb.
26.6: yia zyrug zruj pun naaiq nxm pyauq Navq si-lo yaag pun naaiq nxm zivb penj luvb Diaq maang kua'q myenb zyruj Eei txvj.’+”
26.2: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib xij zu'g sruq Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, laatg ka'Euad. kxvq Buaj yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb taaib Eei myenb, tovb taaib zavg zyruq Eei pyauq paaij zyruq. xij zu'g kxvq yia Buaj meib kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag. maiq tuvq puvj Dxtq yetg Jruj.
26.20: cvj maaib taub Ki-li-yaatq-ye-aa-lim myenb. se-mai-aa Eei txn, u-li-aa, tevq zyruq Eei Buaj trug waag. ninb lovg waag Navq ye-le-mi trug taaib kxvq naaiq nxm zivb Zauj naaiq nxm kua'q.
26.24: mq paag saa-faan Eei txn, aa-hi-Kam, peu ye-le-mi. Navq naaig ye-le-mi maiq zu'g Jiu pun yem pc'g fivj Eei puab Diaq taij.
26.7: sai myenb Zauj trug waag myenb Zauj zwavj myenb haid ye-le-mi yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq kxvq uaq teij waag.
26.19: “yu-Daa huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa, Zauj yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb zx'q ninb taij taig fai? he-se-Ki-yaa maiq zeid Taaib zyruq cvj Toq ninb Zeij en fai? zyruq yaag maiq zeid kxiq za'eij, maiq ei ninb kxvq ninb xij zruj Eei pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang fai? mq paag yia Bua kanb zuvq xij pun yia Bua kanb zu'g Zyruq Eei tomb ze'g naang.”
26.17: maaib teij kua'q zavg Eei myenb koj sruq Jiad taaib Zauj kapq zunq Eei zwavj pc'g fivj kxvq,
26.11: sai myenb Zauj trug waag myenb kxvq Buaj uaq teij pyeiq zeiq Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj, “naaiq laanb myenb zig tu'q tivg zwid taig a'q, weig zu'g ninb trug waag kxvq naaiq nxm zivb Navq meib Bua kanb Eei mnxmb haid liud Eei nx.”
26.5: yaag maiq ei Jyenq yia Eei pru kxvq Eei waag, se yia maiq tivb lyrub Eei Paaiq mivb uaq teij trug waag myenb, maiq kunq meib Bua maiq mwavj Jiaj,
26.9: meib weig haiq tiug tevq zyruq Eei Buaj trug waag kxvq, ‘naaiq nxm pyauq xij Navq si-lo. naaiq nxm zivb xij penj paaig Waav Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb yem?’+” zwavj pc'g fivj zyrug yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq weib kxmj ye-le-mi.
26.16: pyeiq zeiq Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj zyrug kxvq Buaj sai myenb Zauj trug waag myenb, “naaiq laanb myenb maiq zig tu'q taig, weig zu'g ninb tevq zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei Buaj Zauj yia Bua kxvq waag.”
26.4: meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘sij kxvq meib Bua maiq mwavj yia, maiq yavb yia Jiu pun meib Bua Eei leib latg,
26.10: yu-Daa Eei pyeiq zeiq mwavj haid naaiq teij sig, ninb Bua yem huvb ting faauj Tauj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, zweid Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei syavb kcvb Eei kcvb Daavg.
26.22: ye-ho-yaa-Kim huvb cvj Paaiq teij myenb mivb i-yipq. maaib akg-Bo Eei txn, en-naa-Tan, yaag maaib ziaj laanb myenb Zauj Jyenq ninb mivb.
26.12: ye-le-mi zyrug Buaj zwavj pyeiq zeiq Zauj yetg zuvq pc'g fivj, “zyruq Paaiq yia trug waag kxvq naaiq nxm pyauq Zauj naaiq nxm zivb. ninb kxvq tovb meib Bua mwavj haid Eei yetg zuvq waag.
26.15: meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq tu'q tivg, sij kxvq meib Bua taij yia taig, meib Bua zyrug pun maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb Eei Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq. meib Bua Zauj naaiq nxm zivb Zauj yem zivb ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj xij zu'g Daamb txv, weig zu'g zyen sig zyruq Paaiq yia taaib zx'q naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag kxvq pun meib Bua mwavj.”
26.13: weig naaiq ib zang meib Bua xij zu'g kxiq yeng meib Bua Eei Jauq Zauj zruj Eei sig, mwavj zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei waag. zyruq zyrug kxiq za'eij, maiq ziuj ninb kxvq meib Bua Eei waag pun meib Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.
26.1: yu-Daa huvb, yo-si-yaa, Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, Jiad kxn zruj huvb kunq Eei zyavb hog, maaib naaiq Jruj waag yem zyruq taaib.

28.3: i Havj ka'Euad yia xij zx'q zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei Jaab sig txb Rwrnj Tauj naaiq nxm txvj, tovb Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, yem naaiq nxm txvj Zaavq mivb Baa-Bi-lon, uaq teij Jaab sig.
28.8: yem lod! Nxi taaib, se yem Daavg meib Zauj yia uaq teij trug waag myenb trug waag kxvq Zamb kua'q Zauj ziaj tomb fivj xij zu'g Bx'q Jaaj, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg.
28.9: trug kxvq pcvb xn Eei Jauq uaq taub trug waag myenb c'q, zuaq ninb Eei waag Zwrtq taaib zyen, zyrug hiuq tu'q za'kevb zyruq Paaiq taaib Eei trug waag myenb.”
28.7: mq paag Toq mwavj yia kxvq pun meib Zauj zwavj myenb mwavj haid yia kxvq naaiq Jruj waag.
28.5: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, zyrug txv Jyenq sai myenb Zauj sruq Jyenq yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad Eei zwavj myenb, kxvq Buaj trug waag myenb, haa-nan-yaa,
28.16: weig naaiq zyruq kxvq, “yia xij swiq meib Zwrtq paamb ken Eei Daub peib. tovb naaiq Havj ka'Euad meib xij zu'g taig, weig zu'g meib kxvq Eei waag vcvg Jyenq zyruq.”
28.17: tovb uaq Havj Zyetq Laaj, trug waag myenb, haa-nan-yaa, taig mig a'q.
28.14: weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq. ‘yia zx'q Lia'g kaad kaad Jyenq naaiq teij kua'q Eei myenb Eei Jaav pun ninb Bua fub suj Baa-Bi-lon Eei ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa huvb. ninb Bua zuvq xij zu'g fub suj ninb weig zu'g lyemb lomb Waav Eei Yiab zxib yia Jiu pun ninb mig a'q.’+”
28.4: yia yaag xij txb yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-yaa-Kim Eei txn, ye-Ko-ni-yaa, Zauj yu-Daa zu'g kwaatq mivb Baa-Bi-lon Eei yetg zuvq myenb Rwrnj taaib Tauj naaiq nxm txvj, weig zu'g yia xij wrtq Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Dyavb kaad nauq.’+” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
28.2: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia zuvq wrtq nauq Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Dyavb kaad.
28.6: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq “aa-men. Toq zyruq Navq naaiq zruj. Toq zyruq pun meib trug Eei waag Zwrtq taaib zyen, pun zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei Jaab sig Zauj yetg zuvq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb yem Baa-Bi-lon tu'q Rwrnj naaiq nxm txvj.
28.13: “mivb Buaj haa-nan-yaa, zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib wrtq Dyavb kaad nauq mq paag yia xij zruj Lia'g kaad tiq.
28.12: trug waag myenb, haa-nan-yaa, zx'q trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kaad Jyenq Jaav Eei Dyavb kaad wrtq nauq liud, Ga'haaq ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
28.15: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq Buaj trug waag myenb, haa-nan-yaa, “haa-nan-yaa aa'b! mwavj maa'b! zyruq maiq Paaiq meib. meib yaag pun naaiq teij pc'g fivj Kauj kxvb pc'g Eei waag.
28.11: haa-nan-yaa txv Jyenq zwavj pc'g fivj kxvq, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘i Havj ka'Euad yia xij Navq naaiq wrtq nauq Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, pun maang kua'q myenb kaad Jyenq Eei Dyavb kaad.’+” mq paag trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, mivb mig a'q.
28.1: tovb uaq Havj, se sej-De-Ki-yaa faauj weig zruj huvb kunq yu-Daa ta'feij Havj, Mmd Laaj, ki-Be-on myenb, atg-su Eei txn, trug waag myenb, haa-nan-yaa, yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq txv Jyenq sai myenb Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj txij yia kxvq,
28.10: trug waag myenb, haa-nan-yaa, zyrug zx'q kaad Jyenq trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, Eei Jaav Eei Dyavb kaad, wrtq nauq mivb.

8.18: “yia Raub faanb Jiaj Daavg haib zxg tu'q lovj, yia Eei Hruq ka'Euad zuvq Wrn mig a'q.
8.8: “+‘meib Bua Navq haiq nx haib kxvq, “yia Bua maaib Zovb mevb weig zu'g yia Bua maaib zyruq Eei leib latg”? mq paag mavg maa'b! srub piuq Eei patq fiaq Jaaq pun leib latg penj kxvb pc'g Eei waag.
8.3: naaiq teij zevg Fiag x'q haig Eei fivj yem yia zung ninb Bua mivb Eei nxmb nxm txvj, Kuvj Namq xij taig kaub Zamq xij maaib mcvg zyavb.’ naaiq se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
8.21: “laaij yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g mun, yia Eei Hruq yaag zu'g mun haig. yia Raub Eyemq, kamb Riaj Eei Jauq Eau Jyenq yia.
8.14: “Bua weig haiq tiug zweid Jyenq naaiq, maiq tovd? kapq zunq taaib maa'b! Bua pia'g weib wrnq Eei zivb yem uaq zu'g myetg, weig zu'g zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb, zuvq tivg pun Bua zu'g taig, cvj pun uamb to'g Bua hopq, laaij Bua paamd zwid txvg zyruq.
8.6: yia lovg Hruq mwavj mq paag ninb Bua kxvq maiq hxpg. maiq maaib haiq taub kxiq Hruq kwavg ninb zruj x'q Eei Jauq kxvq, “yia zruj haiq Euvg lcb?” taub taub Win mivb ninb kanb Eei Jauq, Navq maad piu pia'g Bx'q Jaaj Zyavq nx.
8.2: pun faatq Raanj yem Ba'Nxi, Laaj Zauj luvb zavg Eei zwavj Leij ka'Diaq. naaiq se zinb Daavg ninb Bua Namq Eei, fub suj Eei, kan Jyenq Eei, ninb Bua lxd Eei, pua'g zavg Eei. naaiq teij Buvq yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Raud zunq fai pyopq zyrug Navq Gaiq yem Daub peib nx.
8.20: “syru Eei zyavb hog Jiaj mig a'q, Gaai kxv yaag Jiaj liud, yia Bua Zxg maiq tu'q Fruj.”
8.7: lyemb Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Eiab hiuq tu'q ninb Eei zyavb hog, nx'g Go, nx'g Ba'hinj Zauj nx'g pc'g hx'g yaag ei Jyenq ninb Bua Eei zyavb hog taaib. mq paag yia Eei pc'g fivj maiq hiuq tu'q zyruq Eei leid.
8.19: mwavj maa'b! yia Eei pc'g fivj heug Eei Qiaj yem teib puv ko Jiaj, Javq Jiaj Eei txvj kxvq, ‘zyruq maiq yem si-on fai? si-on zivb Eei huvb maiq yem naaig fai?’ “ninb Bua weig haiq tiug lovg ninb Bua Eei miub favj Zauj kanb fivj Eei zyenb Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad?”
8.17: “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun naavb to'g taaib yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj, penj maiq haib zruj faatq Gc'q Eei naav. naav zyrug Ex'q meib Bua.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
8.11: ninb Bua zxg yia Eei pc'g fivj mun Eei txvj Navq maiq zeid mun Zamq nx. ninb Bua kxvq, “pcvb xn a'q, pcvb xn a'q,” maiq kunq maiq maaib pcvb xn.
8.5: uaq Euvg naaiq teij pc'g fivj, se ye-lu-saa-lem myenb, weig haiq tiug zanb zang Twij Gaav? ninb Bua nanq wrnq Duaq myenb Eei sig, ninb Bua vcvg Jyenq maiq Kavq Rwrnj.
8.9: Zovb mevb myenb zuvq zu'g Eaiq. ninb Bua xij zu'g kamb Riaj yaag zu'g zx'q mivb. ninb Bua Gemb zyruq Eei waag, yem ninb Bua ka'Euad maaib haiq Euvg Zovb mevb?
8.16: mwavj haid yem Daan, winb wavq Eei maad fxb fxd Eei Qiaj. ninb Bua Eei maab kruq hcq hcq Eei heug, zyavb nxm teib puv tovd. ninb Bua taaib na'q Revg teib puv Zauj yem teib puv Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq, yaag na'q zivb Zauj yem zivb Eei myenb.”
8.4: “meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘myenb Dxpg Fiag, maiq cvj Jiad sin fai? sij kxvq maaib taub myenb mivb txvg Jauq, ninb maiq taauj Gaav Rwrnj fai?
8.10: weig naaiq yia xij zx'q ninb Bua Eei auq pun kanb laanb myenb lovg, yaag zx'q ninb Bua Eei livb teig pun syavb zyruq, weig zu'g yem zruj faij Jiaj Tauj zruj Lo Jiaj, ninb Bua yetg zuvq mauq maiq pcvb fim Eei leig zinb, se yem trug waag myenb Tauj sai myenb zruj Jaaq, Duaq myenb.
8.22: yem ki-le-aatg maiq maaib Diab Daav an fai? yem naaig maiq maaib Diab sai fai? yia Eei pc'g fivj maiq wavg syavj Eei txvj weig haiq tiug maiq tu'q zxg lovj?
8.12: ninb Bua zruj kamb Riaq haig Eei sig, ninb Bua hiuq tu'q Eaiq Eei fai? ninb Bua zuvq maiq Eaiq yetg teij, ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q paaig Myen. weig naaiq ninb Bua xij zu'g Kiv Fiag taig yem Kiv Fiag Daavg uaq teij myenb Bu'Dovj. yia tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua zyrug zu'g Byenq Fiag Revg mig a'q.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
8.15: Bua lxd pcvb xn yaag maiq tu'q haiq Euvg lovj. Bua lxd zxg lovj Eei zyavb hog mq paag Kuvj zu'g hc'q kamb Riaj Navq.
8.13: “+‘zyruq kxvq, “yia xij syru ninb Bua Eei zyavb hog a'vung Mei maiq maaib pyruq, vovb Exj Dyavj yaag maiq maaib pyruq, lyemb nxmb yaag Gaai Revg. yia Jiu pun ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq yaag Jiaj mig a'q.”+’+” Tinb huvb Eei pc'g fivj naaig,
8.1: “zyruq kxvq, ‘Tauj uaq zang myenb xij zx'q yu-Daa huvb Eei Buvq Zauj yu-Daa Eei Jyen Eei Buvq, Zauj sai myenb Eei Buvq, trug waag myenb Eei Buvq Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem uaq teij myenb Eei Buvq, yem ninb Bua Eei zruq Zwrtq taaib,

9.18: heug ninb Bua kaanq taaib weig yia Bua Eyemq, weig pun yia Bua Eei mziv Zwrtq uamb mweig lu'g lu'g Eei, yaag maaib uamb mweig lyrug Zwrtq yia Bua Eei mzivb Dopq.
9.8: ninb Bua Eei Byetg Navq to'g Eei fxv, kxvq waag Duaq myenb. kx'g myenb lovg kx'g myenb Eei Rwib kxvq pcvb xn Eei waag pun ninb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb, mq paag yem ninb Eei Hruq ninb taaq za'eij hxig.”
9.3: “ninb Bua zruj Byetg vau Navq Jwavb zinj, se Jaaq Eei Jauq maiq zeid zyen leid yem teib puv henq Jyenq faauj. weig zu'g ninb Bua zruj naaiq Euvg x'q sig, cvj zruj uaq Euvg x'q sig, ninb Bua yaag maiq hiuq tu'q yia.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
9.21: weig zu'g pun myenb zu'g taig Eei Jauq faauj taaib pia'g yia Bua Eei fov mwrnb, yaag pia'g yia Bua Eei huvb ting, pun fu'Jweiq yem Jaaib hxvg Zauj myenb lunj myenb yem tomb zwavj zaamg zu'g Pai kwavg.
9.14: ninb Bua vcvg Jyenq ei ninb Bua kanb Eei Hruq zruj yaag zwrtg ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Faauj Eei Jauq, mivb kan Baa-an zyenb.
9.23: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “maiq tuvq pun Zovb mevb myenb puvj waab mauj Zev ninb kanb Eei Zovb mevb. maiq tuvq pun henq Eei myenb puvj waab mauj Zev ninb kanb Eei Qa'q. maiq tuvq pun putg zxib myenb puvj waab mauj Zev ninb kanb Eei zinb zxib.
9.6: ninb Bua zeij myenb cvj Jaa zeij, ninb Bua Duaq myenb cvj Jaa Duaq. ninb Bua vcvg Jyenq maiq Kavq hiuq tu'q yia.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
9.2: feij tu'q yia yem teib puvb Waav maaib Jiaj Jauq myenb hitq Eei txvj weig pun yia haib leib Gxi yia Eei pc'g fivj, yaag haib pyauj Dutq ninb Bua. weig zu'g ninb Bua yetg zuvq penj Yenj Eei myenb, penj kwanb maiq zyepg zua'q Eei myenb.
9.20: msia'q txn aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag. pun meib Bua Eei mnxmb zipq zyruq Eei Rwib kxvq Eei waag. xij zu'g Faauj meib Bua Eei sia'q paauj naang zivb Ruv, kx'g myenb Faauj kx'g myenb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb paauj Raub Eyemq Eei Ruv.
9.24: mq paag xij zu'g pun puvj waab mauj Eei myenb Navq naaiq puvj waab mauj, weig ninb mevb pc'g yaag hiuq tu'q yia, se zyruq, yem luvb Diaq zyepg zua'q Eei Namq myenb, zruj pcvb fim, zruj hxpg. weig zu'g naaiq teij sig yia hxpg Hruq haig.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
9.7: weig naaiq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! laaij yia Eei pc'g fivj zruj Eei x'q sig yia xij sinj ninb Bua, Kauq ninb Bua. yia fuvg haib kanb Euvg zruj?
9.19: mwavj haid maaib Eyemq Eei Qiaj yem si-on Zwrtq. ‘yia Bua zu'g paaig Revg a'q lo'b! yia Bua zu'g Eaiq Tauj taaub a'q. weig zu'g yia Bua leib teib puv, yia Bua Eei pyauq yaag zu'g ninb Bua paaig waaig Revg.’+”
9.17: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “lovb lovj Eei Namq! xij zu'g heug Tevj Raub Eyemq Eei msia'q txn taaib, se Paaiq mivb lxd kaub haib Jiaj uaq teij.
9.11: “yia xij pun ye-lu-saa-lem penj Baav waaig Eei ka'naaib Dwi, penj Yiab Juq yem Eei txvj. yia xij pun yu-Daa Eei zivb penj zivb Waav, maiq maaib myenb yem.”
9.5: kx'g myenb Duaq kx'g myenb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb, maiq maaib yetg laanb kxvq zyen waag. ninb Bua Faauj ninb Bua Eei Byetg kxvb pc'g, ninb Bua lovg Revg Qa'q paamd zwid maiq haib kxiq Hruq Rwrnj.
9.9: zyruq kxvq, “yia maiq zeid xij zu'g weig naaiq teij sig tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid fai? yia maiq zeid xij winb pun naaiq teij kua'q Eei myenb fai?”
9.16: yia xij pun ninb Bua faatq Raanj mivb yem tovb ninb Bua kanb Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij maiq hiuq uaq teij kua'q Eei myenb Bu'Dovj. yia yaag xij lovg Ru'g Daauq zung ninb Bua Tauj yia myetg Revg ninb Bua.”
9.4: “taub taub myenb xij zu'g Buvb Jyenq kanb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb. yaag maiq tuvq puvj Hruq haiq taub kxb yrud. weig zu'g taub taub kxb yrud zruj Duaq myenb Eei myenb, mrud taub Jwavg laavd myenb Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq kxvq waab huq.
9.10: yia xij zu'g weig Bov Hruq mun Eei Eyemq, yaag Eyemq weig teib puvb Waav Eei miab Zyavq, laaij zu'g kwavg Waav maiq maaib myenb Jiaj, yaag maiq haid scvb Kuq heug. lyemb Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Zauj Yiab zxib pyauj Revg.
9.22: meib xij zu'g kxvq, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘myenb Eei sei xij Kiv Fiag yem uaq Daub Fav Navq Gaiq nx, Navq kaatq Byaub myenb kaatq Eei Byaub zeiq Kiv Fiag yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Raud.’+”
9.12: haiq taub maaib Zovb mevb kauj pia'g Hruq naaiq teij sig? zyruq Eei Rwib Zauj haiq taub kxvq Jiaj weig pun ninb haib kxvq Zwrtq naaiq teij Jauq? teib puv weig haiq tiug zu'g paaig Waav Revg, Navq teib puvb Waav maiq maaib myenb Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib?
9.15: weig naaiq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eang yavb meud cvj pun to'g Eei uam ninb Bua hopq.
9.13: zyruq yaag kxvq, “se laaij ninb Bua kwavg yia yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen lyepg taaib Eei leib latg, maiq mwavj yia Eei waag, maiq ei Jyenq zruj.
9.1: o feij tu'q yia Eei mGxvq penj uam, yia Eei mziv penj uamb mweig Eei zivq, yia zyrug weig yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g taij taig Eei myenb zyavb Nxi zyavb mwrnd Eyemq.
9.26: se i-yipq myenb, yu-Daa myenb, e-Dom myenb, am-mon myenb, mo-apg myenb Zauj yetg zuvq yem teib puvb Waav Japq Ba'pyei pcvb Eei Wiv kxmj mGxvq Eei myenb. weig zu'g naaiq teij nxmb nxm kua'q Eei myenb yem sin Jiaj kaatq Eei leid mq paag ninb Bua Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj zeib fun, maiq yem Hruq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid.
9.25: zyruq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj yia xij tivg yetg zuvq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid mq paag Navq maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid uaq teij myenb Eei zwid nx,

32.18: meib pun Ziv meib zyepg zua'q Eei Namq Zinb Zin waanb waang myenb. mq paag tia paamd zwid meib winb pun ninb Eei txnb Jweiq funb fa'q. Lo haig, henq haig Eei Tinb huvb, maaib Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq aag,
32.3: weig zu'g yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, zx'q ninb wrnj Jyenq yaag kxvq, “meib weig haiq tiug trug waag kxvq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij zx'q naaiq nxm zivb Jiu pun yem Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei puab Diaq. ninb zyrug Zaavq naaiq nxm zivb a'q.
32.43: meib Bua kxvq, “naaiq nxm teib puv penj paaig Waav Eei txvj. maiq maaib myenb yaag maiq maaib scvb Kuq, se zu'g Jiu pun yem Ken-Dia myenb Eei puab Diaq.” mq paag cvj maaib myenb tu'q yem naaiq maaid Dau.
32.14: ‘nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “zx'q naaiq teij i Kwaaiq Daub sru, lyemb nctq Jyenq uaq Kwaaiq Zauj maiq nctq uaq Kwaaiq maaid Dau Eei sru, tapq Jyenq niab ovj weig haib lyrub tu'q laub.”
32.34: ninb Bua zx'q kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq lyepg yem tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug uaq nxm pyauq, pun maaib wij.
32.2: uaq zang Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Junb pcv weib Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem. trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, yaag zu'g wrnj Jyenq yem syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad, se yem yu-Daa huvb Eei ting.
32.36: “meib Bua Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj naaiq nxm zivb, ‘laaij zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg, naaiq nxm zivb xij zu'g Jiu pun yem Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei puab Diaq. mq paag zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq,
32.35: ninb Bua yem Ben-hin-nom hxvd weig Baa-an zyenb Zeij Lav Eei txvj, zx'q ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud fovg hxg pun mo-lekq zyenb, maiq kunq yia maiq Paaiq ninb Bua zruj. yia zuvq maiq Namq Tauj ninb Bua xij zruj naaiq teij kamb Riaq haig Eei sig pun yu-Daa paamd zwid.
32.24: mavg maa'b! nia Dwi Jyenq taaib weib kxmj xij Bx'q naaiq nxm zivb. yaag laaij Ru'g Daauq Zauj vxg Naavj Eei Jauq Zauj wrnb pcvg, naaiq nxm zivb zu'g Jiu pun taaib Bx'q zivb Eei Ken-Dia myenb. ziuj meib kxvq Eei waag za'kevb Zwrtq taaib. meib yaag pwatg liud a'q.
32.7: “meib Eei yrub tiaj, san-lum Eei txn, haa-nam-en, xij taaib lxd meib kxvq, ‘Toq meib maaid yem an-naa-Totq yia uaq Rov Dau, weig zu'g meib maaid penj meib Eei se hxpg zua'g Rwrnj Eei leid.’
32.17: “zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! se tovb meib suv meib Eei puad Zwrtq, lovg meib Eei tomb Qa'q zeij luvb zeij Dau. weig meib maiq maaib haiq Euvg a'g Jiaj Daavg.
32.11: yia zx'q nctq Jyenq Eei Daub sru, tovb fiaq Jyenq maaid uaq Rov Dau Eei yetg Eeig, cvj zx'q maiq nctq uaq Kwaaiq.
32.33: ninb Bua Win ti'g taand pun yia, maiq zeid Win Myen. maiq kunq yia maiq tivb lyrub Eei Faauj ninb Bua, ninb Bua maiq mwavj weig zipq yia Faauj Eei waag.
32.16: “yia zx'q maaid Dau Eei sru pun ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq, liud, yia tauj kauj Toq zyruq,
32.40: yia xij Zauj ninb Bua lyepg yetg liud Eei vcvg waag, se yia yetg liud zruj lovj pun ninb Bua, maiq Win mivb kanb puv. yia xij pun ninb Bua Eei Hruq Taaib yia, weig pun ninb Bua maiq leib Gxi yia.
32.37: ‘yia xij yem tovb yia Qiaj Jiad, nrud haig, ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq taaib zung ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb yem Eei nxmb nxm kua'q, syru ninb Bua zunq. yia xij txb ninb Bua Rwrnj Tauj naaiq nxm txvj yaag xij pun ninb Bua pcvb xn Eei yem.
32.4: yu-Daa Eei huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, pyauj maiq Dutq Ken-Dia myenb Eei puab Diaq, mq paag Dovg haaij zuvq zu'g Jiu pun yem Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei puab Diaq yaag tu'q Zauj ninb Myen txij Myen kxvq waag, mziv txij mziv mavg.
32.12: Ga'haaq yia txv Jyenq yia Eei yrub tiaj Eei txn, haa-nam-en, Zauj faauj Buaj yem maaid Dau Eei Daub sru uaq teij zxvb zevj myenb, cvj Zauj zweid Jyenq syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad Eei yetg zuvq yiu-Tai myenb, zx'q maaid Dau Eei sru Jiu pun maa-sej-yaa Eei fun, ne-li-yaa Eei txn, Baa-lukq.
32.13: yia txv Jyenq ninb Bua hatg Baa-lukq. yia kxvq,
32.26: ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
32.28: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia zx'q naaiq nxm zivb Jiu pun yem Ken-Dia myenb Eei puab Diaq yaag Jiu pun yem Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Eei puab Diaq. ninb yaag Zaavq tu'q a'q.
32.8: “yia Eei yrub tiaj Eei txn, haa-nam-en, zyrug taaib Tauj syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad lxd yia kxvq, ‘Toq meib maaid yem Ben-yaa-min teig, aa-naa-Totq, yia uaq Rov Dau, weig zu'g meib maaib leid zua'g Rwrnj penj meib Eei pwrng. maaid penj meib kanb Eei maa'b!’ “yia zyrug hiuq tu'q naaiq se zyruq Eei waag.
32.9: yia zyrug Tevj yrub tiaj Eei txn, haa-nam-en, maaid yem aa-naa-Totq uaq Rov Dau. yia Ryav zyepg Zyetq nxm zinb Jiu pun ninb.
32.32: laaij i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yu-Daa myenb zruj Eei yetg zuvq x'q sig Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad, se ninb Bua Eei huvb, ninb Bua Eei Jyen, ninb Bua Eei sai myenb Zauj trug waag myenb, yu-Daa myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj.
32.21: meib lovg Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig yaag suv Zwrtq meib henq haig Eei puad cvj lovg kamb Riaj Eei tomb sig txb meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.
32.23: ninb Bua tu'q pia'g naaiq nxm teib puv Ripg penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng. mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj meib Eei waag yaag maiq yavb meib Eei leib latg. meib hatg ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq ninb Bua yetg Euvg yaag maiq zruj. weig naaiq meib pun ninb Bua zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.
32.6: ye-le-mi kxvq, “yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
32.44: myenb xij lovg Eaanb maaid Dau, yaag faauj Buaj Daub sru, nctq Jyenq, yaag maaib myenb zruj zxvb zevj, yem Ben-yaa-min teig, yem ye-lu-saa-lem weib kxmj Eei txvj, yem yu-Daa Eei zivb, yem Bovb aiq txvj Eei zivb, yem Bovb Jua'q Eei zivb Zauj ne-kepg Eei zivb, weig zu'g yia xij pun ninb Bua cvj tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
32.20: meib yem i-yipq teib puv zruj Javb hog Zauj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi yaag yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj zwavj paamb myenb Bu'Dovj zruj, pun meib kanb tu'q mevb taub Navq ib Nxi nx.
32.5: ninb xij txb sej-De-Ki-yaa mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon. sej-De-Ki-yaa yaag xij zu'g yem naaig Tauj yia mivb lxd ninb. maiq kunq meib Bx'q Ken-Dia myenb, meib yaag Bx'q maiq hivb.’ naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.”
32.19: meib Eei za'eij Lo haig, meib zruj Eei sig henq. meib Eei mziv mavg Jyenq paamb myenb Eei tiub tiub Jauq, yaag ziuj kx'g myenb Eei Jauq Zauj zruj Eei sig meib winb pun ninb Bua.
32.38: ninb Bua xij zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj, yia yaag xij zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
32.31: “naaiq nxm zivb yem Zeij Jiad taaib uaq Nxi Tauj ib Nxi Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad, nrud haig. yia zyrug zx'q Gxi naaiq nxm zivb, maiq pun yem yia Eei Ra'Myen,
32.27: “yia se zyruq, yetg zuvq paamb myenb Eei Tinb huvb. maaib haiq Euvg weig yia a'g Jiaj Daavg fai?
32.41: yia xij a'Neiq Eei zruj lovj pun ninb Bua yaag lovg Revg Hruq, lovg Revg za'eij, zyepg zua'q Eei lyepg ninb Bua Jiad yem naaiq nxm teib puv.
32.1: sej-De-Ki-yaa zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb ta'zyepg Havj uaq Havj, se ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa zruj huvb zyepg petq uaq Havj, ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag.
32.39: yia xij pun ninb Bua maaib Du'g tiub Hruq, maaib Du'g tiub Jauq weig pun ninb Bua yetg liud Taaib yia, yaag weig pun ninb Bua kanb Zauj ninb Bua Ga'haaq hivq Eei zeib fun tu'q lovj.
32.10: yia zyrug faauj Buaj yem uaq Daub sru yaag nctq Jyenq heug myenb zruj zxvb zevj cvj lovg tavq Ryav Eaanb.
32.25: mq paag zyruq Tinb huvb aag, meib Zxg Buaj yia, xij zu'g lovg Eaanb maaid uaq Rov Dau yaag lxd myenb zruj zxvb zevj, maiq kunq naaiq nxm zivb zu'g Jiu pun yem Ken-Dia myenb Eei puab Diaq.’+”
32.22: meib zx'q naaiq nxm teib puv Jiu pun ninb Bua, tovb meib hruq Jyenq lcvd pun ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij. penj nxm Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv.
32.42: “weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia Navq haiq nx pun naaiq teij pc'g fivj zu'g naaiq teij yetg zuvq Zyruq Eei tomb ze'g naang, yia xij Navq uaq nx ziuj yia lcvd Eei waag zx'q yetg zuvq lovj Eei Jauq pun ninb Bua.
32.15: weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yem naaiq nxm teib puv cvj xij maaib myenb maaid pyauq, livb teig Zauj a'vung Wivj.’
32.29: Bx'q naaiq nxm zivb Eei Ken-Dia myenb xij taaib puvj trud puaq naaiq nxm zivb, lyemb pyauq yaag puaq Qwi Revg. myenb yem naaiq teij pyaub vxb puaq huv pun Baa-an zyenb yaag Ziaq ziag pun Eiag Eei zyenb, Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad.
32.30: “i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yu-Daa myenb yem lunj Eei zyavb hog mtaaib yem yia Eei Ra'Myen Kuvj zruj x'q sig Navq. i-saa-laa-en myenb Kuvj lovg ninb Bua Eei puad zruj Eei kov Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad Navq.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.

21.8: “meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Buaj naaiq teij pc'g fivj, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia zx'q zyavb Eei Jauq Zauj taig Eei Jauq an Jyenq meib Bua Eei Ra'Myen.
21.9: haiq taub yem Jyenq naaiq nxm zivb zuvq zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg taig. mq paag haiq taub Zwrtq mivb zx'q kanb Jiu pun weib Jyenq meib Bua Eei Ken-Dia myenb, uaq taub zyrug tu'q mcvg zyavb, se tu'q ninb Eei mcvg penj Bx'q Jaaj tu'q taaib Eei zivb Eeig.
21.7: zyruq kxvq, “Ga'haaq yia xij zx'q yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, Zauj ninb Eei Jyen Zauj naaiq nxm zivb Eei pc'g fivj, tovb pyauj Dutq wrnb pcvg, Ru'g Daauq Zauj vxg Naavj Eei Jauq uaq teij, Jiu pun yem Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Eei puab Diaq, yaag Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Eei puab Diaq, Zauj lxd ninb Bua Eei mcvg uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq. Baa-Bi-lon huvb zyrug lovg Ru'g Daauq laig taij ninb Bua, maiq Kxb fi'q ninb Bua, maiq lyrub ninb Bua, maiq Kxb lyenb ninb Bua.
21.5: yia kanb xij suv yia Eei puad, se yia henq haig Eei puad, Qiaj Jiad Jyenq, nrud haig, ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Bx'q meib Bua.
21.14: zyruq kxvq, ‘ziuj meib Bua zruj Eei sig yia xij tivg meib Bua Eei zwid. yia xij yem naaiq nxm zivb Eei kemb tyemq zia'g trud. trud zyrug puaq Qwi weib kxmj zivb Eei yetg zuvq.’+”
21.4: “meib Bua xij zu'g Buaj sej-De-Ki-yaa, ‘zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij pun yem meib Bua Eei puad Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king taauj Rwrnj taaib, tovb meib Bua lovg Bx'q Baa-Bi-lon huvb Zauj yem zivb laatg ka'Eiag mcvj weib Jyenq Eei Ken-Dia myenb. yia yaag xij syru naaiq teij ua'g king taaib yem zunq naaiq nxm zivb Bu'Dovj.
21.2: “Toq meib weig yia Bua naaig zyruq, weig zu'g Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, taaib Bx'q yia Bua. Riaj zyruq weig yia Bua zruj ziuj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Bua'g hxvb Eei sig zyrug pun huvb tiaj Twij, leib Gxi yia Bua.”
21.6: yia xij Bx'q yem naaiq nxm zivb Eei myenb, lyemb myenb lyemb scvb Kuq zuvq zu'g tomb wrnb pcvg taig.”
21.13: zyruq kxvq, ‘yem hxvd Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! yia xij Bx'q meib Bua. meib Bua yem Daub pcvb Eei la'pyeiq Eei myenb kxvq, “haiq taub xij Fiag taaib Bx'q yia Bua? fai haiq taub xij pia'g yia Bua yem Eei txvj?”
21.12: Daa-witq Eei zeib fun aa'b! zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘Dxmb Dxm xij zu'g pcvb fim Eei syemq, Fruj zu'g luq Eei myenb pyauj Dutq zeij myenb uaq taub Eei puab Diaq. Raub heij laaij meib Bua zruj Eei x'q sig, yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Navq trud nx, zia'g Jyenq yaag maiq maaib haiq taub haib Bx'q taig.’
21.11: “xij zu'g kxvq Buaj yu-Daa huvb Eei zeib fun, ‘mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
21.1: ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei naaiq teij waag uaq zang, sej-De-Ki-yaa Paaiq man-Ki-aa Eei txn, paatg-he, Zauj maa-aa-sej-aa Eei txn, sej-fan-yaa sai myenb, mivb lxd ye-le-mi kxvq,
21.10: yia Byenq yia Eei Myen zruj pun naaiq nxm zivb, pun zivb zu'g Zyruq, maiq zeid tu'q lovj. naaiq nxm zivb zuvq zu'g Jiu pun Baa-Bi-lon huvb. ninb zyrug lovg trud puaq.”

23.18: ninb Bua haiq taub sruq Jyenq yem zyruq Eei wig Bu'Dovj tu'q pwatg, tu'q haid ninb Eei waag? fai maaib haiq taub lovg Hruq mwavj yaag ei Jyenq ninb Eei waag zruj?
23.8: mq paag ninb Bua xij kxvq, ‘yia xij zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq, tovb txb i-saa-laa-en trub zov Eei zeib fun yem pa'q puv faauj taaib yaag yem ninb zung ninb Bua mivb Eei nxmb nxm kua'q txb Zwrtq taaib.’ uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug tu'q yem ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv.
23.33: “haiq zang maaib taub naaiq teij pc'g fivj fai trug waag myenb fai sai myenb naaig meib, ‘zyruq Eei waag Navq haiq nx kxvq?’ meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘meib Bua se Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq. yia yaag xij zxi meib Bua kwavg. zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.’
23.3: “yia xij zx'q tovb yia zung mivb yem nxmb nxm kua'q zevg Fiag Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb syru zunq, txb ninb Bua Rwrnj kanb Eei laanb. ninb Bua zyrug Yaavj Jyenq faauj, maaib txn Zamq.
23.32: zyruq kxvq, “yia Zauj kxvq Beij Jaaq Eei trug waag myenb txib tekg. ninb Bua kxvq naaiq teij Beij lovg ninb Bua kxvb pc'g Eei waag Zauj puvj Eei waab mauj txb yia Eei pc'g fivj mivb txvg Jauq. yia yaag maiq heug, maiq Paaiq ninb Bua zruj. Navq naaig ninb Bua Tevj maiq tu'q yetg teij yia Eei pc'g fivj.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
23.21: yia maiq Paaiq uaq teij trug waag myenb, mq paag ninb Bua kanb Tiuj mivb. yia maiq tu'q Zauj ninb Bua kxvq, mq paag ninb Bua Zxg trug waag.
23.35: meib Bua xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx naaig, kx'g myenb naaig kx'g myenb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb, kx'g myenb naaig kx'g myenb Eei kxb yrud, ‘zyruq Navq haiq nx tau?’ fai ‘zyruq Navq haiq nx kxvq?’
23.40: yia xij pun meib Bua yetg liud zu'g Gemb, yetg liud zu'g Eaiq, zuvq maiq haib la'Ku'q.
23.14: mq paag yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei trug waag myenb Bu'Dovj yia pwatg Euvg kamb Riaj haig Eei sig. ninb Bua Yenj yaag kan kxvb pc'g Eei Jauq. ninb Bua Tevj x'q myenb Eei puad henq, zyrug maiq maaib haiq taub kwavg Gxi ninb zruj Eei waaig sig. ziuj yia mavg, ninb Bua yetg zuvq Navq soj-Dom, uaq nxm zivb Eei myenb yaag Navq ko-mo-laa.”
23.23: zyruq kxvq, “yia zruj nitq fatq Eei Tinb huvb yaag maiq zeid yem ko Eei Tinb huvb fai?”
23.6: yem ninb Eei Nxib Eia'g yu-Daa zuvq tu'q Fruj. i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag tu'q Taaib pcvb Eei yem. ninb Eei Buaj tu'q heug, ‘zyruq se yia Bua Eei pcvb fim.’+”
