23.34: trug waag myenb fai sai myenb fai haiq taub pc'g fivj kxvq, ‘zyruq Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq’ c'q, yia xij tivg uaq taub myenb Zauj ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb Eei zwid.
23.2: weig naaiq zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq kruj ninb Eei pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq, “meib Bua pun yia Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb Raanj yaag zung ninb Bua mivb. meib Bua yaag maiq kruj ninb Bua. laaij meib Bua zruj Eei x'q sig yia xij tivg meib Bua Eei zwid.” zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
23.36: mq paag ‘zyruq Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq meib Bua maiq tuvq cvj kxvq Tauj,’ weig zu'g kx'g myenb Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq se kx'g myenb kanb Eei waag. meib Bua yaag aauj zyavb Jyenq Eei Tinb huvb, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei waag.
23.20: zyruq Eei ka'Qiaj maiq fiu Tauj ziuj ninb Eei Hruq tivg zruj Eei zruj zyavj Revg. Tauj Ga'haaq laai Eei Nxib Eia'g meib Bua zyrug mevb pc'g Truj a'q.
23.24: zyruq kxvq, “maaib haiq taub haib pivj Jyenq Bweid Eei txvj weig pun yia mavg maiq pwatg ninb fai?”   zyruq kxvq, “yia maiq zeid yem pwavq luvb pwavq Dau fai?
23.28: pun Beij Beij Eei trug waag myenb kxvq ninb Bua Eei Beij, mq paag haiq taub tu'q yia Eei waag, pun ninb zyepg zua'q Eei kxvq yia Eei waag. Byaub Gaauq maaib haiq Euvg haib peiq tu'q Tauj Byaub witq?” zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
23.7: zyruq kxvq, “Navq naaig, Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, myenb maiq tu'q cvj kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq, tovb txb i-saa-laa-en myenb yem i-yipq teib puv Zwrtq taaib,’
23.29: zyruq kxvq, “yia Eei waag se Navq trud yaag Navq Bx'q la'pyeiq huq Eei Lia'g zweib maiq zeid?”
23.19: mavg maa'b! zyruq Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Navq tomb Ryaauj, Navq Ryaaub zung, zuvq nyruq Jyenq yem x'q myenb Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig.
23.17: ninb Bua zanb zang kxvq Buaj mavg Piaj yia Eei waag uaq teij myenb ‘meib Bua xij tu'q lovj.’ ninb Bua cvj Buaj yetg zuvq vcvg Jyenq ei kanb Eei Hruq zruj Eei myenb, ‘meib Bua maiq zu'g haiq Euvg Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.’
23.38: mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua kxvq, ‘zyruq Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq,’ zyruq kxvq, laaij meib Bua kxvq naaiq Jruj waag, se kxvq ‘zyruq Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq,’ maiq kunq yia Paaiq myenb mivb meib Bua naaig kxvq, ‘meib Bua maiq tuvq kxvq, “zyruq Daam Niaq Eei ka'naaiq.”+’
23.31: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij Zauj naaiq teij trug waag myenb txib tekg, tovb lovg ninb Bua Eei Rwib kxvq, ‘naaiq se zyruq kxvq.’+”
23.30: zyruq kxvq, “weig naaiq yia xij Zauj naaiq teij trug waag myenb txib tekg, tovb ninb Bua laanb zx'q laanb Eei waag txvj yia Eei waag trug.”
23.27: ninb Bua Namq taaib haib lovg ninb Bua kx'g myenb, laanb kxvq Buaj laanb Eei Beij, Duaq yia Eei pc'g fivj la'Ku'q yia Eei Buaj, Navq ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij la'Ku'q yia Eei Buaj mivb kan Baa-an zyenb.
23.11: “lyemb trug waag myenb Zauj sai myenb maiq kan lovj Tinb huvb. maiq kunq ninb Bua yem yia Eei pyauq, yia pwatg ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
23.5: zyruq kxvq, “Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij weig Daa-witq lyepg pcvb fim Eei Zunj, ninb xij zruj huvb kunq, yaag lovg Zovb mevb zruj. ninb yaag xij yem teib puv zruj pcvb fim, zruj tu'q hxpg.
23.9: kxvq Tauj uaq teij trug waag myenb, yia haid Hruq waaig Revg. yia zyavb sin zinj. weig zyruq yaag weig ninb Zivb Revg Eei waag yia Navq tiuq Gwin myenb, Navq zu'g tiuq hivb Eei myenb.
23.16: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “maiq tuvq mwavj uaq teij trug waag myenb trug Buaj meib Bua Eei waag. ninb Bua pun meib Bua maaib lamb Namq Eei Jauq yaag Kuvb mxvb Eei. ninb Bua kxvq hing yaavb Eei sig yem ninb Bua kanb Eei Hruq Zwrtq taaib, maiq zeid yem zyruq Eei Rwib Zwrtq.
23.37: meib Bua xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx naaig trug waag myenb, ‘zyruq Navq haiq nx tau meib?’ fai ‘zyruq Navq haiq nx kxvq?’
23.39: weig naaiq yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij zx'q meib Bua prub Jiad taaib zxi kwavg, maiq pun yem yia Eei Ra'Myen, lyemb meib Bua, lyemb yia Jiu pun meib Bua yaag Jiu pun meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei zivb.
23.4: yia xij Paaiq kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb kunq ninb Bua, kruj ninb Bua. yem naaiq mivb ninb Bua maiq kamb Riaj, maiq zu'g Waav, yaag maiq Zaa yetg taub.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
23.10: maaib Yenj Eei myenb pwavq teib puv. laaij zu'g zyruj, teib puv zyrug Kruq a'q. yem teib puvb Waav Eei miab Zyavq, miaq Gaai Revg. ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq se x'q Eei. ninb Bua Eei Qa'q yaag maiq hxpg.
23.22: sij kxvq ninb Bua tu'q sruq Jyenq yia Eei wig, ninb Bua zyrug zunb yia Eei waag pun pc'g fivj mwavj. ninb Bua zuvq pun pc'g fivj Win Rwrnj, kwavg Gxi ninb Bua x'q Eei Jauq, Zauj ninb Bua zruj Eei waaig sig.”
23.12: “Navq naaig weig ninb Bua, ninb Bua Eei Jauq yrug Byaavg yrug Mwavj. ninb Bua zuvq zu'g zung pia'g naaiq tiub Jauq cvj Di'q zu'g Dxpg. ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid Eei Havj, yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
23.15: weig naaiq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj uaq teij trug waag myenb, “yia xij zx'q yavb meud pun ninb Bua Eang, zx'q lcvg myenb Eei uam pun ninb Bua hopq, weig zu'g maiq kan lovj Tinb huvb Eei sig yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei trug waag myenb Zwrtq kxmj teib puv.”
23.13: yia yem saa-maa-lia Eei trug waag myenb Bu'Dovj, yia pwatg Euvg kamb Riaq haig Eei sig. ninb Bua tevq Baa-an zyenb trug waag, yaag txb yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, mivb txvg Jauq.
23.1: zyruq kxvq, “yem yia Eei miab Zyavq myetg yaag pun yia Eei pa'ki yuvb Raanj Eei kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q.
23.26: trug kxvb pc'g Eei waag uaq teij trug waag myenb, se ziuj ninb Bua kanb Eei Hruq zu'g Duaq uaq teij trug waag myenb, xij maaib kxvb pc'g Eei waag yem ninb Bua Eei Hruq Dovg haaij laub?
23.25: “yia haid uaq teij trug waag myenb tevq yia Eei Buaj trug Jaaq waag. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘yia Beij pwatg. yia Beij pwatg mig a'q.’

6.18: maang kua'q myenb aa'b! weig naaiq xij zu'g mwavj. meib Bua kapq zunq Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g hiuq tu'q ninb Bua xij pwavb Eei sig.
6.8: ye-lu-saa-lem aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj meib zu'g Faauj Eei waag, Riaj yia Eei Hruq yruj meib, Riaj yia pun meib penj paaig waaig Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb yem Eei teib puv.”
6.3: kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb Zauj ninb Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb xij taaib Bx'q ninb. ninb Bua xij Zxv ninb Bua Eei Dopg liub weib kxmj ninb, kx'g myenb zyrug yem kx'g myenb Eei txvj puvj yuvb.
6.21: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij zx'q ka'naaiq an Jyenq naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eei Ra'Myen pun ninb Bua Di'q zu'g Dxpg. lyemb tia lyemb txn fib Navq Eei Zauj Jyenq Jwavg laavd myenb Zauj lob kcv txig xij zu'g myetg.”
6.14: ninb Bua zxg yia Eei pc'g fivj mun Eei txvj Navq maiq zeid mun Zamq nx. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘pcvb xn a'q, pcvb xn a'q’ maiq kunq maiq maaib pcvb xn.
6.23: ninb Bua nanq Jwavb zinj Zauj Zav, ninb Bua yrug Zyruq yrug to'g, maiq Kxb lyenb myenb. ninb Bua Eei Qiaj Bwi Navq Kxiq Jiad laavg Bwi zod zod Eei. ninb Bua keb maad, Baib Jyenq taaib Bx'q Jaaj, weig Bx'q meib, si-on zivb.”
6.6: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “xij zu'g kxij uaq nxm zivb Eei Dyavj, Dwi nia weib kxmj Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem. naaiq se hxpg zu'g tivg zwid Eei zivb. yem zivb ka'Euad Kuvj maaib zeij myenb Eei sig Navq.
6.2: Rweig haig Eei fyrub zxib sia'q, si-on, yia xij myetg Revg.
6.20: yem Qe-Baa taaib Eei huv fai yem ko Eei teib puv txb taaib Eei laapg liug fuvj pun yia weig haiq Euvg eij leid? meib Bua puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq yia maiq haib zipq, meib Bua ziag Eei ka'naaiq maiq hxpg yia Eei Hruq.”
6.24: yia Bua mwavj haid ninb Bua Eei fyenj Navq, yia Bua Eei puad mau Revg mig a'q. yia Bua Hruq za'kevb! mun haig, Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad Kruq nx.
6.28: ninb Bua yetg zuvq Hruq vcvg Eei faanq lung, Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq kxvq waab huq. ninb Bua Navq tovb si'q, Navq Lia'q, ninb Bua yetg zuvq zruj waaig sig.
6.7: Navq uamb Kwrtq maiq tivb Eei Zwrtq uamb Rav, naaiq nxm zivb maiq tivb Eei Zwrtq x'q sig. zanb zang maaib zruj to'g, paaig waaig Eei sig yem zivb ka'Euad, zu'g pcvg, zu'g mun Eei Jauq zanb zang yem yia Eei Ra'Myen.
6.29: lrub Zwi tu'q seij haig, Juvd zu'g trud puaq Qwi. sinj Jyenq mivb yaag maiq lamb lovg weig zu'g maiq tu'q zx'q x'q myenb Zwrtq.
6.19: Dau aag, mwavj maa'b! yia xij pun naaiq teij pc'g fivj zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang, laaij ninb Bua ei ninb Bua taaq kuq kwaij Eei za'eij, weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq mwavj yia Eei waag. yia Eei leib latg c'q, ninb Bua yaag Gemb.
6.17: yia Paaiq teij syruq kcv myenb kruj meib Bua yaag kxvq, ‘xij zu'g mwavj Jxv Eei Qiaj.’ mq paag ninb Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua maiq mwavj.’
6.30: ninb Bua zu'g heug penj Eaanb Gaiq, weig zu'g zyruq Gemb ninb Bua.
6.27: “yia pun meib yem yia Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj seij yaag Kauq ninb Bua weig pun meib hiuq yaag seij tu'q Zwrtq ninb Bua Eei Jaub lrug.
6.11: weig naaiq yia Qiaj Jiad Navq zyruq nx, zuvq haid Eyend maiq Jyenq. “xij zu'g toj Fiag yem Jaaib hxvg Eei fu'Jweiq Zauj kapq zunq Eei myenb lunj myenb. lyemb auq lyemb Goj yaag xij zu'g txb mivb, Zauj Jyenq Havb Jeiq Lav Zauj myenb koj myenb.”
6.5: Jiad taaib maa'b! Bua luvb mwrnd zang mivb Bx'q, myetg Revg zivb Eei huvb ting.”
6.9: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “ninb Bua xij kwaatq Revg zevg Fiag Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb, Navq kc'q liud cvj kc'q zevg Fiag Eei a'vung pyruq. Navq kc'q a'vung pyruq Eei myenb Eei puad cvj Lutq kan Jyenq a'vung Gwaab mivb.”
6.16: zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “meib Bua xij zu'g sruq Jyenq Jauq lovb lovj Eei samj mavg. naaig Tauj uaq teij lob Nxi Eei Jauq. naaig kaaj uaq tiub lovj Eei Jauq yem haaij yaag kan uaq tiub Jauq yavb. meib Bua Eei Hruq zyrug lxd tu'q pcvb xn. mq paag ninb Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua maiq yavb uaq tiub Jauq.’
6.4: “xij zu'g liug leid zyavj Zauj ninb Bx'q Jaaj. Jiad taaib maa'b! Bua luvb aanj Eei zyavb hog mivb Bx'q. Bua zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g luvb Nxi Eei Fav Jiaj Jyenq mivb, luvb maanb Mwavj Eei tovb linb kunq zruj kunq Daauq a'q.
6.10: yia xij zu'g Zauj haiq taub kxvq yaag Kwinj ninb Bua Zivj taaib xij mwavj? ninb Bua Eei mnxmb zyetg mig a'q, ninb Bua zyrug maiq haib mwavj. mavg maa'b! zyruq Eei waag, penj ninb Bua Wrtq Eei ka'naaiq, ninb Bua yaag maiq a'Neiq mwavj.
6.22: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! maaib yetg fivj yem pa'q puv kua'q taaib, penj yetg tomb kua'q myenb yem luvb Diaq ko Jiaj Eei txvj zu'g Zo'q Jiad taaib.
6.12: ninb Bua Eei pyauq, livb teig Zauj auq zuvq zu'g zx'q pun kanb taub, weig zu'g yia xij suv yia Eei puad zruj pun yem teib puv Eei pc'g fivj.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
6.15: ninb Bua zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig, ninb Bua hiuq tu'q Eaiq fai? maiq zeid. ninb Bua yetg teij yaag maiq Eaiq. ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx zu'g paaig Myen. weig naaiq ninb Bua xij zu'g Kiv Fiag yem Kiv Fiag Eei myenb Bu'Dovj. yia tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zyrug zu'g myetg a'q.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
6.13: “yem zruj faij Jiaj Eei Tauj zruj Lo Jiaj Eei myenb, taub taub mauq xij tu'q maiq pcvb fim Eei leig zinb. yem trug waag myenb Tauj sai myenb, taub taub Kuvj zruj Jaaq sig Navq.
6.1: “Ben-yaa-min myenb aa'b! pyauj mivb weig pyauj Dutq. pyauj Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem. yem Te-Ko-aa pyomq Jxv. Zia Javb hog Eei keb yem Betg-hakq-Ke-lem, weig zu'g maaib tomb ze'g naang yem pa'q puv taaib, yaag maaib paaig waaig Eei tomb sig.
6.26: yia Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! xij zu'g sai Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru, yaag Favj Jyenq saaiq ka'Euad. xij zu'g Hruq mun Eei Eyemq Navq Eyemq kanb Eei Do'g txn nx, weig zu'g zruj myetg uaq taub xij lyemb zeib Tauj Bua.
6.25: maiq tuvq Zwrtq mivb uaq Deig fai kan Jauq yavb, weig zu'g winb wavq maaib Ru'g Daauq, yaag maaib kamb Riaj haig Eei sig weib kxmj.

44.18: mq paag yem yia Bua tivb, maiq puaq huv pun luvb Eei huvb maag yaag maiq Ziaq ziag pun ninb, yia Bua Zaa Euvb Euvg yaag laaij Ru'g Daauq Zauj vxg Naavj zu'g myetg.”
44.8: meib Bua weig haiq tiug laaij meib Bua Eei puad zruj Eei sig Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad haig, yem meib Bua taaib yem i-yipq teib puv puaq huv pun Eiag Eei zyenb. meib Bua zyrug pun kanb zu'g Pai kwavg zyrug yem luvb Diaq maang kua'q Bu'Dovj penj zyruj Eei waag yaag zu'g myenb Wrtq.
44.3: weig zu'g pc'g fivj zruj x'q haig Eei sig, Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad. ninb Bua puaq huv yaag fub suj Eiag Eei zyenb, tovb ninb Bua maiq hiuq Eei zyenb, se ninb Bua kanb fai meib Bua fai meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij maiq hiuq Eei zyenb.
44.21: “tovb meib Bua yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg puaq huv, se meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij, meib Bua Eei huvb Zauj meib Bua Eei Jyen, Zauj yem teib puv Eei pc'g fivj, zyruq maiq Javj fai? ninb maiq Namq Tauj fai?
44.14: Navq naaiq, taaib yem Jyenq i-yipq zevg Fiag Eei yu-Daa myenb, maiq maaib haiq taub pyauj tu'q Dutq, fai tu'q zyavb Jyenq Rwrnj yu-Daa teib puv, tovb ninb Bua maaib Hruq xij Rwrnj mivb yem Eei txvj. weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq tu'q Rwrnj, Zwrtq liud taub paaq pyauj Zwrtq Eei myenb.”
44.23: se laaij meib Bua puaq huv yaag paamd zwid txvg zyruq, maiq mwavj ninb kxvq Eei waag, maiq kan ninb Eei leib latg Zauj ninb Eei leid Zauj ninb Eei leib Eeig meib Bua Zivj taaib zu'g naaiq teij Zyruq Eei ze'g naang Navq ib Nxi nx.”
44.6: weig naaiq yia nrud haig, ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Navq Fopg trud yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg. uaq teij zivb zyrug penj paaig waaig paaig Waav Eei txvj Navq ib Nxi nx.’
44.2: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua tu'q pwatg yia yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb pun ninb Bua zu'g Eei yetg zuvq Zyruq Eei ze'g naang. mavg maa'b! uaq teij zivb ib Nxi penj paaig Waav Eei txvj, maiq maaib myenb yem,
44.20: ye-le-mi zyrug Buaj zwavj pc'g fivj, mJavg msia'q, yetg zuvq Navq naaig tau ninb Eei myenb,
44.24: ye-le-mi kxvq Buaj zwavj pc'g fivj Zauj yetg zuvq msia'q txn, “ta'faanb meib Bua yem i-yipq teib puv Eei yu-Daa myenb aa'b! mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
44.28: pyauj Ru'g Daauq yem i-yipq Rwrnj yu-Daa teib puv Eei myenb zo'g Eei. taaib yem Jyenq i-yipq teib puv zevg Fiag Eei yu-Daa myenb yetg zuvq zyrug hiuq tu'q haiq taub Eei waag lyepg tu'q wrnq, se yia Eei fai ninb Bua Eei.’
44.7: “ib zang zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua weig haiq tiug zruj naaiq teij Lo haig Eei x'q sig hxig kanb, zyrug pun meib Bua Eei mJavg msia'q, fu'Jweiq Zauj hopq Exj Eei kub vwaad yem yu-Daa zu'g Pai kwavg. meib Bua zyrug maiq zevg yetg laanb a'q.
44.29: “zyruq kxvq, ‘naaiq zruj nxm levg Jeiq Eei Javb hog. yia xij yem naaiq nxm txvj tivg meib Bua Eei zwid weig pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia xij pun meib Bua zu'g Zyruq uaq teij waag zuvq lyepg tu'q wrnq.’
44.19: uaq teij msia'q txn kxvq, “yia Bua puaq huv pun luvb Eei huvb maag yaag Ziaq ziag pun ninb, se yia Bua zruj uaq taub huvb maag Eei favj Eei Fuaq, yaag Ziaq ziag pun ninb, maiq zeid yia Bua Eei Goj Gxi Rwib zruj fai?”
44.17: mq paag yia Bua xij zruj zyavj ziuj yia Bua hruq Jyenq Eei yetg zuvq waag. yia Bua xij puaq huv pun luvb Eei huvb maag cvj Ziaq ziag pun ninb Navq yia Bua, lyemb yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij, yia Bua Eei huvb Zauj Jyen yem yu-Daa Eei zivb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg zruj Eei nx. uaq zang yia Bua Navq naaig zruj yia Bua maaib Eang hopq Zamq, yaag tu'q lovj, zuvq maiq pwatg zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.
44.30: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia xij zx'q i-yipq huvb, faa-lo-ho-faa, Jiu pun yem ninb Eei winb wavq Eei puab Diaq Zauj lxd ninb Eei mcvg uaq teij Eei puab Diaq, Navq yia zx'q yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, Jiu pun yem ninb Eei winb wavq Zauj lxd ninb Eei mcvg uaq taub Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Eei puab Diaq.
44.27: mavg maa'b! yia zuaq Jyenq xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq maiq zeid tu'q lovj. ta'faanb yem i-yipq teib puv Eei yu-Daa myenb zuvq zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj myetg Revg, Tauj ninb Bua zutg Revg.
44.11: “weig naaiq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia xij Byenq Myen zyrug pun meib Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang, weig zx'q yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb Pai kwavg.
44.5: mq paag ninb Bua maiq mwavj, yaag maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj, maiq kwavg ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig yaag puaq huv pun Eiag Eei zyenb.
44.9: meib Bua la'Ku'q yem yu-Daa teib puv Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij zruj Eei x'q sig, yu-Daa huvb Zauj ninb Bua Eei auq zruj Eei x'q sig, meib Bua kanb Zauj meib Bua Eei auq zruj Eei x'q sig fai?
44.16: “kxvq Tauj meib tevq zyruq Eei mevb kxvq Buaj yia Bua uaq teij waag, yia Bua maiq mwavj.
44.4: mq paag yia zanb zang Paaiq yia Eei pru, zwavj trug waag myenb, mivb kxvq Buaj meib Bua, “maiq tuvq zruj yia Rxv haig naaiq teij kamb Riaq Eei sig maa'b!”
44.10: Tauj ib Nxi ninb Bua maiq Eyemg kanb zruj faij yaag maiq kamb Riaj, yaag maiq ei Jyenq yia yem meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei Ra'Myen lyepg Eei leib latg Zauj livg.’
44.22: zyruq Eyend maiq tu'q meib Bua zruj x'q Eei Jauq Zauj meib Bua zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig. se weig naaiq meib Bua Eei teib puv zu'g paaig waaig paaig Waav yaag zu'g zyruj, maiq maaib myenb yem Navq ib Nxi nx.
44.12: yia xij zx'q yu-Daa zevg Fiag Eei myenb, tovb tivg Hruq mivb yem i-yipq teib puv. ninb Bua yetg zuvq zyrug zu'g myetg Revg. yem i-yipq teib puv ninb Bua zuvq zu'g taig. yem zruj faij Jiaj Tauj zruj Lo Jiaj ninb Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj taig. ninb Bua zyrug zu'g myenb zyruj, penj kamb Riaj Eei ka'naaiq, penj zyruj Eei waag, yaag zu'g myenb Wrtq.’
44.15: uaq zang hiuq tu'q kanb Eei auq puaq huv pun Eiag Eei zyenb uaq teij yetg zuvq mJavg txn, Zauj sruq Jyenq ka'Len Eei yetg zuvq msia'q txn, penj yetg tomb kwanb myenb, se yem i-yipq teib puv, patg-lotq teig Eei zwavj myenb, tau ye-le-mi,
44.13: yia xij lovg Ru'g Daauq, vxg Naavj Eei Jauq Zauj wrnb pcvg tivg yem i-yipq uaq teij Eei zwid, Navq yia tivg ye-lu-saa-lem myenb Eei zwid nx.
44.1: naaiq se ye-le-mi zipq Eei waag kxvq yem i-yipq teib puv Eei yetg zuvq yiu-Tai myenb, se yem mikq-Don, Taa-paan-hetg Zauj mem-fitq yaag yem patg-lotq teig. waag kxvq,
44.26: “Navq naaig meib Bua yetg zuvq yem i-yipq teig Eei yu-Daa myenb mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b! zyruq kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Lo haig Eei mevb hruq waag kxvq, yem naaiq mivb yem kxmj i-yipq teib puv yia maiq pun haiq taub yu-Daa myenb kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq Tinb huvb hruq waag.’
44.25: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei auq kanb Eei Rwib kxvq, meib Bua kanb Eei puad yaag zruj zyavj. meib Bua kxvq, “yia Bua zuvq xij Jaauq suv yia Bua hruq Eei waag, se puaq huv pun luvb Eei huvb maag yaag Ziaq ziag pun ninb.” meib Bua kunq ei Jyenq zruj yaag Jaauq suv meib Bua lcvd Eei vcvg waag.’+”

20.18: yia weig haiq tiug Zwrtq seij taaib? weig pwatg laaub lwig, Raub Kruq, pun zu'g Eaiq Eei Jauq Eang Revg yia Eei Nxib Eia'g.
20.3: ta'Eeig Nxi, paatg-he puvj ye-le-mi Zwrtq kapg puab zauj Eei ka'naaiq uaq zang, ye-le-mi kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq maiq zeid heug meib Eei Buaj zruj paatg-he. ninb heug meib zruj maa-ko-mitq-saa-Bipg.
20.8: weig zu'g yia haiq zang kxvq, yia heug Zwrtq. yia heug Jyenq kxvq, “zu'g heiq sig, paaig waaig a'q lo'b!” weig zu'g zyruq Eei waag zyavb Nxi pun yia zu'g myenb kxvq to'g, zu'g myenb Wrtq.
20.9: sij kxvq yia maiq cvj kxvq, “yia maiq kxvq Tauj ninb, fai cvj tevq ninb Eei Buaj kxvq,” ninb Eei waag yem yia Eei Hruq Navq trud puaq nx, yaag zotq Jyenq yia Eei Buvq ka'Euad. yia Eyend Jyenq haid Kruq haig, Eyend maiq tu'q a'q.
20.7: zyruq aag, meib Duaq yia, yia yaag zu'g Duaq a'q. meib maaib Qa'q kaub henq yia zyrug hivb yia. yia zyavb Nxi zu'g myenb Jyetq yia, taub taub Wrtq yia.
20.5: maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. yia xij zx'q yem naaiq nxm zivb Eei yetg zuvq zinb zxib, yetg zuvq zxng taaib Eei ka'naaiq, Zauj yu-Daa huvb yetg zuvq Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq, Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Eei puad luq, xij zx'q cvj pyenb mivb Baa-Bi-lon.
20.16: Toq pun uaq taub myenb Navq zyruq paaig waaig uaq teij zivb, maiq tu'q Kxb lyenb. Toq pun ninb luvb Dxm mwavj haid Raub Eyemq Eei Qiaj, luvb aanj haid Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj Bwi.
20.17: weig zu'g yia yem maa Eei ka'sia uaq zang ninb maiq taij yia, pun yia Eei maa penj zavj yia Eei zruq, ninb Eei ka'sia yetg liud Lo.
20.14: Toq pun yia Zwrtq seij uaq Nxi zu'g zyruj a'q. Toq maiq tuvq pun yia Eei maa yuvd yia taaib uaq Nxi tu'q fu'q.
20.4: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia zuvq xij pun meib hc'q meib kanb kamb Riaj, cvj hc'q meib Eei yetg zuvq lob kcv txig kamb Riaj. meib mavg Jyenq Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua yem winb wavq Eei Ra'Myen zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. yia yaag xij zx'q yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb Jiu pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb. ninb yaag xij zx'q ninb Bua kwaatq mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon, yem uaq lovg Ru'g Daauq taij ninb Bua.
20.2: paatg-he zyrug Bx'q trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, cvj yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq uaq Jiaj puv Ben-yaa-min kcvb Eei kapg puab zauj ka'naaiq kapg Jyenq ninb.
20.6: paatg-he aa'b! meib c'q, Zauj yetg zuvq yem meib Eei pyauq Eei myenb xij zu'g kwaatq mivb. meib zyrug mivb Baa-Bi-lon. meib zuvq xij zu'g yem uaq taig cvj zavj Jyenq uaq, se meib Zauj meib Eei zwavj lob kcv txig, tovb meib trug Jaaq waag pun uaq teij.”
20.13: xij zu'g paauj Ruv pun zyruq, xij zu'g Zev zyruq, weig zu'g ninb Fruj tavb tonj myenb Eei mcvg, pyauj Dutq x'q myenb Eei puab Diaq.
20.12: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq aa'b! meib seij Kuq myenb, yaag mavg myenb Eei Hruq Zauj Namq Eei sig. Toq pun yia pwatg meib Jaauq win pun ninb Bua, weig zu'g yia zx'q yia Eei sig Jiu pun meib mig a'q.
20.15: Toq pun txb fyenj taaib Buaj yia Eei tia, “meib tu'q taub txn taaib a'q,” pun yia Eei tia a'Neiq uaq taub myenb zu'g zyruj a'q.
20.11: mq paag zyruq Zauj yia yem Navq Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv nx.” zruj to'g yia uaq teij zyrug Di'q zu'g Dxpg. ninb Bua maiq haib hivb yia. ninb Bua zuvq zu'g paaig Myen Zamq Eei, weig zu'g ninb Bua zruj maiq Zwrtq. ninb Bua zu'g paaig Myen, myenb yetg liud maiq la'Ku'q.
20.1: im-me Eei txn, paatg-he sai myenb, zruj pyeiq kunq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq. ninb haid ye-le-mi trug waag kxvq naaiq teij sig.
20.10: weig zu'g yia haid myenb Zamq Eei waab sapq kxvq, “kamb Riaj haig Eei sig yem weib kxmj.” yia zua'g haig Eei yetg zuvq lob kcv txig kxvq, “koj ninb maa'b! Bua lomb Rxib koj ninb a'q.” ninb Bua yaag zuaq Jyenq yia zruj txvg. ninb Bua kxvq, “Riaj ninb haib zu'g Duaq, yia Bua zyrug haib hivb ninb, cvj Jaauq win pun ninb.”

5.18: zyruq kxvq, “maiq kunq Navq naaig, yem uaq teij Nxib Eia'g yia Zxg maiq pun meib Bua zutg Revg.
5.8: ninb Bua Navq tu'q Eang lovj Eei maab kruq scv, kx'g myenb hcq hcq Eei heug kx'g myenb Jwavg laavd myenb Eei auq.”
5.3: zyruq aag, meib Eei mziv lxd zyen leid maiq zeid? meib Bx'q ninb Bua mq paag ninb Bua maiq haid fuvg. meib myetg ninb Bua mq paag ninb Bua maiq Kavq lovj Jyenq faauj. ninb Bua pun ninb Bua Eei Myen kaub vcvg la'pyeiq, maiq Kavq kxiq Hruq Rwrnj.
5.21: ‘Vovj Eei, maiq hiuq haiq Euvg Eei pc'g fivj, tovb maaib mziv mq paag mavg maiq pwatg, maaib mnxmb mq paag mwavj maiq haid Eei myenb, mwavj naaiq teij waag maa'b!’+”
5.14: weig naaiq zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “weig zu'g ninb Bua kxvq naaiq teij waag, yia zx'q yia Eei waag an Jyenq meib Eei Rwib penj trud, naaiq teij pc'g fivj penj zaavb. uaq teij trud zyrug puaq ninb Bua Qwi Revg.”
5.23: mq paag naaiq teij myenb Hruq vcvg, Zauj yia txib tekg, ninb Bua zyrug Win kanb puv mivb mig a'q.
5.6: weig naaiq syenb xij yem uaq lomg Zwrtq taaib vaatg taig ninb Bua, Yiab Jub Jia'q xij yem teib puvb Waav Zwrtq taaib myetg ninb Bua. Da'maaub Beuj xij yem ninb Bua Eei zivb ka'Eiag zuaq mavg, ta'faanb Zwrtq zivb Eei myenb zyrug zu'g petq penj ziaj teij, weig zu'g ninb Bua paamd zwid Zamq, vcvg tod Eei Jauq yaag Lo haig.
5.2: maiq kunq ninb Bua kxvq, ‘zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq hruq waag,’ mq paag ninb Bua hruq Eei waag Jaaq Eei.”
5.20: “naaiq teij waag xij zu'g zunb Buaj yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun, cvj yem yu-Daa teig kxvq,
5.24: ninb Bua maiq yem Hruq ka'Euad kxvq, ‘Bua xij zu'g Taaib zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb. ninb ziuj Zunb Zyru pun Byuvg Fiag, se Zunb ken Byuvg Zauj Zyrub ken Byuvg. cvj weig yia Bua lyrub Jyenq tivg taaib syru kcvb zwavj Eei zyavb hog.’
5.28: ninb Bua Jung, yrug! yrug uaq. ninb Bua zruj x'q sig Jiaj Daavg, maiq tivb, yaag maiq lovg pcvb fim Eei leid tunj sig, maiq Tevj kub hanb fu'Jweiq tu'q lovj yaag maiq Tevj tavb tonj myenb tu'q pcvb fim Eei leid.”
5.7: “yia Navq haiq nx haib kwavg meib Eei zwid? meib Eei zeib fun kwavg yia mig a'q, cvj zyavq Jyenq tovb maiq zeid zyenb hruq waag. yia pun ninb Bua Eang peuq Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua Yenj auq Yenj Goj, zyavb kwanb Eei mivb maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn Eei pyauq.
5.29: zyruq kxvq, “yia maiq weig naaiq teij sig tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid fai? yia maiq zeid weig yia kanb Jaauq win pun naaiq Euvg kua'q Eei myenb fai?
5.19: meib Eei pc'g fivj naaig, ‘zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, weig haiq tiug zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig pun yia Bua?’ meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘meib Bua Navq haiq nx kwavg yia cvj yem meib Bua Eei teib puv fub suj kanb fivj Eei zyenb, meib Bua zyrug xij zu'g Navq uaq nx mivb tovb maiq zeid meib Bua kanb Eei teib puv fub suj kanb fivj myenb.’
5.17: ninb Bua zyrug Eang Revg meib Bua Eei Eang hopq Zauj laavb zi'g, Eang Revg meib Bua Eei naamb Erud, Eang meib Bua Eei vovb kwanb, pa'ki yuvb kwanb, Eang meib Bua Eei a'vung Zauj vovb Exj pyruq. ninb Bua xij lovg Ru'g Daauq zruj waaig meib Bua Kauj uaq teij weib wrnq Eei zivb.”
5.31: se trug waag myenb trug Jaaq waag, sai myenb yaag ziuj ninb Bua kanb Paaiq Eei waag kunq. yia Eei pc'g fivj a'Neiq Navq naaig, mq paag Tauj setq mweid Eei zyavb hog meib Bua Navq haiq nx zruj?
5.30: “maaib hc'q myenb kamb Riaq haig Eei sig yem naaiq nxm teib puv Zwrtq taaib,
5.27: ninb Bua Eei pyauq maaib kuq kwaij Eei sig pwavq Revg, Navq maaib nx'g pwavq Revg lovb. weig naaiq ninb Bua tu'q zruj Lo yaag putq zxib.
5.11: i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Zauj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun mtaaib vcvg yia Tauj Diaq.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
5.5: yia xij mivb lxd zruj Lo Eei myenb, yaag xij Zauj ninb Bua kxvq, weig zu'g ninb Bua hiuq tu'q zyruq Eei Jauq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei leid.” mq paag ninb Bua yetg zuvq fib Navq Revg wrtq nauq Dyavb kaad, yaag Zutq Dutq Dob Jyenq Eei Laav.
5.9: zyruq kxvq, “yia weig naaiq teij sig maiq tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid fai? yia yaag maiq zu'g weig naaiq Euvg kua'q Eei myenb Tevj yia kanb Jaauq win fai?
5.16: ninb Bua Eei fxvb Dovb se Navq wetq Tov Eei Janb taig zruq, ninb Bua yetg zuvq se henq haig Eei pcv.
5.4: yia cvj kxvq, “naaiq teij myenb Kuvj penj myenb Jomg myenb Navq, ninb Bua se maiq hiuq haiq Euvg Eei myenb, weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q zyruq Eei Jauq, maiq hiuq ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei leid.
5.10: “mivb a'q. kan ninb Eei a'vung pyruq Eei yetg lyrud yetg lyrud mivb zruj waaig, mq paag maiq tuvq myetg Revg. xij zu'g Pitq ninb Eei Gwaab kwavg, weig zu'g maiq zeid penj zyruq Eei.
5.22: zyruq kxvq, “meib Bua maiq kamb Riaj yia fai? meib Bua maiq yem yia Eei Ra'Myen sin zinj fai? yia lovg saab zyru penj Kxiq Eei kapg Jaaij kxn, penj yetg liud zruj zc'q uam Eei txvj, uam Jiaj maiq tu'q. maiq kunq uamb laavg Gomd, yaag maiq haib Jiaj, maiq kunq uamb laavg zob zod Eei Bwi, ninb Bua Jiaj maiq tu'q.
5.12: ninb Bua kxvq Jaaq Tauj zyruq, yaag kxvq, “zyruq maiq zruj haiq Euvg. yia Bua maiq zu'g haiq Euvg Zyruq Eei ze'g naang, Ru'g Daauq Zauj vxg Naavj Eei Jauq yia Bua yaag maiq pwatg.
5.15: zyruq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! yia xij txb yetg kua'q myenb yem ko Eei taaib Bx'q meib Bua. se lob Nxi lyepg taaib yem Jyenq laub Eei kua'q. penj yetg kua'q tovb meib Bua maiq hiuq ninb Bua Eei waag, ninb Bua kxvq haiq Euvg meib Bua yaag maiq pia'g Hruq.
5.13: trug waag myenb Navq kxv Ryaauj,   zyruq Eei waag maiq yem ninb Bua Eei Hruq. Toq pun ninb Bua zu'g Navq ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag.”
5.1: “meib Bua xij zu'g yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Jaaib hxvg Tiuj mivb Tiuj taaib, mavg yaag samj lovj. yem zivb Eei tomb zwavj zaamg zimb lxd mavg kaaj, haib lxd tu'q pwatg yetg laanb zruj pcvb fim Eei, lxd zyen leid Eei myenb. sij kxvq maaib nx, yia zyrug kwavg naaiq nxm zivb Eei zwid.
5.26: “weig zu'g yem yia Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj maaib x'q myenb, ninb Bua pivj Jyenq zuaq Navq zcv nx'g Eei myenb zuaq nx. ninb Bua zcv Laav weig zx'q myenb.
5.25: meib Bua Eei zwid pun naaiq teij sig Win mivb kanb puv, meib Bua Eei zwid pun meib Bua maiq tu'q lovj.

19.3: xij zu'g kxvq, ‘yu-Daa Eei huvb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij pun Zyruq haig Eei ze'g naang Tauj naaiq nxm txvj. ta'faanb mwavj haid naaiq teij sig Eei myenb, mnxmb zyrug Givj Revg,
19.8: yia xij pun naaiq nxm zivb penj kamb Riaj Eei txvj yaag penj myenb Wrtq Eei ka'naaiq. laaij naaiq nxm zivb zu'g Eei yetg zuvq ze'g naang, ta'faanb Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb kevb! kamb Riaj haig yaag Wrtq.
19.9: winb wavq Zauj xij hxig mcvg uaq teij weib Jyenq zivb, pun ninb Bua zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog, yia xij pun kx'g myenb Eang kx'g myenb Eei txn sia'q Eei xq Zauj ninb Bua Eei Jwavg laavd myenb Eei xq.’
19.7: “+‘yem naaiq nxm txvj yia xij pun yu-Daa myenb Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem myenb taaq Eei za'eij Dxtq mig a'q. yia xij pun ninb Bua Eei myenb yem winb wavq Eei Ra'Myen zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, yaag pun zu'g yem hxig ninb Bua Eei mcvg uaq teij Eei puab Diaq. yia xij zx'q ninb Bua Eei sei penj Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Zauj ka'Diaq Dau Eei Yiab zxib Eei Eang hopq.
19.5: ninb cvj weig Baa-an zyenb zruj Lav Eei txvj, weig zx'q ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq zruj fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq pun Baa-an zyenb. yaag maiq zeid yia Paaiq fai heug ninb Bua zruj. yia lyemb maiq Namq Tauj.”
19.14: ye-le-mi zyrug yem To-fetq, tovb zyruq Paaiq ninb mivb trug waag Eei txvj Rwrnj. ninb yaag sruq Jyenq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq laatg ka'Euad kxvq Buaj zwavj pc'g fivj,
19.4: weig zu'g pc'g fivj kwavg yia. ninb Bua yem naaiq nxm txvj puaq huv kevj Eiag Eei zyenb, tovb ninb Bua kanb Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zauj yu-Daa Eei huvb maiq haid Jiaj Eei zyenb, zyrug pun naaiq nxm txvj maaib wij. ninb Bua yaag pun maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb Eei Ryaamq pwavq Revg naaiq nxm txvj.
19.2: mivb Tauj Ben-hin-nom hxvd yem niab mx huq Eei kcvb txib vaang. yem uaq zunb yia Buaj meib naaiq teij waag.
19.6: zyruq kxvq, ‘weig naaiq, Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, naaiq nxm txvj maiq heug To-fetq fai Ben-hin-nom hxvd. zuvq xij heug taij taig Eei hxvd.
19.13: ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pyauq Zauj yu-Daa Eei zwavj huvb yetg zuvq huvb ting, se ta'faanb yem haiq nxm pyauq Eei pyaub vxb maaib myenb puaq huv pun luvb zavg Eei Euvb Euvg Leij, fai Ziaq ziag pun Eiag Eei zyenb, zuvq zu'g maaib wij Navq To-fetq nx.”+’
19.12: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij Navq naaiq zruj pun naaiq nxm txvj Zauj yem naaiq nxm txvj Eei myenb, pun naaiq nxm zivb Navq To-fetq.
19.15: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia xij pun naaiq nxm zivb Zauj weib kxmj Eei yetg zuvq fiub laavd zu'g ziuj yia kxvq Eei yetg zuvq ze'g naang, weig zu'g ninb Bua Hruq vcvg, maiq Kavq mwavj yia Eei waag.’+”
19.11: yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “Navq yia Bx'q nanq nia zavg Eei niab ha'lrub huq, yia xij Bx'q naaiq teij myenb Zauj naaiq nxm zivb huq Revg, yetg liud maiq haib cvj zxg. myenb xij zu'g yem To-fetq pyopq sei, weig zu'g maiq maaib kanb nxm txvj pyopq.”+’
19.1: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib mivb maaid nanq nia zavg Eei yetg nxm niab ha'lrub cvj txb teij pc'g fivj Eei myenb koj Zauj teij koj Eei sai myenb
19.10: “meib xij zu'g txv Jyenq Zauj meib mivb uaq teij myenb Bx'q uaq nxm niab ha'lrub huq,

38.18: sij kxvq meib maiq Eyemg swei, maiq zx'q kanb fuvj pun Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Jyen, naaiq nxm zivb zyrug zu'g Jiu pun yem Ken-Dia myenb Eei puab Diaq. ninb Bua zyrug lovg trud puaq. meib yaag pyauj maiq Dutq yem ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq.’+”
38.8: e-Betg-me-lekq zyrug yem huvb ting Zwrtq mivb kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj,
38.3: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘naaiq nxm zivb zuvq xij zu'g Jiu pun Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Junb pcv Eei puab Diaq. ninb Bua zyrug Zaavq tu'q mig a'q.’+”
38.21: mq paag sij kxvq meib maiq Eyemg swei, naaiq se zyruq laaug yaavb pun yia pwatg Eei sig.
38.14: sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb Paaiq myenb mivb txb trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, taaib Tauj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ta'faam Kav kcvb pia'g Eei txvj, zyrug yem naaig pwavb ninb. huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj ye-le-mi, “yia xij naaig yetg Euvg meib. maiq tuvq pivj haiq Euvg maiq Buaj yia.”
38.23: “ninb Bua xij zx'q meib Eei yetg zuvq auq Zauj naamb Erud Jiu pun Ken-Dia myenb. meib kanb yaag maiq haib pyauj Dutq ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq, zuvq zu'g Baa-Bi-lon huvb zx'q. naaiq nxm zivb yaag xij zu'g trud puaq Qwi.”
38.6: ninb Bua zyrug zx'q ye-le-mi, lovg Laav puvj Fiag, pun ninb yem huvb tiaj Eei txn, man-Ki-aa, Eei syru uam Kwrtq ka'Euad, uaq teij syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad. uaq nxm syru uam Eei Kwrtq maiq maaib uam, Kuvj maaib uamb pamg Dxvb. ye-le-mi zyrug zemb Fiag uamb pamg mig a'q.
38.2: ninb kxvq, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘haiq taub yem naaiq nxm zivb zuvq xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg taig. mq paag Zwrtq mivb lxd Ken-Dia myenb uaq teij tu'q zyavb Jyenq, se ninb tu'q ninb Eei mcvg penj Bx'q Jaaj tu'q taaib Eei zivb Eeig, tu'q mcvg zyavb.’
38.20: ye-le-mi tau, “meib maiq zu'g Jiu pun ninb Bua. Toq meib mwavj zyruq lovg yia kxvq Buaj meib Eei waag, meib zyrug tu'q lovj. ninb Bua yaag lyrub meib Eei mcvg.
38.24: sej-De-Ki-yaa kxvq Buaj ye-le-mi, “maiq tuvq pun haiq taub hiuq tu'q naaiq teij waag, meib zyrug maiq taig.
38.28: ye-le-mi yem Jyenq syruq kcv myenb Eei laatg ka'Euad Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zu'g Ken-Dia myenb zx'q uaq Nxi.
38.7: yem huvb ting maaib taub im toq Eei e-Ti-o-pia myenb, Buaj heug e-Betg-me-lekq. ninb haid kxvq ninb Bua zx'q ye-le-mi puvj Fiag syru uam Eei Kwrtq. uaq zang huvb tiaj zweid Jyenq Ben-yaa-min kcvb Daavg.
38.19: sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb kxvq Buaj ye-le-mi, “yia kamb Riaj pyauj mivb pia'g Ken-Dia myenb uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb. Riaj Ken-Dia myenb zx'q yia Jiu pun uaq teij myenb, ninb Bua zyrug zruj to'g pun yia.”
38.17: ye-le-mi zyrug kxvq Buaj sej-De-Ki-yaa, “zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘sij kxvq meib Eyemg swei, zx'q kanb fuvj pun Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Jyen, meib zyrug tu'q mcvg Zwrtq. naaiq nxm zivb zyrug zu'g Jiu pun Ken-Dia myenb. ninb Bua yaag maiq lovg trud puaq a'q. meib Zauj meib Eei pyauq zov myenb yaag tu'q zyavb Jyenq.
38.27: Ga'haaq zwavj Jyen taaib lxd ye-le-mi naaig ninb, ninb zyrug ziuj huvb tiaj Buaj zyavj Eei waag Buaj ninb Bua. ninb Bua zyrug maiq Zauj ninb kxvq haiq Euvg a'q, weig zu'g maiq maaib haiq taub haid ninb Zauj huvb tiaj kxvq waag.
38.11: e-Betg-me-lekq zyrug txb uaq teij myenb Zauj Jyenq ninb mivb. ninb Bua mivb Tauj huvb ting, Tauj syru lwib huq Eei txvj, lxd lob Dia Zauj lwib hrub huq. lovg Laav puvj Fiag syru uam Eei Kwrtq pun ye-le-mi.
38.5: sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb kxvq, “ninb yem meib Bua Eei puab Diaq. huvb tiaj maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg vcvg meib Bua.”
38.9: “yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj aag, naaiq teij myenb zruj pun trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, Eei Euvb Euvg sig se x'q haig. yem uaq ninb zuvq xij vxg taig, weig zu'g zivb ka'Euad maiq maaib yetg teij Eang hopq a'q.”
38.16: sej-De-Ki-yaa huvb zyrug pivj Jyenq Zauj ye-le-mi hruq waag kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq, tovb pun yia Bua maaib mcvg uaq taub, hruq waag kxvq, yia maiq taij meib yaag maiq Jiu pun meib yem lxd meib Eei mcvg uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq.”
38.4: uaq teij Jyen kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “Toq pun naaiq laanb myenb zu'g taij taig, weig zu'g ninb zx'q naaiq Euvg waag Buaj zivb ka'Euad zevg Fiag Eei pcv Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj zyrug pun ninb Bua Eei puad mau. naaiq laanb myenb maiq zeid xij pun naaiq teij pc'g fivj tu'q lovj. ninb xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Kruq Navq.”
38.10: huvb tiaj zyrug Paaiq e-Ti-o-pia myenb, e-Betg-me-lekq. ninb kxvq, “xij zu'g txb yem naaiq Eei pua laanb myenb mivb trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, uaq. ninb maiq kcvb taig xij zu'g yem syru uam Eei Kwrtq Zia ninb Zwrtq Daavg.”
38.22: mavg maa'b! yem yu-Daa Eei huvb ting zevg Fiag Eei msia'q txn zu'g txb Zwrtq Jiu pun Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Jyen. uaq teij msia'q txn kxvq, “+‘tovb meib puvj Hruq Eei kxb yrud Duaq meib yaag hivb meib mig a'q. ib zang meib Eei zauj zemb Fiag uamb pamg, ninb Bua zyrug kwavg meib a'q.’
38.12: e-Ti-o-pia myenb, e-Betg-me-lekq, Buaj ye-le-mi, “zx'q pa'Eaaig Zauj lwib hrub huq fapq Jyenq Laav Zauj puab seib Diaq.” ye-le-mi ei Jyenq zruj.
38.15: ye-le-mi kxvq Buaj sej-De-Ki-yaa, “sij kxvq yia Buaj meib, meib Dovg haaij zuvq taij yia maiq zeid? sij kxvq yia Tevj meib Zaavb laavb, meib yaag maiq mwavj yia.”
38.13: ninb Bua zyrug lovg uaq teij Laav Zia ninb Zwrtq syru uam Eei Kwrtq. ye-le-mi Zxg yem syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad.
38.1: matq-Taan Eei txn, se-faa-Ti-yaa, Zauj paatg-he Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, Zauj se-le-mi-yaa Eei txn, ye-hu-Kan, Zauj man-Ki-aa Eei txn, paatg-he, haid ye-le-mi kxvq Buaj zwavj pc'g fivj Eei waag.
38.26: meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘yia Qa'q Toq huvb tiaj maiq tuvq fuvj yia Rwrnj yo-naa-Taan Eei pyauq yem uaq taig.’+”
38.25: sij kxvq uaq teij Jyen haid kxvq yia tu'q Zauj meib kxvq waag zyrug taaib lxd meib kxvq, ‘Buaj yia Bua maa'b! meib Navq haiq nx kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj? huvb tiaj yaag kxvq haiq Euvg Buaj meib? maiq tuvq pivj haiq Euvg yia Bua, yia Bua zyrug maiq taij meib,’

31.18: “yia haid e-faa-im weig kanb Raub Jyenq kxvq, ‘meib Bx'q Faauj yia, yia zyrug zu'g Bx'q Faauj Navq maiq tu'q Faauj Jiaj Eei vovb txn. Toq txb yia Rwrnj weig pun yia Navq lod uaq nx, weig zu'g meib zruj zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb.
31.8: mavg maa'b! yia xij txb ninb Bua yem pa'q puv Eei teib puv taaib, yaag yem luvb Diaq ko Jiaj Eei txvj syru ninb Bua zunq. yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj maaib mziv mcvb Zauj zauj Bai Eei myenb, Zauj maaib Jyenq sin Zauj mun Jyenq kub vwaad Eei msia'q txn, maaib tomb kwanb myenb xij Rwrnj naaiq taaib.
31.33: zyruq kxvq, “uaq teij Nxib Eia'g Jiaj liud, yia xij Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun lyepg Jiad Eei vcvg waag se Navq naaiq. yia xij pun yia Eei leib latg yem ninb Bua ka'Euad yaag fiaq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Hruq. yia xij zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, ninb Bua yaag xij zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj.
31.3: zinb Daavg zyruq yem ko Eei txvj hing Zwrtq pun ninb zyrug kxvq, “yia Namq meib se yetg liud Namq, weig naaiq yia zanb zang zyepg zua'q Eei Namq meib.
31.32: se maiq Navq yia Ken Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei puad txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv Eei zyavb hog, Zauj ninb Bua lyepg Jiad Eei vcvg waag. maiq kunq yia zruj ninb Bua Eei Goj, ninb Bua paamd yia Eei vcvg waag.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
31.21: “xij zu'g weig kanb lyepg nu'q Jauq Eei Javb hog, yaag zruj txb Jauq Eei tovg. xij zu'g lovb lovj Eei samj mavg uaq tiub tomb Jauq, se tovb meib mivb uaq tiub Jauq a'q. o i-saa-laa-en aa'b! xij zu'g Rwrnj a'q. xij zu'g Rwrnj meib Eei naaiq teij zivb.
31.35: zyruq pun Ba'Nxi luvb Nxi zang ziuj Fav, yaag tivg pun Leij Zauj Laaj maaib yetg Eeig. luvb mwrnd zang ziuj Fav, cvj Qruq Kxiq pun Kxiq Jiad laavg Bwi zob zod Eei, ninb Eei Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq.   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
31.40: kwavg sei, kwavg saaiq Eei zyavb nxm hxvd, Zauj yetg zuvq livb teig mivb Tauj Kitg-lon Do'q, cvj huvj Jyenq tov puv Tauj maab kcvb Eei kx'q zyrug weig zyruq Zivb Revg. uaq nxm zivb yetg liud maiq zu'g cvj pcv Zwrtq fai paaig waaig.”
31.14: yia xij pun sai myenb pwavq Hruq puvb zua'g Eei ka'naaiq, yaag pun yia Eei pc'g fivj weig yia zruj lovj Eei sig pwavq Hruq.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
31.23: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib pun ninb Bua tu'q lovj Navq lod Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua yem yu-Daa teib puv Zauj yu-Daa Eei zivb, cvj lovg naaiq teij waag kxvq, ‘pcvb fim yem Eei txvj, Zivb Revg Eei Bov aa'b! Toq zyruq Zeij fu'q pun meib.’
31.6: weig zu'g maaib Nxi xij Tauj, yem e-faa-im Bovb aiq txvj xij maaib syruq kcv myenb heug Jyenq kxvq, ‘Jiad taaib maa'b! Bua faauj uaq Jiaj si-on lxd zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb.’+”
31.34: yem naaig mivb kx'g myenb maiq zu'g cvj Faauj kanb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb Zauj kanb Eei kxb yrud kxvq, ‘meib xij zu'g hiuq zyruq. weig zu'g ninb Bua kaub faij Jiaj Tauj kaub Lo Jiaj yetg zuvq hiuq tu'q yia.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag. “weig zu'g yia xij kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwib nipg, maiq cvj Javj ninb Bua Eei zwid.”
31.2: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “pyauj Dutq Ru'g Daauq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb yem teib puvb Waav lxd txvj hitq Kwrnj Eei zyavb hog, yia Zeij en pun pc'g fivj.’
31.36: “sij kxvq naaiq teij yetg Eeig yem yia Eei Ra'Myen Zwrtq mivb, i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun zyrug zutg mig a'q. yetg liud maiq tu'q yem yia Eei Ra'Myen penj yetg kua'q myenb.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
31.20: zyruq kxvq, “e-faa-im se yia Namq Eei txn maiq zeid? se yia Namq haig Eei fu'Jweiq maiq zeid? yia haiq zang kxvq ninb, yia Zxg Javj zu'g ninb. weig naaiq yia Eei Hruq za'kevb Javj haig ninb a'q. yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij Kxb lyenb ninb.
31.24: yu-Daa teib puv Zauj yem yu-Daa Eei yetg zuvq zivb Eei myenb tu'q Jwavg Jyenq yem uaq, lyemb zruj Deig Eei myenb Zauj Jiaj naaiq Jiaj uaq Eei myenb Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb.
31.28: yaag xij Navq naaiq, “yia Navq haiq nx mavg Jyenq ninb Bua weig zx'q ninb Bua pcv Zwrtq, paaig waaig, Byenq Revg, myetg Revg, pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei sig, yia yaag xij Navq uaq nx mavg Jyenq ninb Bua weig lyepg Jiad yaag zwavj Jyenq.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
31.7: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “xij zu'g weig yaa-Kopq a'Neiq Eei paauj Ruv, yaag weig maang kua'q Eei pyeiq heug Jyenq Qiaj Lo Eei zunb Jyenq, Zev Jyenq kxvq, ‘zyruq Fruj ninb Eei pc'g fivj, zevg Fiag Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb.’
31.29: “Tauj uaq teij Nxib Eia'g myenb maiq cvj kxvq, ‘tia Eang a'vung pyrub swi, fu'Jweiq Eei Eaab Fyend.’
31.19: yia leib Gxi meib, Ga'haaq Namb Rwrnj, yia tu'q meib Faauj liud, yia zyrug Baij yia Eei Zamb zwib. yia zu'g Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen weig Daam yia lunj Eei zyavb hog zruj Eaiq Eei sig.’+”
31.17: meib hod Gaav Eei Jauq zyrug maaib lamb Namq.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag. “meib Eei naamb Erud yaag tu'q Rwrnj ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv.
31.38: zyruq kxvq, “Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, naaiq nxm zivb xij weig zyruq cvj lyepg Jiad yem haa-nan-en Eei laaub Tauj kx'g kcvb.
31.31: zyruq kxvq, “Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Zauj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun lyepg Jiad syavb vcvg waag.
31.30: taauj Rwrnj, kx'g myenb xij zu'g laaij kx'g myenb Eei zwid taig. haiq taub Eang a'vung pyrub swi, ninb kanb Eei Eaab zyrug Fyend a'q.”
31.27: zyruq kxvq, “Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij pun i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa teig maaib myenb, maaib scvb Kuq pwavq Revg.
31.11: weig zu'g zyruq zua'g yaa-Kopq Rwrnj mig a'q, zua'g ninb pyauj Dutq kaub henq ninb uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq.
31.5: meib cvj tu'q yem saa-maa-lia Eei Bov zruj Wivj, zwavj a'vung pyruq. zwavj Eei myenb tu'q zwavj, yaag tu'q Eang uaq teij pyruq.
31.9: ninb Bua xij Eyemq Jyenq taaib. yia yaag xij nund Jyenq Hruq txb ninb Bua Rwrnj. yia xij pun ninb Bua kan Do'g Len, yavb Jaub za'g. yavb naaig ninb Bua maiq Di'q zu'g Dxpg, weig zu'g yia se i-saa-laa-en Eei tia, e-faa-im zruj yia Eei txnb Lo.
31.16: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “xij zu'g Eyend Jyenq Qiaj, maiq tuvq Eyemq. cvj Eyend Jyenq uamb mweig, maiq pun lyrug, weig zu'g meib zruj Eei kov xij tu'q zivb Eeig.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag. “ninb Bua tu'q yem winb wavq Eei teib puv Rwrnj.
31.37: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “sij kxvq haib Dx'g kub vwaaig luvb, yaag haib zaab tu'q Zwrtq Daub Diaq Eei kxnb Do'q, yia zyrug weig i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig zx'q ninb Bua zxi kwavg.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
31.39: Dx'g Eei Laav xij yem naaig Jiaj mivb, pcv za'g Eei mivb Tauj kaa-lepq Bovb aiq cvj Win mivb Tauj ko-aa.
31.4: o i-saa-laa-en aa'b! yia cvj xij Zeij Jiad meib, meib zyrug tu'q Zeij Jiad. meib tu'q Bx'q lxb Rod Kub mwavj, yaag tu'q Zwrtq mivb Zauj naug Eitg Eei myenb Zavj heij.
31.10: “o maang kua'q myenb aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag, yaag zunb mivb ko Eei Kxib Len txvj. xij zu'g kxvq, ‘pun i-saa-laa-en faatq Raanj uaq taub cvj xij syru zunq, yaag xij kruj ninb Navq kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb kruj ninb Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb nx.’
31.22: maiq zyepg zua'q Eei sia'q aa'b! meib xij Buvb Byenq Tauj haiq zang? weig zu'g zyruq yem luvb Diaq zruj Zwrtq yetg Euvg syavb sig, se maaib msia'q txn peu mJavg txn.”
31.12: ninb Bua xij taaib yem si-on Lav Eei txvj paauj Ruv, ninb Bua xij Fyenb yrub naug Eitg weig zyruq Zeij lovj Eei ka'naaiq, weig maaib Byaub, a'vung tiuq, Zauj ka'lanq yrub yaag weig pa'ki yuvb kwanb Zauj vovb kwanb Eei txn. ninb Bua Eei Hruq xij Navq tu'q uam yuvd Eei Wivj, maiq zu'g cvj Raub faanb a'q.
31.15: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “haid Qiaj yem laa-maa, Hruq mun Eei heug Jyenq Eyemq. laa-sen Eyemq ninb Eei fu'Jweiq, ninb yaag maiq lovg haiq taub Tevj ninb Jaiq Raub, weig zu'g ninb Eei fu'Jweiq taig mig a'q.”
31.13: uaq zang sia'g txn Fyenb yrub Eei Zavj heij, myenb lunj myenb Zauj myenb koj myenb zruj naug Eitg. yia xij pun ninb Bua Raub Eyemq Eei Jauq Tiuq penj Fyenb yrub. yia xij nund ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua Eei yrub Raub Tiuq penj xnb lx'g.
31.1: zyruq kxvq, “Tauj uaq zang, yia zruj fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb. ninb Bua yaag zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj.”
31.26: Navq naaig, yia Eia taaib mavg. yia haid yia mFxmb tu'q Kuq Eei.
31.25: yia xij pun Kruq Eei myenb henq Jiad taaib. taub taub Hruq mau Eei myenb yia yaag pun pwavq eij.”

52.18: ninb Bua yaag zx'q Zcv, ka'naaib Zenq, Japq tavb Zoq Eei Fiuq, punb Zauj huvb lrub, Zauj yem uaq nxm pyauq lovg Eei yetg zuvq tovb si'q Jaab txvj txb mivb.
