41.1: Tauj Zyetq Laaj, maaib huvb Eei trub zov, zruj Lo Eei Jyen, se e-li-saa-maa Eei fun, ne-Taa-ni-yaa Eei txn, i-saa-maa-en, Zauj Jyenq zyepg laanb myenb mivb Tauj mitq-paa lxd aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa. ninb Bua yem mitq-paa lomb Rxib Eang Naavj uaq zang,
41.10: i-saa-maa-en cvj zx'q yem mitq-paa zevg Fiag Eei myenb, se huvb sia'q Zauj yem mitq-paa zevg Fiag Eei pc'g fivj, tovb kruj huvb tiaj Eei pcvb pyeiq, ne-Bu-saa-laa-Daan, Jiu pun aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa. ne-Taa-ni-yaa Eei txn, i-saa-maa-en zyrug kwaatq ninb Bua Zwrtq Jauq Jiaj uaq vaang am-mon myenb uaq.

1.18: mavg maa'b! yia ib Nxi pun meib Navq nxm wrnq haig Eei zivb, Navq nxm Lia'g Dyrub, Navq tovb si'q laatg, weig vcvg Jyenq uaq nxm teib puv Revg, se yu-Daa Eei huvb Zauj zruj Lo Eei myenb, sai myenb, lyemb teib puv Eei pc'g fivj.
1.3: ninb yaag tu'q zipq txij yu-Daa Eei huvb, yo-si-yaa, Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim kunq Eei zyavb hog Tauj yu-Daa Eei huvb, yo-si-yaa Eei txn, sej-De-Ki-yaa, zruj huvb zyepg yetq uaq Havj Jomg Tauj Mmd Laaj, ye-lu-saa-lem myenb zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei zyavb hog.
1.8: meib maiq tuvq kamb Riaj ninb Bua, weig zu'g yia Zauj meib yem, xij Fruj meib.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
1.19: ninb Bua zyrug xij Zauj meib Bx'q Jaaj mq paag maiq hivb meib, weig zu'g yia Zauj meib yem, xij Fruj meib.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
1.9: zyruq zyrug suv ninb Eei puad Lua yia Eei Rwib. zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “yia zx'q yia Eei waag an meib Eei Rwib.
1.7: mq paag zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “meib maiq tuvq kxvq, ‘yia Havb Jeiq lunj,’ weig zu'g yia Paaiq meib mivb lxd haiq taub, meib xij zu'g mivb a'q. yia hatg meib kxvq haiq Euvg, meib zuvq xij zu'g kxvq a'q.
1.5: “yia maiq kcvb zeij meib taaib yem maa Eei ka'sia uaq zang, yia hiuq tu'q meib. meib maiq kcvb Zwrtq seij, yia yaag kinq zyavj meib. yia Paaiq meib trug waag pun maang kua'q myenb.”
1.16: yia xij kxvq Zwrtq waag tivg yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei zwid laaij ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq x'q sig kwavg yia. weig zu'g ninb Bua puaq huv pun Eiag Eei zyenb, yaag kweig Fiag paaij ninb Bua kanb Eei puad zruj taaib Eei miub favj.
1.17: “ mq paag ye-le-mi aag, meib xij zu'g Jiad taaib Beng zyavj kxvq Revg yia Paaiq meib kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag. maiq tuvq laaij ninb Bua kamb Riaj. maiq zei c'q, Raub heij yia pun meib yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen kamb Riaj.
1.14: zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “maaib Zyruq Eei ze'g naang xij yem pa'q puv Zwrtq taaib Tauj naaiq nxm teib puv Eei yetg zuvq pc'g fivj.”
1.4: yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
1.2: yem yu-Daa Eei huvb, aa-mon Eei txn, yo-si-yaa, zruj huvb zyepg faam Havj uaq Havj, ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag.
1.6: yia kxvq, “zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! yia maiq hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx kxvq weig zu'g yia se Havb Jeiq lunj Eei.”
1.13: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag ta'Eeig Rung kxvq, “meib mavg pwatg haiq Euvg?” yia kxvq, “yia pwatg maaib nxm Zcv Bweij Jyenq yem pa'q puv Win taaib.”
1.12: zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “meib pwatg tu'q hxpg Eei, weig zu'g yia mavg Jyenq yia Eei waag, xij pun yia Eei waag Zwrtq taaib zyen.
1.15: zyruq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij heug pa'q puv kua'q Eei maang fivj. “ninb Bua zyrug taaib. fivb fivj xij lyepg ninb Bua Eei huvb weig yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zivb kcvb Daavg. ninb Bua zyrug weib kxmj zivb laatg Bx'q cvj Bx'q yu-Daa Eei nxmb nxm zivb.
1.11: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq, “ye-le-mi aa'b! meib mavg pwatg haiq Euvg?” yia kxvq, “yia pwatg tiub an-man Dyavj Eei pyaaq.”
1.1: naaiq se ye-le-mi Eei waag. ye-le-mi se Ben-yaa-min teig, aa-naa-Totq muvq Eei yetg taub sai myenb, hin-Ki-yaa, Eei txn.
1.10: mavg maa'b! ib Nxi yia xn meib maaib livg kunq maang fivj maang kua'q, haib pcv Zwrtq, haib paaig waaig, haib myetg, haib Byenq, haib lyepg Jiad, haib Zeij Jiad taaib.”

39.18: weig zu'g yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij Fruj meib. meib yaag maiq zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, mq paag meib xij tu'q mcvg zyavb penj Bx'q Jaaj tu'q taaib Eei zivb Eeig weig zu'g meib syenj Kauj yia.” zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.’+”
39.3: ye-lu-saa-lem zu'g Bx'q paaig Eei zyavb hog, Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei zwavj Jyen pia'g mivb zweid Jyenq Bu'Dovj Eei kcvb. maaib ne-kan-saa-le-se, samj-kaa-ne-Bo, zruj Jyen Eei pyeiq uaq taub saanj-sej-Kim, zruj Lo Eei Jyen uaq taub ne-kan-saa-le-se, Zauj Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb zevg Fiag Eei yetg zuvq Jyen.
39.8: Ken-Dia myenb lovg trud puaq huvb ting yaag puaq pc'g fivj Eei pyauq, cvj Zc'q ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zivb laatg.
39.9: kruj huvb Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, ne-Bu-saa-laa-Daan, txb yem zivb zevg Fiag Eei myenb Zauj pyauj taaib pia'g ninb uaq teij, Zauj Zxg yem Jyenq uaq zevg Fiag Eei myenb.
39.7: ninb cvj zruj pun sej-De-Ki-yaa Eei mziv mcvb yaag Kauj Jyenq limg weig txb ninb mivb Baa-Bi-lon.
39.5: mq paag Ken-Dia Eei Junb pcv zung Jyenq ninb Bua mivb. zung Tauj ye-li-Ko Eei Daub pcvb zyrug zung zaaig sej-De-Ki-yaa a'q. ninb Bua zx'q tu'q ninb zyrug txb mivb Tauj haa-matq teig, lipq-laa zivb, Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa uaq. ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa zyrug tivg ninb Eei zwid.
39.16: “meib mivb kxvq Buaj e-Ti-o-pia myenb, e-Betg-me-lekq, ‘nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij yem naaiq nxm zivb ziuj yia lcvd Eei waag zruj zyavj Zyruq Eei sig, maiq zeid zruj lovj. Tauj uaq Nxi yem meib Eei Ra'Myen zruj zyavj.”
39.17: mq paag zyruq kxvq, “uaq Nxi yia xij Fruj meib, meib zyrug maiq zu'g Jiu pun yem meib kamb Riaj uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq.
39.14: Paaiq myenb mivb syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad txb ye-le-mi taaib zyrug Jiu pun saa-faan Eei fun, aa-hi-Kam Eei txn, ke-Daa-li-yaa, txb mivb ninb Eei pyauq. Navq naaig ye-le-mi tu'q yem pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj.
39.4: yu-Daa huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, Zauj yetg zuvq pcv pwatg ninb Bua zyrug luvb mwrnd zang kan huvb tiaj Eei Wivj Zauj i nxm laatg Bu'Dovj Eei kcvb pyauj, huvj Jyenq aa-laa-Baa mivb.
39.2: yem sej-De-Ki-yaa zruj huvb zyepg yetq uaq Havj, feij Laaj scvb Juaq, zivb laatg zu'g Bx'q Tov mig a'q.
39.6: yem lipq-laa, Baa-Bi-lon huvb, txv Jyenq sej-De-Ki-yaa Eei mziv taij ninb Eei txn Bua. Baa-Bi-lon huvb yaag taij Revg yu-Daa Eei yetg zuvq zruj Lo Eei myenb.
39.13: Navq naaig kruj huvb Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, ne-Bu-saa-laa-Daan, zruj Jyen Eei pyeiq uaq taub ne-Bu-satq-Baan, Zauj zruj Lo Eei Jyen, ne-kan-saa-le-se, Zauj Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb yetg zuvq zevg Fiag Eei Jyen,
39.12: “meib xij zu'g txb ninb mivb, kruj lovj ninb, maiq tuvq zruj haiq Euvg hxig. ninb kxvq haiq Euvg, kunq Tevj ninb zruj uaq Euvg.”
39.15: ye-le-mi Zxg zu'g wrnj Jyenq syruq kcv Eei pcv Eei laatg ka'Euad Eei zyavb hog, ninb tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
39.11: Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Paaiq waag kxvq Tauj ye-le-mi Buaj kruj huvb Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, ne-Bu-saa-laa-Daan, kxvq,
39.1: sej-De-Ki-yaa zruj yu-Daa Eei huvb ta'Juaq Havj zyepg Laaj uaq zang, Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Zauj ninb Eei zwavj Junb pcv taaib Bx'q yaag weib Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem.
39.10: kruj huvb Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, ne-Bu-saa-laa-Daan, pun teij maiq maaib haiq Euvg Eei myenb Jomg myenb lyrub Fiag yem yu-Daa teig. txij uaq teij zyavb hog ninb yaag zx'q a'vung Wivj Zauj livb teig Jiu pun ninb Bua.

47.3: haid maab kruq Eei teib Tiuj Eei Qiaj Bwi, Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Qaaub Qaau Eei, Ziab yenb Qomb Qom Eei Bwi. weig tia Eei puad pa'la'g mau haig, maiq haib Win Rwrnj kruj kanb Eei fu'Jweiq.
47.4: weig zu'g Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, xij myetg Revg fi-li-saa-tia Eei yetg zuvq myenb, Pai kwavg tovb haib Tevj Tai-la'q Zauj sai-Dxn taub taub zevg Fiag Eei myenb. weig zu'g zyruq xij myetg fi-li-saa-tia myenb, se yem Kapq-To Eei Kxib Len zevg Fiag Eei myenb.
47.2: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! uam yem pa'q puv faauj taaib, yaag xij penj uamb pe'q yemj. uam xij yemj Revg teib puv Zauj yem teib puv yetg zuvq ka'naaiq, lyemb zivb Zauj zivb ka'Euad Eei myenb. myenb xij heug Zwrtq, yem teib puv Eei mrud taub pc'g fivj yaag xij Eyemq.
47.6: zyruq Eei Ru'g Daauq aa'b! meib Tauj haiq zang Zivj taaib tivb? meib pia'g Paiq mivb maa'b! hitq Kwrnj yaag maiq tuvq tovd.
47.5: kaa-saa xij zu'g Lyruq Fav Eei, atg-Ke-lon zu'g myetg mig a'q. zevg Fiag Eei aa-naakq myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij lovg Ru'g kaatq sin Dovg haaij laub?
47.7: zyruq Paaiq zyavj meib, meib Navq haiq nx haib tivb? ninb Paaiq zyavj Ru'g Daauq mivb atg-Ke-lon Zauj Kxib Len Eei txvj Bx'q Jaaj.”
47.1: faa-lo maiq kcvb Bx'q kaa-saa uaq zang, trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, tu'q zipq zyruq Eei naaiq teij waag kxvq Tauj fi-li-saa-tia myenb.

10.18: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij zxi yem naaiq nxm teib puv Eei myenb Zwrtq mivb. yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Kruq weig pun ninb Bua kevb hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx.”
10.8: ninb Bua Vovj, maiq hiuq haiq Euvg. miub favj Faauj Eei Kuvj penj Dyavj Navq.
10.3: weig zu'g maang fivj Eei leib fivj se Jaaq Eei. ninb Bua yem lomg kxij tiub Dyavj. zavg myenb yaag lovg pruq zruj Zwrtq favj.
10.21: weig zu'g kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb Vovj haig, ninb Bua yaag maiq naaig zyruq. weig naaiq ninb Bua maiq tu'q lovj Jyenq faauj, ninb Bua Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb yetg zuvq yaag Raanj Revg.
10.14: taub taub paamb myenb se Vovj Eei, maiq maaib wrnb zaav. mrud taub Jyemb zavg weig ninb Bua zruj Eei miub favj zu'g Eaiq, weig zu'g ninb Eei miub favj se Jaaq Eei, maiq maaib yetg teij Qiaj Tauq.
10.23: zyruq aag, yia hiuq tu'q myenb Eei Jauq maiq zeid sweib ninb kanb. se maiq zeid yavb Jauq Eei myenb haib tivg ninb Eei zaub Biag.
10.6: o zyruq aag, maiq maaib haiq taub Dovg meib. meib za'kevb zruj Lo, meib Eei mevb maaib Qa'q Lo haig.
10.2: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “maiq tuvq zwrtg kanb kua'q myenb Eei Jauq, fai kamb Riaj yem luvb Zwrtq Eei Javb hog maiq kunq uaq teij kua'q Eei myenb kamb Riaj.
10.20: yia Eei Dopg liub paaig waaig mig a'q. yia Eei yetg zuvq Laav tavj Revg. yia Eei fu'Jweiq leib Gxi yia mivb, maiq maaib ninb Bua a'q. maiq maaib haiq taub cvj Zxv yia Eei Dopg liub, cvj laavg yia Eei Bc'g kcvb Dia.
10.24: zyruq aag, Toq zxg yia txvg Eei txvj ziuj hxpg zu'g zruj Eei. maiq zeid Qiaj Jiad Jyenq zruj, Riaj meib pun yia zutg mig a'q.
10.7: maang kua'q Eei huvb aa'b! maaib haiq taub maiq xij Taaib meib? weig zu'g meib Pwij tu'q myenb Taaib. yem zwavj kua'q Eei zwavj Zovb mevb myenb Zauj huvb tiaj Bu'Dovj, maiq maaib haiq taub Navq meib.
10.19: yia Kruq a'q, weig yia zu'g mun. yia zu'g mun tu'q syav haig. mq paag yia kxvq, “zyen Eei, naaiq yia zu'g Hruq Raub Kruq, yia yaag xij zu'g tiaq Jyenq.”
10.17: meib Bua zu'g weib Jyenq Eei myenb aa'b! syru meib Bua an Jyenq Dau Eei ka'naaiq,
10.11: “meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘maiq zeid zeij luvb zeij Dau Eei zyenb, zuvq xij zu'g yem Daub peib, yem luvb Diaq, zu'g myetg Revg.’+”
10.5: ninb Bua Eei miub favj Navq maab Eyenb an kwaab uam Deig, maiq haib kxvq waag. ninb Bua maiq haib yavb Jauq zyrug xij zu'g kcv Jyenq mivb. maiq tuvq kamb Riaj ninb Bua weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg hxig, yaag maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg lovj.”
10.9: Eaanb taaq taaib penj yetg Kwaaiq yetg Kwaaiq yem Taan-sitq txb taaib, yaag maaib yem u-faatq taaib Eei Jyem. penj zavg myenb zruj Eei kov Zauj Jyemb zavg Eei puab taub zruj taaib Eei. miub favj Eei lwi setq lua'g Zauj setq Buaq, yetg zuvq se zavg myenb Eei puab taub zruj.
10.16: yaa-Kopq Eei pwrng maiq Navq naaiq teij, weig zu'g ninb se zeij maang mwrtg uaq taub, i-saa-laa-en se ninb Ripg taaib Eei fivj. ninb Eei Buaj heug nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq.
10.4: ninb Bua lovg Jyem lovg Eaanb zxv Jyenq cvj lovg tiv Zauj zweib tiv Jyenq, weig pun maiq haib tovd.
10.10: mq paag zyruq se zyen Tinb huvb, se zyavb Jyenq Eei Tinb huvb, yetg liud yem Eei huvb. ninb yetq nrud, Dau zyrug tovd Revg. ninb Qiaj Jiad, maang kua'q tiaq maiq hivb.
10.22: mwavj maa'b! naaig penj waab Ryaauj. mavg maa'b! taaib Tauj a'q. maaib lung Eei Qiaj Bwi yem pa'q puv Zwrtq taaib weig pun yu-Daa Eei zivb zu'g paaig Waav, penj Yiab Juq yem Eei txvj.
10.12: se Tinb huvb lovg ninb Eei Qa'q zeij Dau, lovg ninb Eei Zovb mevb lyepg paamb ken, lovg ninb mevb pc'g Eei Jauq Zxv luvb.
10.15: naaiq teij miub favj maiq maaib Jaab zinb, zruj taaib penj Duaq myenb Eei ka'naaiq Navq. Tauj ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zyrug zu'g myetg.
10.13: ninb yetq Zwrtq Qiaj, yem uaq luvb maaib uam Eei Qiaj Bwi zob zod Eei. ninb pun mrug yem luvb kxn faauj. ninb pun Ba'livg kan Byuvg, yaag pun Ryaauj yem ninb syru Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib.
10.1: i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! mwavj kaaj zyruq kxvq Buaj meib Bua Eei waag.
10.25: Toq pun meib Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Fiag maiq hiuq tu'q meib uaq teij kua'q Eei myenb, yaag Fiag maiq heug meib Eei Buaj Eei fivb fivj. weig zu'g ninb Bua na'q yaa-Kopq. maiq taan na'q Revg, myetg Revg, ninb Bua zuvq paaig Waav ninb yem Eei txvj.

25.18: maaib ye-lu-saa-lem Zauj yu-Daa Eei zivb, lyemb uaq teij zivb Eei huvb Zauj Jyen, zyrug zruj pun naaiq teij zivb penj paaig Waav kwavg Waav Eei txvj, zu'g Wrtq yaag zu'g zyruj Navq ib Jaaj Nxi.
25.8: weig naaiq nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “laaij meib Bua maiq mwavj yia Eei waag,
25.33: Tauj uaq Nxi yem naaiq puv luvb kxn Tauj uaq puv luvb kxn maaib zu'g zyruq taij Eei myenb. maiq maaib haiq taub Eyemq ninb Bua, fai syru fai pyopq ninb Bua. ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq Daub peib Navq Gaiq nx.
25.3: ninb kxvq, “yem yu-Daa Eei huvb, aa-mon Eei txn, yo-si-yaa, zruj huvb zyepg faam Havj uaq Havj Tauj ib Nxi penj Eig zyepg faam Havj, yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag yaag zanb zang Buaj meib Bua, mq paag meib Bua maiq mwavj.
25.32: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! maaib Zyruq Eei ze'g naang xij yem naaiq nxm kua'q Jiaj uaq nxm kua'q. yem luvb Diaq ko Jiaj Eei txvj yaag maaib tomb Ryaauj Jiad kxn pwrng taaib.”
25.21: maaib e-Dom myenb, mo-apg myenb Zauj am-mon Eei zeib fun.
25.35: kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb maiq maaib Jauq pyauj, pa'ki yuvb kwanb Eei zyruq yaag maiq maaib Jauq pyauj.
25.14: weig zu'g maaib ziaj kua'q myenb Zauj tomb huvb tiaj xij pun lyemb naaiq fivj myenb zruj nrub. yia yaag xij ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei sig Zauj ninb Bua Eei puad zruj Eei kov winb pun ninb Bua.”
25.23: maaib De-Daan, Te-maa, Butg Zauj yetg zuvq Japq Ba'pyei pcvb Eei Wiv kxmj mGxvq Eei myenb.
25.6: maiq tuvq mivb kan Eiag Eei zyenb weig fub suj, paaij, fai lovg meib Bua Eei puad zruj Eei kov Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad. Navq naaig yia zyrug maiq hxig meib Bua.’+”
25.34: kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb aa'b! meib Bua xij zu'g Eyemq yaag heug Zwrtq. pa'ki yuvb kwanb Eei zyruq xij zu'g Favj saaiq ka'Euad, weig zu'g meib Bua zu'g taij, zu'g pun Raanj Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj. meib Bua zyrug Navq pa'ki yuvb kruq Rweig Eei Kiv Fiag.
25.2: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, zx'q naaiq teij waag Buaj yu-Daa Eei zwavj myenb Zauj yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj pc'g fivj.
25.36: mwavj maa'b! maaib kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb heug, yaag maaib pa'ki yuvb kwanb Eei zyruq Eyemq Qiaj Bwi Eei, weig zu'g zyruq zruj waaig ninb Bua Eei miab Zyavq.
25.20: yaag maaib yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Eei kanb fivj myenb, Zauj utg teig Eei yetg zuvq huvb tiaj, Zauj fi-li-saa-tia teig Eei zwavj huvb tiaj, se yem atg-Ke-lon, kaa-saa, e-Ko-lon Zauj atg-Dotg zevg Fiag Eei myenb.
25.24: maaib aa-laa-Bia Eei zwavj huvb Zauj zxpg Jyenq yem teib puvb Waav fivb fivj myenb Eei zwavj huvb.
25.28: sij kxvq ninb Bua maiq Kavq zipq yem meib Eei puad naaiq nxm zaanq taaib hopq, meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua zuvq xij zu'g hopq,
25.7: zyruq kxvq, “mq paag meib Bua maiq mwavj yia. meib Bua lovg meib Bua Eei puad zruj Eei kov Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad, yaag hxig meib Bua kanb.”
25.29: weig zu'g mavg maa'b! yia yem tovb kan yia Eei Buaj heug Eei zivb Jiad kxn pun Zyruq Eei ze'g naang Zwrtq. meib Bua haib pyauj tu'q Dutq, maiq zu'g tivg zwid fai? meib Bua zuvq pyauj maiq Dutq, weig zu'g yia Paaiq pun Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig Zwrtq yem luvb Diaq yetg zuvq myenb maanb Bu'Dovj.’ nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
25.19: cvj maaib i-yipq Eei faa-lo huvb Zauj ninb Eei pru, ninb Eei Jyen, Zauj ninb Eei zwavj pc'g fivj,
25.17: yia zyrug zipq yem ninb Eei puad taaib Eei zaanq, cvj aapq tovb zyruq Paaiq yia mivb Eei maang kua'q myenb hopq.
25.38: ninb Navq syenb leib Gxi ninb Eei Kwrtq, weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei teib puv zu'g paaig Revg, laaij zeij myenb uaq taub Eei Ru'g Daauq yaag laaij zyruq nrud, Qiaj Jiad haig.
25.31: Qiaj Bwi zyrug cvq mivb Tauj Jomg luvb Diaq, weig zu'g zyruq xij koj maang kua'q. ta'faanb maaib xq sin Eei, ninb xij syemq. zruj x'q Eei myenb, ninb xij pun zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.’ naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.”
25.30: ye-le-mi aa'b! weig naaiq meib xij zu'g trug naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag kxvq ninb Bua. xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq xij yem Lav Eei txvj heug, yaag yem ninb Eei Zivb Revg txvj Zwrtq Qiaj, heug Bwi Eei kxvq ninb Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb, Navq myenb heug Jyenq Qiaj Lo Eei Eweib a'vung pyruq nx, kxvq yetg zuvq luvb Diaq myenb.
25.27: “meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq,  i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘xij zu'g hopq Gwin mivb cvj loq yaag Kiv Fiag Dau, maiq haib cvj Jiad sin, laaij yia pun yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj zu'g Bx'q Jaaj.’
25.11: naaiq nxm teib puv yetg zuvq zyrug penj paaig waaig paaig Waav Eei txvj. naaiq teij kua'q Eei myenb xij zu'g fub suj Baa-Bi-lon huvb Zyetq zyepg Havj.
25.5: kxvq, ‘meib Bua kx'g myenb xij zu'g kwavg Gxi kanb zruj x'q Eei Jauq Zauj zruj Eei waaig sig. meib Bua zyrug tu'q yem Jyenq zyruq lob Nxi Jiu pun meib Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv Tauj yetg liud.
25.9: yia zyrug heug pa'q puv Eei zwavj fivj Zauj yia Eei pru, Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, taaib Bx'q naaiq nxm teib puv Zauj yem teib puv Eei pc'g fivj Zauj weib kxmj yetg zuvq kua'q Eei myenb. yia xij myetg ninb Bua zutg Revg, pun penj kamb Riaj Eei ka'naaiq, zu'g myenb Wrtq yaag yetg liud kwavg Waav.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
25.16: ninb Bua hopq liud zyrug luvb luvb laib laib Eei yaag maiq Rav, laaij yia pun zu'g Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jauq yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj.”
25.37: pcvb xn sekq Ria'g Eei pa'ki yuvb laanb zu'g paaig waaig laaij zyruq Qiaj Jiad! nrud haig.
25.4: “meib Bua maiq mwavj yaag maiq pcv mnxmb mwavj, maiq kunq zyruq maiq tivb lyrub Eei Paaiq ninb Eei pru, se zwavj trug waag myenb, taaib lxd meib Bua,
25.10: maiq taan Bua'g naaiq, yia xij zx'q Gxi yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Fyenb yrub, xnb lx'g Eei Qiaj, syavb laavb syavb Bwavd Eei Qiaj, Zauj mxg Eei Qiaj, Zauj tav Eei Fav.
25.22: maaib Tai-la'q Eei zwavj huvb Zauj sai-Dxn Eei zwavj huvb Zauj uaq vaang zi'g Kxib Len Eei huvb.
25.12: “Jiaj liud Zyetq zyepg Havj, yia xij tivg Baa-Bi-lon huvb Zauj uaq nxm kua'q Eei myenb, se Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv Eei zwid, laaij ninb Bua Eei x'q sig pun teib puv yetg liud zu'g kwavg Waav.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
25.15: zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj yia, “zx'q yem yia Eei puad Eei zaanq, se tapq pwavq nrud myenb Eei a'vung tiuq Eei zaanq, pun yia Paaiq meib mivb Tauj Eei maang kua'q myenb hopq.
25.13: “yia xij pun uaq nxm teib puv zu'g ziuj yia kxvq Jiaj xij pun zu'g Eei sig, se fiaq Jyenq naaiq pwrnq sru Eei yetg zuvq waag, tovb ye-le-mi trug waag kxvq naaiq teij maang kua'q.
25.1: yu-Daa Eei huvb, yo-si-yaa Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, zruj huvb ta'feij Havj, se Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, tu'q zruj huvb taaub Havj, ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq   Eei waag kxvq Tauj yu-Daa Eei yetg zuvq myenb.
25.26: maaib pa'q puv Eei zwavj huvb maiq kunq ko fai fatq, yetg laanb Jiaj yetg laanb, Tauj kxmj Revg luvb Diaq Daub peib Eei maang kua'q. hopq liud, Ga'haaq Baa-Bi-lon huvb xij zu'g hopq.
25.25: maaib simj-li Eei zwavj huvb, e-laam Eei zwavj huvb Zauj mi-Dia Eei zwavj huvb.

22.18: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq yu-Daa Eei huvb, yo-si-yaa Eei txn, ye-ho-yaa-Kim, “ninb Bua zyrug maiq weig ninb Eyemq Jyenq kxvq ‘yia Eei kxj aa'b! Kruq a'q. yia Eei txg aa'b! Kruq a'q.’ ninb Bua yaag maiq weig ninb Eyemq Jyenq kxvq, ‘zyruq aa'b! Kruq a'q. huvb tiaj Eei Favb laavg Kruq a'q.’
22.8: “Zamb nxm kua'q Eei myenb xij Jiaj naaiq nxm zivb, kx'g myenb laanb naaig laanb, ‘zyruq weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq zruj pun naaiq nxm tomb zivb?’
22.3: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “xij zu'g zruj pcvb fim, zruj tu'q hxpg, yaag Fruj zu'g luq Eei myenb pyauj Dutq zeij ninb uaq teij Eei puab Diaq. maiq tuvq zruj txvg fai zruj to'g kanb fivj myenb fai kub hanb fu'Jweiq fai aub kwaaq. yem naaiq nxm txvj yaag maiq tuvq taij maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb.
22.21: meib Kub yem Eei zyavb hog, yia Zauj meib kxvq, mq paag meib kxvq, “yia maiq mwavj.” yem meib lunj Eei zyavb hog, meib mtaaib Navq naaig, meib maiq mwavj yia Eei waag.
22.14: ninb kxvq, ‘yia xij weig kanb komq nxm tomb pyauq, kub vwaaig Eei Qovj zruj Javq.’ ninb zyrug zruj fov mwrnb yem naaiq teij Qovj, cvj lovg sij-Daa zovb Dyavj nctq Jyenq uaq Fovg, lovg si'q Eei setq Raatq Jyenq.
22.23: yem ‘le-Baa-nxn’ Eei myenb aa'b! tovb yem sij-Daa zovb Dyavj Bu'Dovj zruj laud. meib zu'g mun Eei zyavb hog meib xij zu'g Dovg haaij Funb, Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad nx.”
22.6: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj yu-Daa huvb Eei ting, “meib weig yia Navq ki-le-aatg yaag Navq le-Baa-nxn Eei Bovb nivq. maiq kunq Navq naaig, yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij pun meib penj teib puvb Waav. penj maiq maaib myenb yem Eei zivb.
22.2: xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zweid Daa-witq Eei weig Eei yu-Daa huvb aa'b! meib Zauj meib Eei Jyen Zauj pia'g naaiq teij zivb kcvb Eei pc'g fivj mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
22.20: “faauj le-Baa-nxn mivb yaag heug Zwrtq, yem Baa-saan heug Zwrtq meib Eei Qiaj. yem aa-Baa-lim heug weig zu'g Namq meib uaq teij yetg zuvq zu'g myetg mig a'q.
22.24: zyruq kxvq, “yu-Daa Eei huvb, ye-ho-yaa-Kim Eei txn, Ko-ni-yaa aa'b!  yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, maiq kunq meib yem yia Byaaug Jia'q puad zruj yia Eei puab Do'g Rcv yenj, yia Zxg xij Lutq Zwrtq mivb.
22.28: naaiq taub Ko-ni-yaa se Navq nxm mavg Piaj, huq Eei niab mx, tovb maiq maaib haiq taub xij Eei ka'naaiq fai? ninb Zauj ninb Eei naamb Erud weig haiq tiug zu'g fevj, zu'g zxi pia'g tovb ninb Bua maiq hiuq Eei teib puv?
22.7: yia xij liug leid zruj myetg Eei myenb taaib Bx'q meib, kx'g myenb yaag maaib kx'g myenb Eei ua'g king. ninb Bua xij kxij meib lovj Jiaj Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj zxi pia'g trud ka'Euad.
22.29: Dau aa'b! Dau aa'b! Dau! mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
22.19: ninb zuvq zu'g pyopq Navq pyopq taub lxb nx, se zu'g Tx mivb zxi kwavg ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zivb kcvb ka'Eiag.”
22.17: “mq paag meib Eei mziv, meib Eei Hruq weig trub kanb xij tu'q maiq zivj Eei leig zinb, weig taij maiq zruj txvg Eei myenb, pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq, yaag zeij myenb, zruj to'g myenb.”
22.30: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “xij zu'g fiaq Jyenq kxvq naaiq laanb myenb maiq maaib fu'Jweiq. yem ninb zyavb Eei Nxib Eia'g ninb zruj maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg, weig zu'g maiq maaib yetg taub ninb Eei zeib fun tu'q zweid Daa-witq Eei weig cvj kunq yu-Daa.”
22.27: mq paag ninb Bua Dovg haaij Namq Jyenq xij Rwrnj Eei teib puv ninb Bua maiq tu'q Rwrnj.”
22.11: weig zu'g zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj yu-Daa huvb, yo-si-yaa Eei txn, san-lum, tovb tiq ninb Eei tia, yo-si-yaa, zruj huvb, yaag leib naaiq nxm txvj, “ninb maiq tu'q cvj Rwrnj naaiq nxm txvj.
22.5: zyruq kxvq, ‘mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua maiq mwavj naaiq teij waag, yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb hruq waag kxvq naaiq nxm huvb ting zuvq zu'g penj paaig Waav Eei txvj.’+”
22.9: ninb Bua zyrug tau, ‘laaij ninb Bua kwavg zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei vcvg waag, fub suj, paaij Eiag Eei zyenb.’+”
22.16: ninb Tevj myenb Jomg myenb Zauj tavb tonj myenb Beng sig, ninb kanb zyrug tu'q Kub yem. naaiq pun Ziv ninb hiuq tu'q yia maiq zeid?”   zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq.
22.4: sij kxvq meib Bua zyenb zyen mwavj naaiq teij waag, zyrug maaib zweid Daa-witq Eei weig Eei huvb tiaj zweid Jyenq maab Zia, keb Jyenq maad, se ninb Bua kanb Zauj ninb Bua Eei Jyen Zauj ninb Bua Eei pc'g fivj, pia'g naaiq nxm huvb ting Eei kcvb.
22.10: maiq tuvq weig taig mivb Eei myenb Eyemq, maiq tuvq weig ninb Hruq mun, mq paag xij zu'g weig zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb Eyemq Kruq, weig zu'g ninb maiq tu'q cvj Rwrnj taaib pwatg ninb kanb Eei pwrnb teib puv
22.22: meib Eei yetg zuvq pyeiq zeiq xij zu'g kwaatq mivb Namq meib Eei myenb yaag zu'g kwaatq, meib zyrug paaig Myen, zu'g Eaiq, laaij meib zruj Eei yetg zuvq x'q sig.
22.12: ninb xij zu'g yem ninb Bua kwaatq ninb mivb Eei txvj taig, maiq tu'q cvj pwatg naaiq nxm teib puv.”
22.15: “meib Namq taaib meib tu'q zruj huvb weig zu'g peiq kanb taub meib lovg sij-Daa zovb Dyavj zruj pyauq kaub lovj? meib Eei tia maiq zeid Eang yaag hopq, zruj tu'q hxpg, pcvb fim Eei fai? uaq zang ninb yaag tu'q Kub yem.
22.13: “zruj maiq zivj Eei Jauq komq ninb Eei ting, yaag zruj maiq pcvb fim Eei sig zruj kub vwaaig Eei Qovj, uaq taub zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb pc'g pc'g lovg ninb Eei Jwavg laavd myenb Tevj ninb zruj kov yaag maiq pun kovb zinb ninb Bua.
22.1: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “Fiag mivb Tauj yu-Daa huvb Eei ting yem uaq kxvq naaiq teij waag.
22.26: yia xij zx'q meib Zauj yuvd meib taaib uaq taub maa fevj mivb Tauj kanb nxm kua'q, tovb maiq zeid meib Bua Zwrtq seij Eei txvj. meib Bua zyrug xij zu'g yem uaq taig.
22.25: yia xij zx'q meib Jiu pun lxd meib Eei mcvg Eei myenb, Jiu pun tovb meib kamb Riaj Eei myenb, se Jiu pun yem Baa-Bi-lon huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa Eei puab Diaq Zauj Ken-Dia myenb Eei puab Diaq.

42.18: weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia Navq haiq nx nrud haig, ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj, meib Bua mivb i-yipq teib puv Eei zyavb hog, yia Eei ka'Qiaj yaag xij Navq uaq nx pctq Zwrtq pun meib Bua. meib Bua zyrug zu'g myenb yruj, penj kamb Riaj Eei ka'naaiq, penj zyruj Eei waag, yaag zu'g myenb Wrtq. meib Bua maiq tu'q cvj pwatg naaiq nxm txvj.’
42.8: ninb zyrug heug Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, Zauj Junb pcv Eei zwavj pcvb pyeiq Zauj yetg zuvq pc'g fivj yem zruj faij Jiaj Tauj zruj Lo Jiaj.
42.3: Toq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, pun yia Bua hiuq tu'q yia Bua hxpg zu'g yavb Eei Jauq, yia Bua yaag xij zu'g zruj haiq Euvg.”
42.21: ib Nxi yia zx'q naaiq teij waag Buaj meib Bua, se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Paaiq yia taaib Buaj meib Bua Eei waag, mq paag meib Bua maiq mwavj.
42.14: cvj kxvq, ‘yia Bua maiq yem a'q. yia Bua xij mivb i-yipq teib puv. yem uaq maiq pwatg Bx'q Jaaj Eei sig, maiq haid Jxv Eei Qiaj, yaag maiq vxg Naavj. yia Bua zyrug yem uaq.’
42.6: maiq kunq lovj fai Zyruq, yia Bua xij mwavj zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei waag, tovb yia Bua heug meib lxd uaq taub. yia Bua mwavj zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei waag yia Bua zyrug haib tu'q lovj.”
42.2: yaag kxvq Buaj trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, “Toq mwavj yia Bua Jrub Eei waag, yaag Toq Tevj yia Bua tauj kauj Jrub zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, se weig yia Bua yetg zuvq zevg Fiag Eei myenb. zinb Daavg yia Bua Zamq mq paag ib zang zo'g Navq meib Eei mziv pwatg Jyenq Eei nx.
42.20: meib Bua mivb txvg Jauq zyrug zu'g kwavg mcvg a'q, weig zu'g meib Bua Toq yia mivb lxd zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq, ‘Toq weig yia Bua tauj kauj Jrub zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb. zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb kxvq haiq Euvg Toq Buaj yia Bua, yia Bua zyrug ei Jyenq zruj a'q.’
42.7: Jiaj liud zyepg Nxi, ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag.
42.19: “zevg Fiag Eei yu-Daa myenb aa'b! zyruq kxvq Buaj meib Bua, ‘maiq tuvq mivb i-yipq teib puv.’ meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq tivg, ib Nxi yia tonq Jyenq meib Bua kxvq,
42.17: ta'faanb tivg Hruq mivb yem i-yipq Eei myenb zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg taig. ninb Bua maiq zevg yetg laanb haib pyauj tu'q Dutq. yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang.’
42.11: maiq tuvq kamb Riaj Baa-Bi-lon huvb, tovb meib Bua kamb Riaj uaq taub.’ weig zu'g zyruq kxvq, ‘maiq tuvq kamb Riaj ninb weig zu'g yia Zauj meib Bua yem, xij Fruj meib Bua, pun meib Bua pyauj Dutq ninb Eei puab Diaq.
42.5: ninb Bua kxvq Buaj ye-le-mi, “sij kxvq yia Bua maiq ei zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, Paaiq meib Eei yetg zuvq waag zruj, Toq zyruq zruj zyen Eei, zyepg zua'q Eei zxvb zevj zyrug Zauj yia Bua txib tekg.
42.9: ninb kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, tovb meib Bua Paaiq yia mivb lxd weig txb meib Bua Jrub Eei waag, Navq naaiq kxvq,
42.16: tovb meib Bua kamb Riaj Eei Ru'g Daauq xij yem i-yipq zung zaaig meib Bua. meib Bua kamb Riaj vxg Naavj Eei Jauq, mq paag vxg Naavj Eei Jauq xij kan Jyenq meib Bua mivb i-yipq. meib Bua zyrug yem uaq taig.
42.4: trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “yia mwavj haid meib Bua mig a'q. ziuj meib Bua Jrub Eei waag yia xij tauj kauj Toq zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb. zyruq Navq haiq nx tau, yia zuvq Buaj meib Bua. yia maiq pivj yetg Euvg meib Bua.”
42.10: ‘sij kxvq meib Bua yem Jyenq naaiq nxm teib puv, yia zyrug Zeij Jiad meib Bua, maiq zeid Zc'q meib Bua Fiag. yia zwavj meib Bua, yaag maiq pcv meib Bua Zwrtq, weig zu'g yia kxiq Hruq maiq pun meib Bua zu'g Zyruq Eei ze'g naang Navq zu'g Jiaj nx.
42.22: ib zang meib Bua xij zu'g hiuq tivg, meib Bua xij mivb yem Eei txvj meib Bua xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg taig.”
42.12: yia xij Kxb lyenb meib Bua, weig pun ninb Kxb lyenb meib Bua yaag pun meib Bua Rwrnj meib Bua kanb Eei teib puv.’
42.15: o meib Bua zevg Fiag Eei yu-Daa myenb aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag. nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq,  i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘sij kxvq meib Bua tivg Hruq pia'g i-yipq teib puv yem,
42.13: “mq paag sij kxvq meib Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua maiq yem naaiq nxm teib puv a'q,’ zyrug maiq mwavj zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei waag,
42.1: Junb pcv Eei zwavj pcvb pyeiq Zauj Kaa-le-aa Eei txn, yo-haa-nan, Zauj ho-saa-yaa Eei txn, aa-saa-li-yaa, Zauj Jyenq yetg zuvq pc'g fivj yem zruj faij Jiaj Tauj zruj Lo Jiaj Eei myenb, pia'g taaib fatq,

15.18: yia weig haiq tiug maiq tivb lyrub Eei mun Jyenq yem? yia zu'g syav Eei txvj weig haiq tiug zxg maiq haib lovj? meib weig yia xij Navq maiq maaib uam lyrug Eei Do'q, yaag Navq Gaai mivb Eei uamb zivq fai?
15.3: “zyruq kxvq, ‘yia xij pun pyei Euvg hxig ninb Bua zu'g myetg. maaib Ru'g Daauq taij, maaib Juq petq, maaib Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Zauj Daub peib Eei Yiab zxib taaib Eang zruj myetg.
15.8: yia pun ninb Bua Eei aub kwaaq kaub Zamq Kxiq Eei saab zyru. luvb aanj zang zruj myetg Eei myenb taaib hxig myenb lunj myenb Eei maa. yia pun ninb Bua lyemb zeib zu'g Kruq, zu'g hc'q kamb Riaj.
15.19: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “sij kxvq meib Rwrnj taaib, yia pun meib tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx, meib yaag tu'q sruq yia Eei Ra'Myen. sij kxvq meib kxvq Jaaij Eei waag, maiq kxvq maiq lamb lovg Eei waag meib zyrug txvj yia Eei Rwib. ninb Bua zyrug Win taaib lxd meib, mq paag meib maiq tuvq Win mivb lxd ninb Bua.
15.9: yuvd Jiaj siag taub fu'Jweiq Eei msia'q txn Eei Qa'q mau Jyenq Fiag, zuvq meib mig a'q. ninb Eei luvb Nxi zang Tiuq Mwavj mivb, ninb zu'g Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen. zevg Fiag Eei myenb yia pun yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Eei Ra'Myen zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
15.7: yia xij yem teib puv Eei nxmb nxm zivb, zruj pun yia Eei pc'g fivj Navq lovg ka'naaib Zenq Zenq Byaub nx. yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g kwavg fu'Jweiq, pun yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g myetg, laaij ninb Bua maiq kwavg ninb Bua Eei Jauq.
15.5: “ye-lu-saa-lem aa'b! haiq taub xij Kxb lyenb meib? haiq taub xij weig meib Raub? haiq taub xij Win mivb naaig, ‘meib lovj Eei fai?’+”
15.16: zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb aag, yia tu'q meib Eei waag se txvj yia Eei Eang hopq. meib Eei waag pun yia Fyenb yrub yaag pun yia Hruq a'Neiq, weig zu'g yia se kan meib Eei Buaj heug Eei myenb.
15.20: yia zyrug pun meib weig naaiq teij pc'g fivj penj wrnq Eei tovb si'q laatg. ninb Bua xij Zauj meib Bx'q Jaaj mq paag Bx'q maiq hivb meib, weig zu'g yia Zauj meib yem, xij Fruj meib, Tevj meib pyauj Dutq.” naaiq se zyruq Eei waag.
15.17: yia maiq zweid naug Eitg Eei myenb Bu'Dovj, yia kanb yaag maiq zruj Fyenb yrub. yia kanb Du'g taub zweid Navq, weig zu'g meib hatg Jyenq yia, yaag weig meib pun yia Qiaj Jiad! haig.
15.14: yia xij pun meib yem meib maiq hiuq Eei teib puv fub suj meib Eei winb wavq, weig zu'g yia Qiaj Jiad Navq Fopg trud nx. trud yetg liud zia'g Jyenq maiq taig.”
15.4: yia xij pun luvb Diaq maang kua'q myenb pwatg naaiq teij pc'g fivj, zyrug hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig, laaij yu-Daa Eei huvb, he-se-Ki-yaa, Eei txn, maa-natq-sej, yem ye-lu-saa-lem zruj Eei sig.
15.21: “yia xij Fruj meib pyauj Dutq x'q myenb Eei puab Diaq, yaag zua'g meib Zwrtq myenb to'g myenb Eei puad.”
15.2: ninb Bua haiq zang naaig meib, ‘yia Bua xij zu'g mivb haaij?’ meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘pun mcvg taaij zu'g wrnb pcvg, zyrug zu'g wrnb pcvg, pun mcvg taaij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, pun mcvg taaij zu'g vxg Naavj, zyrug zu'g vxg Naavj, pun mcvg taaij zu'g kwaatq mivb, zyrug zu'g kwaatq mivb a'q.
15.6: zyruq kxvq, “meib Gemb yia, meib Kuvj zanb zang Twij prug Navq. yia zyrug suv puad Bx'q meib, pun meib zu'g myetg. yia Eaavg kau, yruj Revg mig a'q.
15.13: laaij yem kxmj meib Eei teig ka'Euad nxmb nxm txvj, paamd Eei yetg zuvq zwid, yia xij zx'q meib Eei zinb zxib Zauj Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq pun winb wavq pc'g pc'g luq mivb.
15.12: “myenb haib wrtq Lia'q nauq, se pa'q puv taaib Eei Lia'q Zauj tovb si'q fai?
15.15: zyruq aag, meib hiuq Eei. Toq Javj yia, taaib mavg yia, yaag Tevj yia Jaauq win hxig yia uaq teij winb wavq. weig meib Eei Hruq haib Eyend tu'q, Toq maiq tuvq txb yia mivb. Toq meib Namq Tauj yia weig meib tiaq myenb Gemb.
15.11: zyruq aag, sij kxvq yia maiq Tevj meib Toq pun ninb Bua tu'q lovj, yaag sij kxvq txij zu'g sig, zu'g ze'g naang Eei zyavb hog yia maiq weig winb wavq Tevj meib Toq, kunq pun Navq naaig.
15.1: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “maiq kunq mo-se Zauj saa-mu-en sruq Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen, yia maiq maaib Hruq mavg naaiq teij pc'g fivj. zung ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb pun yia maiq zu'g pwatg. pun ninb Bua mivb a'q.
15.10: yia Eei maa aag, yia zu'g Kruq a'q, weig zu'g meib yuvd yia taaib. yia zu'g Zauj teib puv ka'Euad Eei myenb fiub Rcv fiub Zovj. yia maiq pun myenb kaaq yia Eei, yia yaag maiq kaaq myenb Eei, yetg zuvq myenb Zxg zyruj yia.

29.18: yia xij lovg Ru'g Daauq, vxg Naavj Eei Jauq Zauj wrnb pcvg zung ninb Bua. yia xij pun ninb Bua weig luvb Diaq maang kua'q penj kamb Riaj haig Eei myenb, yaag pun ninb Bua yem yia zung ninb Bua mivb Eei nxmb nxm kua'q Bu'Dovj zu'g myenb zyruj, hc'q myenb kamb Riaj, zu'g myenb Wrtq yaag zu'g myenb mavg Piaj.”
29.8: weig zu'g nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, “maiq tuvq pun yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Eei trug waag myenb Zauj Bruq kwaaj myenb Duaq meib Bua. maiq tuvq syenj ninb Bua Beij Eei Beij,
29.3: naaiq zeiq fyenj ninb pavg saa-faan Eei txn, e-laa-saa, Zauj hin-Ki-yaa Eei txn, ke-maa-li-yaa, Eei puad txb mivb, tovb yu-Daa Eei huvb, sej-De-Ki-yaa, Paaiq mivb Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Eei myenb. fyenj kxvq,
29.32: weig naaiq zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia xij tivg ne-he-laam myenb, se-mai-aa, Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun Eei zwid. ninb zuvq maiq maaib yetg taub yem Jyenq naaiq teij pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj tu'q pwatg yia zruj lovj pun yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei sig, weig zu'g ninb kxvq waag vcvg zyruq. ” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
29.21: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj Ko-laa-yaa Eei txn, aa-hapg, Zauj maa-aa-sej-aa Eei txn, sej-De-Ki-yaa. ninb Bua tevq yia Eei mevb trug Jaaq waag Buaj meib Bua. mavg maa'b! yia xij zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa. ninb zyrug txv Jyenq meib Bua taij ninb Bua.
29.14: zyruq kxvq, “yia xij pun meib Bua lxd pwatg yia. yia yaag xij pun meib Bua Rwrnj taaib tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx. yia xij yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj Zauj yia zung meib Bua mivb Eei nxmb nxm txvj, tovb yia pun meib Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei txvj, txb meib Bua Rwrnj.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
29.23: weig zu'g ninb Bua yem i-saa-laa-en ka'Euad zruj Vovj Eei sig. ninb Bua Yenj Jwavg laavd myenb Eei auq, yaag tevq yia Eei mevb trug Jaaq waag, tovb maiq zeid yia Paaiq ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag. hiuq Eei se tovb yia. zruj zxvb zevj Eei yaag tovb yia.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
29.6: xij zu'g txv Jaa maaib txn maaib sia'q. xij zu'g weig meib Bua Eei txn lxd auq, yaag puvj meib Bua Eei sia'q weig pun ninb Bua maaib txn maaib sia'q. xij zu'g yem naaig Yaavj Jyenq faauj maiq zeid zo'g Jyenq Fiag.
29.2: naaiq se ye-Ko-ni-yaa huvb Zauj huvb Eei maa, Zauj im toq Eei myenb, yem yu-Daa Zauj ye-lu-saa-lem zruj Lo Eei myenb, zavg myenb Zauj Lia'g zavg yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zwrtq mig a'q.
29.20: meib Bua yetg zuvq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb, se yem ye-lu-saa-lem yia heug mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon Eei myenb aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag.
29.24: meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ne-he-laam myenb, se-mai-aa,
29.28: weig zu'g ninb fiaq fyenj pun yia Bua yem Baa-Bi-lon Eei myenb kxvq, “zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei zyavb hog laub Daauq a'q. meib Bua xij zu'g komq pyauq yaag yem Jyenq naaig ka'Euad. xij zu'g zruj Wivj zwavj ka'naaiq cvj Eang Wivj Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq.”+’+”
29.7: xij zu'g Tevj tovb yia pun meib Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb uaq nxm zivb tu'q lovj, yaag xij zu'g weig uaq nxm zivb tauj kauj Toq zyruq, weig zu'g uaq nxm zivb tu'q lovj nx, meib Bua yaag tu'q lovj a'q.
29.29: sej-fan-yaa to'g naaiq zeiq fyenj pun trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, mwavj.
29.19: zyruq kxvq, “se weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq mwavj yia Eei waag, tovb yia zanb zang Paaiq yia Eei pru uaq teij trug waag myenb kxvq pun meib Bua mwavj. mq paag ninb Bua maiq Kavq mwavj.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
29.17: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun ninb Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg yaag pun ninb Bua Navq waaig haig Eei vovb Exj pyruq. waaig kau, zuvq maiq penj Eang.
29.31: “meib xij zu'g fiaq fyenj mivb pun yetg zuvq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb kxvq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj ne-he-laam myenb, se-mai-aa, ‘weig zu'g se-mai-aa trug waag Buaj meib Bua yaag maiq zeid yia Paaiq ninb mivb, ninb yaag pun meib Bua Kauj kxvb pc'g Eei waag.’
29.30: ye-le-mi cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
29.27: ib zang meib Bua weig haiq tiug maiq kxvq aa-naa-Totq myenb, ye-le-mi, tovb trug waag Buaj meib Bua uaq taub?
29.11: zyruq kxvq, “yia hiuq tu'q yia weig meib Bua maaib Eei za'eij, se weig pun meib Bua tu'q lovj maiq zeid tu'q Zyruq, weig pun meib Bua maaib hod Gaav yaag maaib lamb Namq txvj.
29.5: meib Bua xij zu'g komq pyauq yaag yem Jyenq naaig ka'Euad. xij zu'g zruj Wivj cvj Eang Wivj Zwrtq Eei ka'naaiq.
29.9: weig zu'g ninb Bua tevq yia Eei mevb trug Eei waag se Jaaq Eei. maiq zeid yia Paaiq ninb Bua.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
29.16: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj zweid Daa-witq Eei weig Eei huvb yaag kxvq Tauj yem naaiq nxm zivb yetg zuvq pc'g fivj, tovb maiq Zauj meib Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei kxb yrud.
29.4: nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei zwavj myenb, tovb yem ye-lu-saa-lem yia pun zu'g kwaatq mivb Baa-Bi-lon Eei myenb.
29.10: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yem Baa-Bi-lon Eei Zyetq zyepg Havj pwavq, yia zyrug mivb lxd meib Bua yaag ei yia lcvd Eei waag zruj zyavj, cvj txb meib Bua Rwrnj naaiq nxm txvj.”
29.22: se laaij naaiq teij i taub, yem Baa-Bi-lon zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei yu-Daa myenb xij lovg naaiq Jruj penj zyruj Eei waag kxvq, “Toq zyruq pun meib Navq sej-De-Ki-yaa Zauj aa-hapg, tovb Baa-Bi-lon huvb lyemb navb Eei puaq taig.”
29.12: uaq zang meib Bua xij heug Jyenq Toq yia, cvj taaib tauj kauj lxd yia. yia yaag xij mwavj meib Bua.
29.15: weig zu'g meib Bua kxvq, “zyruq weig yia Bua yem Baa-Bi-lon lyepg trug waag myenb.”
29.13: meib Bua lxd yia, xij zu'g lovg Revg Hruq lxd zyrug lxd tu'q pwatg.”
29.1: naaiq se trug waag myenb, ye-le-mi, fiaq Eei fyenj pun zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb koj Zauj ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa yem ye-lu-saa-lem kwaatq mivb Baa-Bi-lon Eei sai myenb, trug waag myenb Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj.
29.26: ‘zyruq zuvq lyepg meib zruj sai myenb tiq ye-ho-yaa-Daa sai myenb, kruj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq kunq taub taub putq Din Eei trug waag myenb, zyrug lovg Dyavj kapg Jyenq ninb Eei puab zauj, cvj lovg Lia'g Kru Kru Jyenq Jaav.
29.25: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib lovg meib kanb Eei Buaj fuvj fyenj pun yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zwavj myenb yaag pun maa-aa-sej-aa Eei txn, sej-fan-yaa sai myenb, Zauj zwavj sai myenb. meib Buaj sej-fan-yaa,

30.18: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij pun yaa-Kopq Eei Dopg liub Rwrnj taaib tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx, yaag Kxb lyenb ninb yem Eei txvj. zivb yaag xij tu'q Zeij Jiad yem zivb Eei lob Bov, huvb ting yaag yem lob txvj lyepg Jiad.
30.8: “nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘Tauj uaq Nxi yia xij wrtq nauq kaad Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Jaav Eei Dyavb kaad, yaag Zutq tavj Dob ninb Bua Eei Laav. kanb fivj myenb yaag maiq tu'q pun ninb Bua cvj zruj nrub.
30.3: zyruq kxvq, ‘Nxib Eia'g xij Tauj, yia xij pun yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj yu-Daa myenb, tu'q lovj taaib Navq lod uaq nx. yia xij txb ninb Bua Rwrnj tovb yia Zeij pun ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv. ninb Bua zyrug tu'q Ripg penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng.’+” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
30.21: kunq ninb Bua uaq taub zuvq penj ninb Bua kanb Eei myenb, ninb Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq penj yem ninb Bua kanb Bu'Dovj Eei myenb. yia xij pun ninb taaib nitq fatq, ninb zyrug taaib nitq fatq yia, weig zu'g maaib haiq taub ninb kanb kaamq taaib nitq fatq yia?’ naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.
30.14: Namq meib uaq teij yetg zuvq la'Ku'q meib. ninb Bua zuvq maiq kunq meib a'q, weig zu'g yia Bx'q meib Navq winb wavq Bx'q nx, yaag tivg meib Eei zwid Navq tivg to'g haig Eei myenb Eei zwid, weig zu'g meib Eei zwid Lo haig, meib Eei zwib nipg yaag Zamq.
30.23: mavg maa'b! zyruq Eei Ryaaub Jia'q. ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Navq Ryaaub zung kwinb Jyenq x'q myenb Eei mGxvq.
30.6: meib Bua xij zu'g naaig yaag mavg kaaj, mJavg txn haib yuvd kub vwaad Eei fai? uaq Euvg yia weig haiq tiug pwatg taub taub mJavg txn lovg puad Qam Jyenq ka'sia Navq msia'q txn mun kub vwaad? taub taub Eei Myen weig haiq tiug Byeng Revg?
30.2: “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘zx'q yia kxvq Buaj meib Eei yetg zuvq waag fiaq Jyenq sru.’
30.20: ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq xij Navq lod uaq nx. ninb Bua kapq zunq Eei wig yaag yem yia Eei Ra'Myen lyepg Jiad. yia xij tivg ta'faanb zeij ninb Bua uaq teij Eei zwid.
30.24: zyruq Zyruq Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq yaag maiq taauj Gaav, Tauj ninb yem Hruq tivg xij zruj Eei zruj zyavj. Tauj setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g meib Bua zyrug mevb pc'g naaiq teij sig.
30.7: Kruq a'q. naaiq nxm Nxi za'kevb penj tomb Nxi a'q. maiq maaib haiq nxm Nxi Dovg naaiq nxm Nxi. se yaa-Kopq zu'g ze'g naang Eei zyavb hog, mq paag yem uaq nxm Nxi ninb Zxg tu'q Fruj Zwrtq.’
30.19: maaib lcvd zivb Eei Ruv Zauj Fyenb yrub Eei Qiaj yem naaiq teij txvj ka'Euad Zwrtq. yia xij pun ninb Bua Yaavj Jyenq faauj, ninb Bua zyrug maiq zeid zo'g. yia xij pun ninb Bua tu'q myenb Taaib, ninb Bua zyrug maiq zeid zruj faij.
30.17: zyruq kxvq, ‘yia xij zxg meib lovj, pun meib Navq lod uaq nx. yia yaag xij zxg meib zu'g mun Eei txvj lovj, weig zu'g myenb kxvq meib se zu'g zung Zwrtq Eei myenb, ‘se si-on, tovb maiq maaib haiq taub Taanj.’
30.11: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia Zauj meib yem weig Fruj meib. yia xij pun tovb meib zu'g Raanj mivb yem uaq teij yetg zuvq kua'q Bu'Dovj zutg Revg. mq paag yia maiq pun meib zutg Revg. ziuj meib zruj Eei yia xij Bx'q Faauj meib Pwij hxpg zu'g zruj Eei. maiq kunq Navq haiq nx, yia xij zu'g tivg meib Eei zwid maiq kwavg.’
30.5: zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia Bua haid heug Jyenq Hruq Waav Eei Qiaj, kamb Riaj haig, maiq maaib pcvb xn.
30.9: ninb Bua xij fub suj zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, yaag fub suj yia weig ninb Bua lyepg taaib Eei huvb, Daa-witq.’
30.16: “+‘weig naaiq ta'faanb haiq taub Eang meib, uaq taub zyrug zu'g Eang a'q. meib Eei yetg zuvq winb wavq, taub taub zuvq xij zu'g kwaatq mivb. luq meib uaq teij yaag xij zu'g luq, ta'faanb Zaavq meib uaq teij yaag xij zu'g Zaavq.’
30.4: yem naaiq mivb se zyruq kxvq Tauj i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa Eei waag.
30.10: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq aa'b! maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! maiq tuvq zu'g hc'q kanb, weig zu'g mavg maa'b! yia xij yem ko Eei txvj Fruj meib, yaag yem zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei teib puv Fruj meib Eei zeib fun. yaa-Kopq zyrug tu'q Rwrnj taaib sekq Ria'g pcvb xn Eei yem, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub zruj pun ninb kamb Riaj.’
30.22: “+‘meib Bua zyrug zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj, yia yaag zruj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb.’+”
30.12: “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘meib zu'g mun Eei txvj zxg maiq haib lovj, meib zu'g syav Eei txvj za'kevb zu'g Niaq.
30.15: meib weig haiq tiug Eyemq laaij zu'g mun? meib zu'g mun Eei txvj zxg maiq haib lovj, weig zu'g meib Eei zwid Lo haig, meib Eei zwib nipg yaag Gcvg, yia Zivj Navq naaiq zruj naaiq teij sig pun meib.
30.13: maiq maaib myenb Tevj meib Zcvj sig, maiq maaib Dia zxg meib Bua zu'g mun Eei txvj, maiq haib zxg tu'q meib lovj.
30.1: ye-le-mi tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
